Title: Senior Data Scientist | Big Data & Advanced Analytics (Milano-Roma)
Description:
Senior Data Scientist ‚Äì Big Data & Advanced Analytics




Sede: Milano - Roma (Ibrido)

Azienda: Be Management Consulting

Settore: Consulenza direzionale e IT per il settore bancario




CHI CERCHIAMO

Cerchiamo un Senior Data Scientist in grado di guidare l‚Äôanalisi e lo sviluppo di soluzioni avanzate di AI e Machine Learning per clienti del settore finanziario. Il candidato ideale possiede competenze nell‚Äôanalisi dei dati, nella modellazione statistica e nell‚Äôutilizzo di strumenti per la rappresentazione dei dati in dashboard interattive. La risorsa deve avere esperienza progettuale, autonomia tecnica e capacit√† di gestire relazioni complesse con stakeholder interni ed esterni.




COSA FARAI

Analisi e Modellazione Dati: Svilupperai modelli di Machine Learning e AI per ottimizzare i processi e supportare le decisioni strategiche dei clienti.
Sviluppo Algoritmi: Implementerai algoritmi avanzati per l‚Äôelaborazione e l‚Äôinterpretazione dei dati, contribuendo alla trasformazione digitale delle aziende.
Big Data & Advanced Analytics: Lavorerai con dataset complessi per individuare pattern e insight strategici nel settore finanziario.
Data Visualization: Creerai dashboard e report interattivi per rendere i dati facilmente comprensibili agli stakeholder
Data Science: guiderai lo sviluppo di modelli predittivi, classificatori e altre soluzioni AI per ottimizzare processi e strategie aziendali.
Ownership progettuale: sarai responsabile del ciclo di vita dei progetti, dalla raccolta requisiti alla messa in produzione.
Gestione del team: coordinerai risorse junior, fungendo da riferimento tecnico e metodologico.
Interfaccia con il cliente: lavorerai in autonomia con stakeholder business e IT, facilitando la comunicazione tra esigenze di business e soluzioni tecniche.
Innovazione continua: promuoverai l‚Äôadozione di tecnologie emergenti e approcci innovativi all‚Äôinterno dei team di lavoro.




REQUISITI

Formazione: Laurea Magistrale o PhD in Statistica, Matematica, Fisica, Ingegneria o discipline affini.
Esperienza: 3‚Äì5 anni in Data Science, AI, ML e Advanced Analytics.
Competenze tecniche: Ottima padronanza di Python (o R/Matlab/SPSS/SAS), SQL e framework di modellazione statistica. Conoscenza approfondita di Azure.
Modelli & metodologie: Esperienza solida in analisi multivariata, modelli predittivi, distribuzioni di probabilit√† e processi stocastici.
Soft Skills: Leadership tecnica, autonomia, capacit√† di gestione delle risorse, attitudine alla consulenza e al problem solving. Capacit√† di mediazione tra team tecnici e manageriali.
Lingue: Inglese fluente, scritto e parlato.
Tool: Ottima conoscenza di strumenti BI e Data Visualization (es. Power BI, Tableau, etc.)




CHI SIAMO

Be | Shaping the Future, parte del gruppo Engineering, √® tra i principali player in ambito Management Consulting e ICT Solutions. Forniamo servizi di Business Advisory, Information Technology e Digital Engagement, supportando primarie istituzioni finanziarie e industriali nelle loro sfide di trasformazione digitale. Con circa 2.000 dipendenti e una presenza internazionale, il Gruppo √® un punto di riferimento nel settore Financial Services.

Be Management Consulting √® la societ√† del Gruppo Be | Shaping the Future specializzata in Business Advisory. Supportiamo i nostri clienti nella gestione di progetti complessi con un approccio tailor-made, combinando competenze specialistiche e capacit√† di orchestrare soluzioni end-to-end.




COSA TI OFFRIAMO

Flessibilit√†: Sede a Milano con ampia possibilit√† di smart working.
Formazione continua: Accesso a corsi interni ed esterni per lo sviluppo professionale.
Feedback & crescita: Valutazioni periodiche basate sul merito e contatto diretto con il senior management.
Percorso di carriera dinamico: Crescita rapida in un ambiente giovane e imprenditoriale.




Durante il colloquio risponderemo a tutte le tue curiosit√† su Be e su come puoi fare la differenza.

Let‚Äôs shape our future together!

Title: AI Research Engineer
Description:
At Bending Spoons, we‚Äôre striving to build one of the all-time great companies. A company that serves a huge number of customers. A company where team members grow to their full potential. A company that functions at unparalleled levels of effectiveness and efficiency. A company that creates value for shareowners at an extraordinary rate. And a company that does so while adhering to high ethical standards.

To achieve this objective, we execute the following strategy: We acquire a digital business with untapped potential and make it as successful as we can by leveraging our platform‚Äîwhich comprises our expertise, technologies, data, brand, talents, and company culture. Then, we invest the proceeds into making our platform more powerful, and into acquiring new businesses. Thus, our strategy sees us combine an investor‚Äôs attention to capital allocation with the hands-on approach of an operator.

For a talented, driven, and collaborative individual, working at Bending Spoons is an opportunity to learn, make an impact, and progress their career at an exceptionally high rate. That‚Äôs our promise to such a candidate.

A few examples of your responsibilities
Power digital products with AI. Work with product teams to identify high-impact opportunities where AI can transform the user experience for millions‚Äîand then build the solutions to make them happen. Drive the process from possibility to production, delivering code that‚Äôs robust, reproducible, and built for scale.
Explore ways to push the boundaries of our AI capabilities. Stay at the bleeding edge of AI by investigating new models, techniques, and research. Learn fast across new domains, share findings with the team, and turn breakthrough ideas into production systems that deliver real-world impact.
Refine data foundations for exceptional results. Own the full data lifecycle‚Äîfrom acquisition and labeling to loading and management‚Äîto ensure our models are trained on clean, high-quality datasets that power top-performing systems.
Own your impact, end-to-end. Set smart priorities, manage execution, and consistently deliver high-quality results, even in ambiguous or fast-changing environments. Balance technical depth with strong ownership, growing your skills while delivering meaningful contributions.


What we look for
Reasoning ability. Given the necessary knowledge, you can solve complex problems. You think from first principles, and structure your ideas sharply. You resist the influence of biases. You identify and take care of the details that matter.
Drive. You‚Äôre extremely ambitious in everything you do‚Äîand your initiative, effort, and tenacity match the intensity of your ambition. You feel deeply responsible for your work. You hold yourself to a high‚Äîand rising‚Äîbar.
Team spirit. You give generously and without the expectation of receiving in return. You support the best idea, not your idea. You're always happy to get your hands dirty to help your team. You‚Äôre reliable, honest, and transparent.
Proficiency in English. You read, write, and speak proficiently in English.


What we offer
Incredibly talented, entrepreneurial teams. You‚Äôll work in small, result-oriented, autonomous teams alongside some of the brightest people in your field.
An exceptional opportunity for growth. We go to great lengths to hire individuals of outstanding potential‚Äîthen, our priority is to put them in the ideal position to thrive. Spooners in their 20s lead products worth hundreds of millions of dollars. And if you‚Äôve got what it takes, you‚Äôll soon be playing an essential role in major projects, too.
Competitive pay and access to equity in the company. Typically, we offer an individual at the start of their career a salary of ¬£66,779 in the UK and ‚Ç¨63,965 elsewhere. For a candidate that we assess as possessing considerable relevant experience, the salary on offer tends to be between ¬£110,389 and ¬£149,636 in the UK, and ‚Ç¨105,737 and ‚Ç¨143,330 elsewhere. Pay grows rapidly as you accumulate experience and translate it into greater impact. You can also receive some of your pay in company equity at a discounted price, thus participating in the value creation we achieve together. If relocating to Italy, you may enjoy a 50% tax cut.
All. These. Benefits. Flexible hours, remote working, unlimited backing for learning and training, top-of-the-market health insurance, a rich relocation package, generous parental support, and a yearly retreat to a stunning location. We help each Spooner set up the conditions to do their best work.


Commitment & contract
Permanent or fixed-term. Full-time or part-time.

Location
Milan (Italy), London (UK) or remote.

The selection process
If you pass our screening, we‚Äôll ask you to take on a few tests designed to assess how you approach unfamiliar problems. They‚Äôre challenging and may take several hours to complete. If you‚Äôre successful with those, we‚Äôll invite you to a series of interviews.

We set the bar high and won't extend an offer until we're convinced we've found the right candidate. This is why a job may stay open for months or be reposted several times.

Studies suggest that women tend not to apply for a job if their CV isn‚Äôt a perfect fit. Here, talent takes precedence over experience. So if you like the role and think you could be awesome at it in time, go ahead and apply.

Bending Spoons is an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer. We consider for employment any applicant and provide reasonable accommodations for an individual with disabilities‚Äîjust let us know through this form.

Before you apply
If you‚Äôve applied before but didn't receive an offer, we recommend waiting at least one year before applying again.

Bending Spoons is a demanding environment. We‚Äôre extremely ambitious and we hold ourselves‚Äîand one another‚Äîto a high standard. While this tends to lead to extraordinary learning, achievement, and career growth, it also requires significant commitment.

To help you ramp up quickly and set yourself up for success, we recommend spending your first few months working from our Milan office, regardless of your long-term work location. It‚Äôs the best way to rapidly absorb our company culture and build trust with your new teammates. We‚Äôll support you with generous travel and accommodation assistance. After that, you‚Äôre welcome to work from our offices in Milan or London, or remotely from approved countries‚Äîdepending on what we agree at the offer stage.

If the role speaks to you and you‚Äôre excited to give your best, we‚Äôd love to hear from you. Apply now‚Äîwe can‚Äôt wait to meet you.

And a company that does so while adhering to high ethical standards.

To achieve this objective, we execute the following strategy: We acquire a digital business with untapped potential and make it as successful as we can by leveraging our platform‚Äîwhich comprises our expertise, technologies, data, brand, talents, and company culture. Then, we invest the proceeds into making our platform more powerful, and into acquiring new businesses. Thus, our strategy sees us combine an investor‚Äôs attention to capital allocation with the hands-on approach of an operator.

For a talented, driven, and collaborative individual, working at Bending Spoons is an opportunity to learn, make an impact, and progress their career at an exceptionally high rate. That‚Äôs our promise to such a candidate.

A few examples of your responsibilities
  • Power digital products with AI. Work with product teams to identify high-impact opportunities where AI can transform the user experience for millions‚Äîand then build the solutions to make them happen. Drive the process from possibility to production, delivering code that‚Äôs robust, reproducible, and built for scale.
  • Explore ways to push the boundaries of our AI capabilities. Stay at the bleeding edge of AI by investigating new models, techniques, and research. Learn fast across new domains, share findings with the team, and turn breakthrough ideas into production systems that deliver real-world impact.
  • Refine data foundations for exceptional results. Own the full data lifecycle‚Äîfrom acquisition and labeling to loading and management‚Äîto ensure our models are trained on clean, high-quality datasets that power top-performing systems.
  • Own your impact, end-to-end. Set smart priorities, manage execution, and consistently deliver high-quality results, even in ambiguous or fast-changing environments. Balance technical depth with strong ownership, growing your skills while delivering meaningful contributions.

What we look for
  • Reasoning ability. Given the necessary knowledge, you can solve complex problems. You think from first principles, and structure your ideas sharply. You resist the influence of biases. You identify and take care of the details that matter.
  • Drive. You‚Äôre extremely ambitious in everything you do‚Äîand your initiative, effort, and tenacity match the intensity of your ambition. You feel deeply responsible for your work. You hold yourself to a high‚Äîand rising‚Äîbar.
  • Team spirit. You give generously and without the expectation of receiving in return. You support the best idea, not your idea. You're always happy to get your hands dirty to help your team. You‚Äôre reliable, honest, and transparent.
  • Proficiency in English. You read, write, and speak proficiently in English.

What we offer
  • Incredibly talented, entrepreneurial teams. You‚Äôll work in small, result-oriented, autonomous teams alongside some of the brightest people in your field.
  • An exceptional opportunity for growth. We go to great lengths to hire individuals of outstanding potential‚Äîthen, our priority is to put them in the ideal position to thrive. Spooners in their 20s lead products worth hundreds of millions of dollars. And if you‚Äôve got what it takes, you‚Äôll soon be playing an essential role in major projects, too.
  • Competitive pay and access to equity in the company. Typically, we offer an individual at the start of their career a salary of ¬£66,779 in the UK and ‚Ç¨63,965 elsewhere. For a candidate that we assess as possessing considerable relevant experience, the salary on offer tends to be between ¬£110,389 and ¬£149,636 in the UK, and ‚Ç¨105,737 and ‚Ç¨143,330 elsewhere. Pay grows rapidly as you accumulate experience and translate it into greater impact. You can also receive some of your pay in company equity at a discounted price, thus participating in the value creation we achieve together. If relocating to Italy, you may enjoy a 50% tax cut.
  • All. These. Benefits. Flexible hours, remote working, unlimited backing for learning and training, top-of-the-market health insurance, a rich relocation package, generous parental support, and a yearly retreat to a stunning location. We help each Spooner set up the conditions to do their best work.

Commitment & contract
Permanent or fixed-term. Full-time or part-time.

Location
Milan (Italy), London (UK) or remote.

The selection process
If you pass our screening, we‚Äôll ask you to take on a few tests designed to assess how you approach unfamiliar problems. They‚Äôre challenging and may take several hours to complete. If you‚Äôre successful with those, we‚Äôll invite you to a series of interviews.

We set the bar high and won't extend an offer until we're convinced we've found the right candidate. This is why a job may stay open for months or be reposted several times.

Studies suggest that women tend not to apply for a job if their CV isn‚Äôt a perfect fit. Here, talent takes precedence over experience. So if you like the role and think you could be awesome at it in time, go ahead and apply.

Bending Spoons is an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer. We consider for employment any applicant and provide reasonable accommodations for an individual with disabilities‚Äîjust let us know through this form.

Before you apply
If you‚Äôve applied before but didn't receive an offer, we recommend waiting at least one year before applying again.

Bending Spoons is a demanding environment. We‚Äôre extremely ambitious and we hold ourselves‚Äîand one another‚Äîto a high standard. While this tends to lead to extraordinary learning, achievement, and career growth, it also requires significant commitment.

To help you ramp up quickly and set yourself up for success, we recommend spending your first few months working from our Milan office, regardless of your long-term work location. It‚Äôs the best way to rapidly absorb our company culture and build trust with your new teammates. We‚Äôll support you with generous travel and accommodation assistance. After that, you‚Äôre welcome to work from our offices in Milan or London, or remotely from approved countries‚Äîdepending on what we agree at the offer stage.

If the role speaks to you and you‚Äôre excited to give your best, we‚Äôd love to hear from you. Apply now‚Äîwe can‚Äôt wait to meet you.

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
Adecco D&T √® alla ricerca di un* Data Scientist da inserire all‚Äôinterno di una realt√† che si occupa di sviluppare soluzioni di Intelligenza Artificiale e Modellistica Matematica.




Stiamo cercando una figura tecnica con almeno 3 anni di esperienza, che oltre a possedere solide competenze core, sia in grado di interfacciarsi efficacemente con il cliente.

La risorsa ideale sar√† coinvolta sia nella fase di presales, traducendo le esigenze di business in requisiti tecnici chiari e strutturati, sia nella fase progettuale, contribuendo alla risoluzione di eventuali criticit√† tecniche e garantendo il corretto sviluppo delle soluzioni.




Stiamo cercando un* Data Scientist appassionato e proattivo, specializzato in Modellistica Matematica e Intelligenza Artificiale. In questo ruolo, sarai a diretto riporto del Team Leader e dovrai essere pronto/a a metterti in gioco e a contribuire al successo dei progetti innovativi sviluppati.




Chi cerchiamo:

Laurea Magistrale in discipline STEM affini ai temi di Intelligenza Artificiale
Esperienza di almeno 3 anni in aziende medio-grandi a contatto con il cliente (preferibilmente in ambito consulenziale o in contesti affini)
Eccellenti capacit√† di comunicazione e gestione delle relazioni con i colleghi, i clienti e gli stakeholder.
Approccio proattivo, capacit√† di navigare in situazioni ambigue, orientamento ai risultati e capacit√† di risolvere problematiche in modo creativo e pragmatico.




Competenze tecniche:

Python: conoscenza delle principali librerie per data science (es. scikit-learn, polars, canvass, Spark)
Database:
Relazionali (PostgreSQL)
Non relazionali (MongoDB, Cassandra, ecc.)
Docker: buona familiarit√† con ambienti containerizzati
GitLab: gestione versioning e collaborazione su codice




Cosa farai

Verrai coinvolto nello sviluppo di progetti in ambito Data Science, contribuendo attivamente alla realizzazione di soluzioni tecniche innovative.
Supporterai il team nella definizione dell‚Äôofferta tecnica, collaborando alla stesura delle proposte e garantendo coerenza tra requisiti e soluzioni.
Ti interfaccerai con il cliente sia in fase di presales che durante lo sviluppo, traducendo le esigenze di business in requisiti tecnici chiari e contribuendo alla risoluzione di eventuali criticit√† progettuali

Title: AI & Data Specialist
Description:
Milano Serravalle ‚Äì Milano Tangenziali S.p.A. √® una delle principali concessionarie autostradali italiane, da sempre impegnata nella gestione e nello sviluppo di infrastrutture strategiche per la mobilit√† nell‚Äôarea metropolitana di Milano. Stiamo sviluppando progetti basati sull‚Äôintelligenza artificiale per migliorare la sicurezza, l‚Äôefficienza e l‚Äôesperienza degli utenti lungo la nostra rete autostradale.

Il ruolo

La Societ√† ha deciso di intraprendere un percorso di rinnovamento dei suoi sistemi informativi e della propria organizzazione con l‚Äôobiettivo di rafforzarsi, come punto di riferimento, nel settore autostradale. Per queste ragioni, si punta soprattutto allo sviluppo e all‚Äôimplementazione di soluzioni tecnologiche all‚Äôavanguardia e a supporto dei processi di Business. All‚Äôinterno dell‚Äôarea ICT si prevede l‚Äôinserimento di nuove risorse per guidare l‚Äôadozione di soluzioni data-driven e AI generativa. Il ruolo prevede la gestione del patrimonio informativo aziendale, la promozione della data culture e la costruzione di un framework di data governance a supporto dei processi decisionali.

Attivit√† principali


Analisi e ottimizzazione dati autostradali: traffico, smart road, manutenzione predittiva, GIS/ERP
Data Governance: definizione e presidio del framework, promozione cultura del dato
Architetture dati: progettazione e gestione di architetture scalabili, pipeline ETL/ELT, integrazione AI
AI, ML e LLM: introduzione e validazione di modelli, progetti di AI generativa, monitoraggio performance
Strumenti e visualizzazione: dashboard BI, ottimizzazione database/API, evoluzione architetture
Supporto e documentazione: identificazione opportunit√†, redazione e mantenimento documentazione tecnica



Requisiti

Formazione (preferibile):


Laurea magistrale in Ingegneria Informatica, Data Science, AI o affini. Saranno valutati anche percorsi formativi diversi se adeguatamente supportati da esperienza lavorativa sul campo



Esperienza (preferibile):


Esperienza pregressa in contesti simili (es. altre concessionarie autostradali, trasporti, infrastrutture o mobilit√† intelligente)
Esperienza sul campo come Data Scientist o esperto di AI



Competenze tecniche


Prompt engineering, grounding, indexing
Sistemi ITS, edge AI, IoT
Python (TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn)
Database relazionali e NoSQL
Cloud (AWS, GCP, Azure)
Big data, orchestration (Docker, Kubernetes, Airflow)
Computer vision, NLP, predictive analytics



Completano il profilo ricercato


Attitudine al lavoro in team. attenzione al dettaglio e pensiero critico
proattivit√†, dinamismo, capacit√† di adattamento
ottime capacit√† comunicative e relazionali (soprattutto con interlocutori non tecnici)



Saranno considerati un plus:


Conoscenza del Codice Appalti Pubblici
Esperienza in aziende soggette al Codice Appalti



Cosa offriamo


Inserimento in un contesto in evoluzione;
Opportunit√† di crescita professionale e formazione mirata e continua;
Progetti ad alto impatto su scala regionale
Inserimento con contratto full-time a tempo indeterminato.



Al rapporto di lavoro sar√† applicato il CCNL per i dipendenti da imprese esercenti attivit√† di gestione delle infrastrutture viarie a pedaggio, delle attivit√† e dei servizi connessi a supporto, dei sistemi di viabilit√† integrata.

L‚Äôinquadramento e la retribuzione previsti per il ruolo saranno commisurati alle effettive capacit√† ed esperienze del/della candidato/a.

Il presente annuncio √® redatto ai sensi delle leggi 903/77 e 125/91 e ai sensi dei decreti legislativi 215/03 e 216/03.

Title: Senior Data Scientist (m/f/d)
Description:
About Prestatech




At Prestatech, we're redefining the financial world by fostering innovation and challenging the traditional banking system. Our culture is diverse, dynamic, and forward-thinking. From our offices in Berlin and Milan, we create cutting-edge API technologies in an inclusive environment where everyone can contribute their best work.




Founded in 2021 by Christian Nothacker, Luca Terragni, and Lorenzo Giusti, Prestatech combines document automation and proprietary technology to help financial institutions and B2B companies make quick, reliable, and inclusive credit decisions for SMEs and consumers.




When most people think of getting a loan or mortgage, they picture a slow and tedious process. Our mission is to simplify that through technology.




We‚Äôre a young and fast-growing company‚Äîbut this is our second venture. Before Prestatech, we founded and exited Prestacap, a lending platform for SMEs active in Italy and Germany.




We‚Äôre passionate about data and technology, never satisfied with the status quo, and believe that teamwork is key to achieving ambitious goals together.




To date, we have raised ‚Ç¨8 million, which is helping us bring more innovative solutions to market, expand operations in Italy, and launch in the UK, Germany, and the US..




We‚Äôre now looking for a Senior Data Scientist (m/f/d), someone with prior experience in fintech who is hands-on, outcome-driven, and deeply curious about solving business problems with data and AI.


Tasks


You would be joining a flexible and dynamic team and your role will include:





selecting features, building and optimizing classifiers using machine learning techniques


processing, cleansing and verifying the integrity of data used for analysis


deep dive on the problems using SQL and scripting languages to drive solutions leveraging Statistical Analysis


implement and scale data pipelines and solutions using Big Data technologies


design, train, and deploy machine learning models and AI-based solutions for credit scoring, fraud detection, and other core financial applications.


collaborate closely with the development team to recommend and build innovations based on Data Science


own the process: identify and execute on high impact projects, triage external requests, and make sure you bring projects to conclusion in time for the results to be useful


leverage AI tools to achieve even better and faster results



Requirements



6+ years of experience in Data Science, ideally in fintech or financial services


Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Mathematics or related field (MSc/PhD preferred)


Strong understanding of Big Data frameworks and cloud platforms.


Expertise in machine learning and AI techniques


Proficient in Python, with hands-on experience using Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn


Skilled in working with SQL/NoSQL databases


Experience with version control (Git) and writing clean, maintainable code


Experience with financial datasets, credit scoring, or risk modeling is a strong plus





Not sure you meet evert single requirement? Don‚Äôt worry ‚Äî if this role excites you and you believe you could be a good fit, we‚Äôd still love to hear from you. At Prestatech, we value potential, curiosity, and passion just as much as experience.


Benefits



Excellent compensation aligned with your experience and impact


A career path that allows you to take yourself to the next level


Annual training budget to help you grow and develop


2 days per week of Smart Working (+ 3 days at the office)


Flexible working arrangements, with the understanding that building a successful startup sometimes requires periods of focused, intense work


Bi-annual company offsites


Referral bonus


a co-working office in one of the best district of Milan (Isola)





Recruitment Process:





HR Interview (30 minutes)


Assessment Test (up to 60 minutes)


CEO/CTO Interview (30 minutes)





If you have any specific requirements or need accommodations during the recruitment process, please let us know ‚Äî we‚Äôre happy to support you.




At Prestatech, we actively embrace diversity and are committed to fostering a safe, inclusive, and welcoming workplace for everyone. Our recruitment process is free from discrimination of any kind ‚Äî including on the basis of race, national or ethnic origin, age, religion, disability, sex, gender identity, or sexual orientation.




With over 25 employees from more than 15 different countries, our diversity drives innovation, enriches our culture, and challenges us to consider multiple perspectives every day.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
Descrizione dell'azienda

Publicis Groupe

Fondata nel 1926 da Marcel Bleustein-Blanchet, Publicis Groupe √® oggi il primo gruppo di comunicazione al mondo. Presente in Italia con tre sedi - Milano, Torino e Roma - e oltre 1500 professionisti, il Gruppo agisce come partner strategico per la crescita dei propri clienti, offrendo un‚Äôampia gamma di competenze e soluzioni integrate nelle aree della creativit√†, media, produzione e business transformation.

Panoramica

Questa figura avr√† un ruolo cruciale nell‚Äôutilizzare i dati e la modellazione avanzata per ottimizzare le strategie di marketing e migliorare le performance dei clienti.

Supporter√† il team Data nell‚Äôidentificazione dei principali bisogni dei clienti e nella progettazione di soluzioni tecniche mirate a soddisfare tali esigenze.

Il Machine Learning Engineer sar√† responsabile dello sviluppo, della documentazione e della messa in produzione di prodotti finalizzati a risolvere le sfide assegnate, in collaborazione con i team di sviluppo, tecnico e di modellazione, nonch√© con gli stakeholder rilevanti per ciascun prodotto.

Responsabilit√†


Implementare modelli per la segmentazione dell‚Äôaudience, la personalizzazione degli annunci, l‚Äôottimizzazione del budget e l‚Äôattribuzione
Collaborare con i team marketing e data per definire KPI e identificare insight utili e azionabili
Sviluppare strumenti e dashboard per visualizzare i risultati dei modelli e i principali indicatori di performance delle campagne
Garantire la qualit√†, la scalabilit√† e l‚Äôapplicabilit√† in tempo reale dei modelli negli ambienti di produzione
Rimanere aggiornato sulle ultime ricerche nel campo del Machine Learning applicato al digital marketing e alle tecnologie pubblicitarie


In Altre Parole Andrai a


Sviluppare, testare e mantenere soluzioni di machine learning in collaborazione con il Data Sciences Lead, il team di sviluppo e i clienti interni ed esterni, utilizzando l'infrastruttura di sistema dell'agenzia per offrire un servizio professionale di alto livello
Analizzare le sfide, progettare soluzioni e proporre applicazioni personalizzate e innovative delle tecniche di modellazione avanzata, a supporto della proposta dell'agenzia e del suo vantaggio competitivo, individuando anche potenziali nuove fonti di ricavo
Redigere e presentare documentazione che descriva le soluzioni sviluppate, affinch√© clienti e stakeholder interni possano massimizzare il valore dei prodotti basati su machine learning


Qualifiche


2-3 anni di esperienza in una posizione simile, con esperienza nella modellazione per il marketing, incluse tecniche non basate su machine learning (es. Marketing Mix Modeling)
Conoscenza di Python o R e dei principali framework di Machine Learning (es. TensorFlow o PyTorch)
Competenze in statistica, tecniche di modellazione e analisi dei dati
Esperienza con piattaforme pubblicitarie (es. Google Ads, Meta, DV360) e dataset di marketing
Familiarit√† con SQL e strumenti di data visualization (es. Looker, Tableau, Power BI)
Capacit√† di problem solving
Attitudine proattiva (‚Äúcan-do attitude‚Äù)
Agio nel lavorare in ambienti flessibili e con team agili
Capacit√† di comunicare risultati tecnici complessi a stakeholder non tecnici
Conoscenza della lingua inglese
Laurea o titolo superiore in discipline legate al machine learning come matematica, statistica o informatica


Informazioni aggiuntive

Cosa Offriamo


Learning & Development: un percorso di apprendimento su misura, un approccio individuale e basato sui propri bisogni, always on!
Corporate benefits: una piattaforma dedicata alle nostre persone, piena di offerte, sconti e altro.
Corporate Wellness: accesso a corsi di formazione online per il tuo benessere fisico e psicologico.
Work From Home: 2 giorni alla settimana.


Il nostro motto di Publicis Groupe "Viva La Diff√©rence".

Ci impegniamo nella creazione di esperienze eque e inclusive per tutti i talenti.

Title: Data Science Engineer, AI Lab
Description:
About Permira

Permira is a global investment firm that backs successful businesses with growth ambitions. Founded in 1985, the firm advises funds across two core asset classes, private equity and credit, with total committed capital of approximately ‚Ç¨80bn. The Permira private equity funds make both long-term majority (Buyout) and minority (Growth Equity) investments in four key sectors: Technology, Consumer, Healthcare, Services. The Permira credit funds support businesses with flexible financing solutions across Direct Lending, Strategic Opportunities and CLO Management. Established in 2007, the firm advises investment funds and products which have provided approximately ‚Ç¨20 billion of debt capital to over 300 businesses.

Role Overview

We are seeking an individual to join our AI Lab which sits within our Technology Value Creation Team. Our portfolio includes many of the world‚Äôs leading software and tech-enabled companies with landmark technology investments including Zendesk, Mimecast, Informatica, Squarespace, McAfee, and many more. You can learn more about our portfolio here: https://www.permira.com/portfolio

This team will be a central entity that develops and deploys machine learning capabilities across Permira, collaborating with our teams and sectors. At Permira, AI is not just another IT initiative‚Äîit‚Äôs a fundamental shift in how we work, think, and operate. We are committed to embedding AI deeply into the fabric of our products and workflows‚Äînot merely as an add-on, but as a reimaging of what our offerings can be in an AI-native world.

Our strategy focuses on identifying a few high-impact, needle-moving use cases where AI can drive measurable value. The focus of the AI Lab will be first internal use cases, to deploy AI to make better and faster investment decisions, and secondly to the portfolio, supporting Permira portfolio companies on specific AI initiatives. Our goal with the AI Lab is encourage our teams and portfolio companies to be truly AI-native and drive tangible impact with faster innovation velocity, streamlined revenue efficiency, and deliberate cost savings.

This is a hands-on role, where you will spend most of your time developing in Python together with our team of Data Scientists (DSs) and Machine Learning Engineers (MLEs). You will also be interfacing directly with subject matter experts and stakeholders, e.g. to evaluate the feasibility of potential DS use cases or to explain how your model works during a Team Review.

This role is based in Permira‚Äôs Milan office, and you will be part of a geographically distributed team (UK/US/Europe) that embraces remote and hybrid collaboration.

Key Responsibilities


(Develop & ship models) Develop and maintain ML models for a range of use cases at Permira. Ensure these models smoothly reach production and bring measurable value to our stakeholders
(Analysis) Perform efficient exploratory data analysis (EDA) and present key insights to colleagues & stakeholders
(Best practices) Adopt best practices and standards for the development of robust ML models
(MLOps) Collaborate closely with MLEs to prepare your code & model for production using our ML Platform
(Project start-up) Help evaluate the feasibility of new use cases for ML


What We‚Äôre Looking For

We are looking for a high-performing, analytically sharp, and emotionally intelligent professional who thrives at the intersection of AI, business transformation, and investment. Ideal candidates will have:


2-5 years‚Äô experience in data science and machine learning, including the development of models that successfully went to production
You are an expert in using applied ML on structured data, in particular regression and classification problems
You have basic experience with Generative AI, both large language models (LLMs) and embedding models, especially leveraging GenAI in non-chat applications
You approach complex problems in a structured way, always looking for the simplest, pragmatic solutions
You understand the technical and non-technical constraints of a business problem
You are detail-oriented but can also quickly shift priorities if required
You enjoy working collaboratively in a cross-functional & distributed team environment
You have great presentation skills and can communicate to a wide variety of audiences
You have a strong foundation in statistics
You have solid software engineering skills and love coding in Python
You know your way around a linux shell and are comfortable with Git for version control.
You know the scikit-learn API inside and out
You are comfortable in an agile Way of Working, with Scrum or similar frameworks
A strong cultural fit with Permira‚Äîteam-first, intellectually curious, low-ego, and entrepreneurial


Nice To Have


Experience with native AI suites, for example, Google Cloud (i.e. Platform Vertex AI) or Microsoft Azure
Experience with (Py)Spark to handle large datasets
Familiarity with DevOps & MLOps principles
M.Sc. or Ph.D. in Machine Learning, the natural sciences, or similar


To learn how we handle your personal data during the recruitment process, please review our Candidate Privacy Policy. This includes our Supplemental CCPA Notice of Collection where applicable.

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
About Prestatech

At Prestatech, we're redefining the financial world by fostering innovation and challenging the traditional banking system. Our culture is diverse, dynamic, and forward-thinking. From our offices in Berlin and Milan, we create cutting-edge API technologies in an inclusive environment where everyone can contribute their best work.

Founded in 2021 by Christian Nothacker, Luca Terragni, and Lorenzo Giusti, Prestatech combines document automation and proprietary technology to help financial institutions and B2B companies make quick, reliable, and inclusive credit decisions for SMEs and consumers.

When most people think of getting a loan or mortgage, they picture a slow and tedious process. Our mission is to simplify that through technology.

We‚Äôre a young and fast-growing company‚Äîbut this is our second venture. Before Prestatech, we founded and exited Prestacap, a lending platform for SMEs active in Italy and Germany.

We‚Äôre passionate about data and technology, never satisfied with the status quo, and believe that teamwork is key to achieving ambitious goals together.

To date, we have raised ‚Ç¨8 million, which is helping us bring more innovative solutions to market, expand operations in Italy, and launch in the UK, Germany, and the US..

We‚Äôre now looking for a Senior Data Scientist, someone with prior experience in fintech who is hands-on, outcome-driven, and deeply curious about solving business problems with data and AI.

You would be joining a flexible and dynamic team and your role will include:


selecting features, building and optimizing classifiers using machine learning techniques
processing, cleansing and verifying the integrity of data used for analysis
deep dive on the problems using SQL and scripting languages to drive solutions leveraging Statistical Analysis
implement and scale data pipelines and solutions using Big Data technologies
design, train, and deploy machine learning models and AI-based solutions for credit scoring, fraud detection, and other core financial applications.
collaborate closely with the development team to recommend and build innovations based on Data Science
own the process: identify and execute on high impact projects, triage external requests, and make sure you bring projects to conclusion in time for the results to be useful
leverage AI tools to achieve even better and faster results


Requirements:


6+ years of experience in Data Science, ideally in fintech or financial services
Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Mathematics or related field (MSc/PhD preferred)
Strong understanding of Big Data frameworks and cloud platforms.
Expertise in machine learning and AI techniques
Proficient in Python, with hands-on experience using Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn
Skilled in working with SQL/NoSQL databases
Experience with version control (Git) and writing clean, maintainable code
Experience with financial datasets, credit scoring, or risk modeling is a strong plus


Not sure you meet evert single requirement? Don‚Äôt worry ‚Äî if this role excites you and you believe you could be a good fit, we‚Äôd still love to hear from you. At Prestatech, we value potential, curiosity, and passion just as much as experience.

Benefits


Excellent compensation aligned with your experience and impact
A career path that allows you to take yourself to the next level
Ticket Restaurant
Annual training budget to help you grow and develop
2 days per week of Smart Working (+ 3 days at the office)
Flexible working arrangements, with the understanding that building a successful startup sometimes requires periods of focused, intense work
Bi-annual company offsites
a co-working office in one of the best district of Milan (Isola)


Recruitment Process:


HR Interview (30 minutes)
CTO Interview (45 minutes)
CEO Interview (30 minutes)


If you have any specific requirements or need accommodations during the recruitment process, please let us know ‚Äî we‚Äôre happy to support you.

At Prestatech, we actively embrace diversity and are committed to fostering a safe, inclusive, and welcoming workplace for everyone. Our recruitment process is free from discrimination of any kind ‚Äî including on the basis of race, national or ethnic origin, age, religion, disability, sex, gender identity, or sexual orientation.

With over 25 employees from more than 15 different countries, our diversity drives innovation, enriches our culture, and challenges us to consider multiple perspectives every day.

From our offices in Berlin and Milan, we create cutting-edge API technologies in an inclusive environment where everyone can contribute their best work.

Founded in 2021 by Christian Nothacker, Luca Terragni, and Lorenzo Giusti, Prestatech combines document automation and proprietary technology to help financial institutions and B2B companies make quick, reliable, and inclusive credit decisions for SMEs and consumers.

When most people think of getting a loan or mortgage, they picture a slow and tedious process. Our mission is to simplify that through technology.

We‚Äôre a young and fast-growing company‚Äîbut this is our second venture. Before Prestatech, we founded and exited Prestacap, a lending platform for SMEs active in Italy and Germany.

We‚Äôre passionate about data and technology, never satisfied with the status quo, and believe that teamwork is key to achieving ambitious goals together.

To date, we have raised ‚Ç¨8 million, which is helping us bring more innovative solutions to market, expand operations in Italy, and launch in the UK, Germany, and the US..

We‚Äôre now looking for a Senior Data Scientist, someone with prior experience in fintech who is hands-on, outcome-driven, and deeply curious about solving business problems with data and AI.

You would be joining a flexible and dynamic team and your role will include:

  • selecting features, building and optimizing classifiers using machine learning techniques
  • processing, cleansing and verifying the integrity of data used for analysis
  • deep dive on the problems using SQL and scripting languages to drive solutions leveraging Statistical Analysis
  • implement and scale data pipelines and solutions using Big Data technologies
  • design, train, and deploy machine learning models and AI-based solutions for credit scoring, fraud detection, and other core financial applications.
  • collaborate closely with the development team to recommend and build innovations based on Data Science
  • own the process: identify and execute on high impact projects, triage external requests, and make sure you bring projects to conclusion in time for the results to be useful
  • leverage AI tools to achieve even better and faster results

Requirements:

  • 6+ years of experience in Data Science, ideally in fintech or financial services
  • Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Mathematics or related field (MSc/PhD preferred)
  • Strong understanding of Big Data frameworks and cloud platforms.
  • Expertise in machine learning and AI techniques
  • Proficient in Python, with hands-on experience using Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn
  • Skilled in working with SQL/NoSQL databases
  • Experience with version control (Git) and writing clean, maintainable code
  • Experience with financial datasets, credit scoring, or risk modeling is a strong plus

Not sure you meet evert single requirement? Don‚Äôt worry ‚Äî if this role excites you and you believe you could be a good fit, we‚Äôd still love to hear from you. At Prestatech, we value potential, curiosity, and passion just as much as experience.

Benefits

  • Excellent compensation aligned with your experience and impact
  • A career path that allows you to take yourself to the next level
  • Ticket Restaurant
  • Annual training budget to help you grow and develop
  • 2 days per week of Smart Working (+ 3 days at the office)
  • Flexible working arrangements, with the understanding that building a successful startup sometimes requires periods of focused, intense work
  • Bi-annual company offsites
  • a co-working office in one of the best district of Milan (Isola)

Recruitment Process:

  • HR Interview (30 minutes)
  • CTO Interview (45 minutes)
  • CEO Interview (30 minutes)

If you have any specific requirements or need accommodations during the recruitment process, please let us know ‚Äî we‚Äôre happy to support you.

At Prestatech, we actively embrace diversity and are committed to fostering a safe, inclusive, and welcoming workplace for everyone. Our recruitment process is free from discrimination of any kind ‚Äî including on the basis of race, national or ethnic origin, age, religion, disability, sex, gender identity, or sexual orientation.

With over 25 employees from more than 15 different countries, our diversity drives innovation, enriches our culture, and challenges us to consider multiple perspectives every day.

Title: AI Engineer
Description:
Company description




Digital media, entertainment, and e-commerce brands are investing in AI, predictive analytics and personalization technologies to offer a digital experience that is unique to each consumer.




ContentWise is an industry pioneer in leveraging machine learning techniques to deliver bespoke digital customer experience for global brands such RAI, Telenor, Allente, Orange, United Cloud, Globo, Telecom Argentina, PCCW, and Telefonica.




ContentWise is a company of Moviri, a global software and professional services leader with long-standing relationships with hundreds of enterprise customers worldwide.




Founded in 2000, Moviri is today a multinational technology group with offices in Milan, Boston, Los Angeles, and Singapore.




Job Description




As a AI Engineer in the ContentWise team, you will be involved in a project related to:




Take the lead in tackling complex data science challenges, working independently to design and implement scalable, high-impact solutions.
Harness the power of AI: develop, train, and fine-tune machine learning models using cutting-edge techniques in Advanced Analytics, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, and Generative AI.
Own the data pipeline: collect, extract, and aggregate massive datasets using Big Data paradigms, transforming raw information into high-quality, validated insights.
Bring AI to life: deploy models seamlessly into production, ensuring they integrate smoothly with existing systems and deliver real-world value.
Push boundaries: optimize algorithms for peak performance, efficiency, and reliability, turning innovative ideas into game-changing solutions.




Full-time position at the Milan Office on Hybrid Mode.




Qualifications




If you share our passion for the Data & AI field and possess the following characteristics, we are waiting for you:




Master's degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Engineering, Physics or STEM related field;
Programming expertise in languages like Python, C++, Java, or R, with hands-on experience in software development and building scalable applications.
Experience in top-tier Data Science libraries: Pandas, Scikit-Learn, Keras, TensorFlow, Matplotlib, and fastAPI, to power AI-driven solutions.
Familiarity with software development best practices, including version control (GIT) and collaborative workflows like Agile.
An interest in learning and applying modern development techniques, such as Continuous Integration & Delivery (CI/CD), to streamline AI projects.
Experience with data management: skilled in SQL and NoSQL database programming to structure, query, and optimize large datasets efficiently.
Familiarity with cloud and big data technologies, including AWS, GCP, or Azure, as well as distributed computing frameworks like Hadoop and Spark.
Hands-on experience or strong interest with containerization and orchestration tools, such as Docker and Kubernetes, to automate, scale, and streamline AI deployments.
A passion for AI and Machine Learning: excited about developing and fine-tuning models in areas like Time Series Analysis, Clustering, Classification, Anomaly Detection, Computer Vision, NLP, and Generative AI.




Compensation & Benefits




Make a Real Impact joining ContentWise: we're on the lookout for dynamic individuals who want to be a driving force in their field, making a significant difference from day one.
Flexibility and Trust: from the moment you step in, you're not just an employee, but you're part of the team of talented colleagues. ContentWise value freedom and responsibility, giving you the autonomy to excel and contribute your best in Hybrid mode
Competitive Salary and Company Welfare: Your hard work deserves recognition! Enjoy a competitive salary that reflects your skills and dedication. As a part of our team, you'll also receive a company welfare package of ‚Ç¨600, useful for fuel, bills, as well as wellness and well-being!
Sustainability: in our office, you will always have access to fresh fruit thanks to Cortilia. In Moviri, we are committed to connecting conscious customers with local products and producers, all while prioritizing environmental and social responsibility.
Tech Your Way: choose your weapon in the tech battle! Whether you're team Mac or team Windows, we believe in equipping you with the tools that spark joy. After all, the only thing better than coding your next big idea is doing it on a laptop that suits your style!




Join our team




We cannot realize any of our ambitions or achieve any of our goals without the right talent. If this sounds like you, please apply now. It may be the start of your next chapter!

Title: Experienced ‚Äì Data Scientist GenAI
Description:
Stiamo cercando una figura Senior Consultant da inserire nel team Digital, AI Controls & Algorithms per le sedi di Roma e Milano che lavorer√† in modalit√† Hybrid.

Il business Digital, AI Controls & Algorithms si occupa di fornire servizi di Digital Transformation, che hanno l‚Äôobiettivo di supportare la digitalizzazione dei processi interni di business, mettendo in atto attivit√† che prevedono l‚Äôutilizzo di strumenti di Data Analytics, Machine Learning, IoT e AI sfruttando i principali servizi messi a disposizione dai pi√π importanti player del settore Cloud.

Your Role

La risorsa Experienced verr√† inserita in un team di lavoro e si occuper√† di:


Supervisionare, coordinare e gestire, come Team Leader, un team di sviluppo o consulenti junior;
Progettare ed analizzare soluzioni IT complesse sia di tipo applicativo che di integrazione;
Gestire autonomamente troubleshooting articolati e sotto pressione;
Lavorare in team numerosi dislocati anche su scala internazionale.


Winning Requirements


Laurea in materie STEM;
Esperienza nella gestione end-to-end di progetti di Data Science: raccolta requisiti, progettazione, sviluppo e test di soluzioni AI
Esperienza nello sviluppo di applicazioni di Generative AI (langchain, llamaindex, ecc.)
Ottima conoscenza di Python e delle librerie per manipolazione dati e sviluppo modelli (Pandas, TensorFlow, Scikit-learn, PyTorch, ecc.);
Esperienza con strumenti di containerizzazione (e.g. docker)
Conoscenza di strumenti e linguaggi per la manipolazione dei dati: SQL, MongoDB, Neo4j, Spark, ecc.
Ottima conoscenza della lingua inglese;
Flessibilit√†, disponibilit√† a viaggiare.


To Make An Impact That Matters

Il network Deloitte, leader nei servizi professionali alle imprese, opera a livello globale in pi√π di 150 Paesi con oltre 460 mila persone.

Title: Data Analyst/Scientist
Description:
STRAMONIUM S.R.L., in un'ottica di miglioramento continuo dei servizi offerti, ricerca una risorsa che possa ricoprire il ruolo di:




Data Analyst/Scientist




Responsabilit√† principali:

¬†

Trasformazione di dati complessi in analisi strategiche per identificare trend, pattern e insights utili al business.
Analisi dell‚Äôandamento del fatturato e individuazione di opportunit√† di crescita e tendenze di settore.
Creazione e presentazione di report e dashboard interattivi (Power BI, Tableau) per clienti e management.
Analisi e ottimizzazione dei processi interni, in collaborazione con team multidisciplinari (Business, IT, Management).
Utilizzo e collaudo di applicazioni AI e microservizi, con supporto alla progettazione di workflow automatizzati per l‚Äôestrazione, analisi e classificazione dei dati.
Integrazione con database e piattaforme gestionali interne/esterne, definendo regole e livelli di accesso ai dati.
Supporto al miglioramento continuo della data platform aziendale, implementando best practice e standard di settore.

¬†

Esperienza di almeno 2/3 anni in ruoli di Data Analyst o Data Scientist.
Conoscenza avanzata di Excel.
Padronanza di strumenti di analisi dati (SQL, Python, R).

Interesse per Advanced Analytics, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, IA.
Capacit√† di costruire strutture dati a supporto delle analisi.
Ottime capacit√† relazionali e di comunicazione, sia con interlocutori tecnici che business.
Conoscenza di EPCX o software analoghi.

Certificazioni in ambito Data Analysis (es. Microsoft Certified: Data Analyst Associate).
Conoscenza di metodologie Agile / Scrum.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
We are the platform turning browsing into shopping.

We connect 200 million shoppers with deals they love while boosting local sales for hundreds of top retailers and brands.

We help consumers save time and money while making smart shopping decisions, and we support retailers and brands in engaging customers from online research to in-store purchases.

Ready to spark your growth with us? üöÄ




WHO WE LOOK FOR ü¶Ñ

Every day our ingestion system receives more than 100 million events from our users.

As a Machine Learning Engineer, your mission is to elevate Retail with AI-Driven Solutions.




The final goals are to transform the retail strategy with our AI-powered platform, designed to curate the finest deals and streamline product discovery for consumers, and empower global marketing efforts with automation and personalised content that resonates with shoppers.




Since you will be working in a highly collaborative environment, you will cooperate with Data and Software Engineers, Data Scientists and Product Managers.




WHAT YOU WILL DO üèÑ

Your main responsibilities are linked to: Information Extraction and Enrichment from unstructured content, Data Platform activities (e.g., ETLs, ELTs), Multi Modal Extreme classification, Semantic Similarity in a Multi Modal setting and Recommendation systems.




Here some examples:

Autonomy to work on data pipelines, writing SQL queries; processing data using Pandas, Polars or Spark. Following good MLOps practices to develop and implement AI models in production environments, serving +100k predictions per day;
Design a novel solution, from the problem to the final deployment stage; Develop AI models to process organic unstructured content such as offer images or text to extract valuable data for our users or clients;
Manage, work on and improve the extensive Python codebases, following the company‚Äôs internal code style and guidelines;
Keep up with the pace in the AI space! We tackle hard problems, we make tangible impact, so every advancement in the field, whether it is a new architecture or an off-the-shelf open source model, can bring us and our clients a ton of value! We value knowledge and curiosity, a lot.




WHAT YOU WILL NEED ü™Ñ

Coding: Proficient Python knowledge; Proven experience with Pytorch, Pandas, FastAPI/Flask, HuggingFace models ecosystem. Software Engineering skills are as important as the AI-related ones;
MLOps : Fully autonomous in building the pipelines (data, modelling, deployment) to bring the AI solutions from experiments to production;
Natural Language Processing (NLP) and GenerativeAI: Advanced knowledge of neural network architectures such as Transformers, GPT and proven experience on developing projects in this area (text classification, Named entity recognition, caption generation, unstructured data extraction, etc);
Image and content: Solid Knowledge of neural architectures in the Computer Vision field, such as YOLO; Multi Modal Language Models or Vision Language Models. Proven experience on developing projects in this area (image classification, image-text search, image understanding, image captioning, etc);
Search: OpenSearch or ElasticSearch knowledge is a nice to have;
Recommending Systems: Good to have some proven experience (previous projects, academic works..) in building recommendation engines such as collaborative, content-based, knowledge based filtering based on custom deep learning models or available libraries like Surprise, LightFM, Implicit etc.




LOCATION üåê

We have offices in Milan, Naples, Bologna and Cagliari but you can take advantage of our flexible hybrid mode or decide to work full-remote .




WHAT YOU WILL FIND AT SHOPFULLY ü§ó

üåé An opportunity to thrive in a rapidly scaling multinational company

üï∂Ô∏è A vibrant, informal, and inclusive work environment

üß† We champion autonomy, flexibility, and a hybrid work model, empowering you to own your work

üìö Access to learning opportunities and regular feedback sessions

üçì Enjoy our central, modern offices featuring fresh snacks, coffee (including vegan options!), and ergonomic setups

üéâ Engage in meaningful team events: offsites, happy hours, company parties and celebrations that unite us beyond daily tasks

üíªWe provide all the necessary equipment for you to work effectively and set up your workspace, wherever you are

üß∞ Benefit from additional country-specific advantages based on local contracts and practices




WHO WE ARE üíú

We‚Äôre a team of 450 people (and counting!), from 30 different nationalities. We‚Äôre on a mission to innovate, and we believe the key to that is seeing the world through a variety of perspectives. That‚Äôs why building a more diverse team, as well as bringing in even more talent, is so important for us.




TO FEEL AT HOME üõãÔ∏è IN SHOPFULLY YOU NEED üéØ

AMBITION: we aim high, designing solutions that create real value. Success is tracked with clear metrics, long-term strategies evolve with changing needs;
TRUTH SEEKING: openness drives progress. We ask questions, share information freely, and embrace feedback to spark fresh ideas and continuous improvement;
COLLABORATION: great things happen together. We value diverse voices, celebrate contributions, and create a safe space for everyone to thrive;
SPEED: we move fast and work smart. Focusing on what matters, we balance speed with thoughtful execution‚Äîknowing when to act quickly and when to pause for critical decisions.













Shopfully will process your personal data for this application as indicated in the Privacy Notice pursuant to Arts. 13 and 14 of Regulation EU 2016/679 and that you can view here

Title: AI Engineer, Italy - BCG X
Description:
Who We Are

Boston Consulting Group partners with leaders in business and society to tackle their most important challenges and capture their greatest opportunities. BCG was the pioneer in business strategy when it was founded in 1963. Today, we help clients with total transformation-inspiring complex change, enabling organizations to grow, building competitive advantage, and driving bottom-line impact.

To succeed, organizations must blend digital and human capabilities. Our diverse, global teams bring deep industry and functional expertise and a range of perspectives to spark change. BCG delivers solutions through leading-edge management consulting along with technology and design, corporate and digital ventures‚Äîand business purpose. We work in a uniquely collaborative model across the firm and throughout all levels of the client organization, generating results that allow our clients to thrive.

We Are BCG X

We‚Äôre a diverse team of more than 3,000 tech experts united by a drive to make a difference. Working across industries and disciplines, we combine our experience and expertise to tackle the biggest challenges faced by society today. We go beyond what was once thought possible, creating new and innovative solutions to the world‚Äôs most complex problems. Leveraging BCG‚Äôs global network and partnerships with leading organizations, BCG X provides a stable ecosystem for talent to build game-changing businesses, products, and services from the ground up, all while growing their career. Together, we strive to create solutions that will positively impact the lives of millions.

What You'll Do

Our BCG X teams own the full analytics value-chain end to end: framing new business challenges, designing innovative algorithms, implementing, and deploying scalable solutions, and enabling colleagues and clients to fully embrace AI. Our product offerings span from fully custom-builds to industry specific leading edge AI software solutions.

Our AI Software Engineers and Senior AI Software Engineers are part of our rapidly growing engineering team and help to build the next generation of AI solutions. You‚Äôll have the chance to partner with clients in a variety of BCG regions and industries, and on key topics like climate change, enabling them to design, build, and deploy new and innovative solutions. Additional responsibilities will include developing and delivering thought leadership in scientific communities and papers as well as leading conferences on behalf of BCG X.

We Are Looking For Dedicated Individuals With a Passion For Software Development, Large-scale Data Analytics And Redefining Organizations Into AI Led Innovative Companies. Successful Candidates Possess The Following


Apply software development practices and standards to develop robust and maintainable software
Actively involved in every part of the software development process
Experienced at guiding non-technical teams and consultants in and best practices for robust software development
Optimize and enhance computational efficiency of algorithms and software design
Motivated by a fast-paced, service-oriented environment and interacting directly with clients on new features for future product releases
Enjoy collaborating in teams to share software design and solution ideas
A natural problem-solver and intellectually curious across a breadth of industries and topics
Fluency in both Italian and English


#BCGXjob

What You'll Bring

Requirements

Master‚Äôs or PhD degree program in Computer Research Science, Data Science, Statistics, Operations Research, or related field

Technologies


Programming: Python, Java/Scala
Frameworks/Libraries: TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn, Keras
Data Processing: NumPy, Pandas, Apache Spark, Dask
Cloud Platforms: AWS (SageMaker, EC2), GCP (AI Platform), Azure (ML Studio)
DevOps: Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Jenkins
Data Visualization: Matplotlib, Seaborn, Plotly/Dash, Tableau
Tools: Jupyter Notebooks, Google Colab, Git (GitHub/GitLab), MLflow, TensorBoard
Deployment: Flask, FastAPI, TensorFlow Serving, Streamlit


#BCGXjob

Boston Consulting Group is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity / expression, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected under national, provincial, or local law, where applicable, and those with criminal histories will be considered in a manner consistent with applicable state and local laws.

BCG is an E - Verify Employer. Click here for more information on E-Verify.

Title: Junior ‚Äì AI & RPA Developer Data analytics
Description:
Junior - AI & RPA Developer Data analytics

Stiamo cercando una figura junior da inserire nel team Smart Solutions Lab di Deloitte Business Solution nella sedi di Milano e Roma che lavorer√† in modalit√† Hybrid.

Smart Solutions Lab si occupa di supportare i nostri clienti nella individuazione di soluzioni e modelli finalizzati al miglioramento della produttivit√†, efficienza, qualit√† dei servizi offerti, anche con il supporto delle nuove tecnologie di AI, Robotics Process Automation e Data Visualization. All‚Äôinterno del team ci si impegna a definire l'avanguardia delle soluzioni aziendali attraverso l'uso innovativo di concetti di intelligenza artificiale, Robotics Process Automation (RPA) e Optical Character Recognition (OCR). Oltre all'automazione dei processi, una parte delle attivit√† produttive si concentra sulla creazione di dashboard avanzate in ambito analytics tramite l‚Äôutilizzo di strumenti come PowerBI o Qlik Sense. La Data Visualization √® cruciale per rendere i dati comprensibili, utili e facilmente fruibili da parte dei clienti.

Your Role

La risorsa Junior sar√† inserita in un team di lavoro, affiancando colleghi senior e occupandosi di:


Raccogliere, sintetizzare e analizzare dati complessi utilizzando strumenti e tecnologie appropriati;
Utilizzare efficientemente le principali tecnologie nell'analisi e progettazione dei processi aziendali end-to-end, dall'identificazione delle inefficienze (utilizzando tecniche quantitative e qualitative) alla progettazione e all'implementazione dei processi aziendali TO-BE;


Winning Requirements


Laurea in materie tecnico/scientifiche: Informatica, Ingegneria, Matematica, Fisica, Statistica
Disponibilit√† a viaggiare in Italia e all'estero
Confidenza con strumenti di Data Visualization (PowerBI, Qlik Sense, QlikView o Tableau)
Conoscenza base di strumenti di automazione robotica quali UiPath e BluePrism
Conoscenza del linguaggio SQL e utilizzo di SQL Server
Conoscenza di linguaggi per lo sviluppo web (HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, ASP.NET, node.js)
Esperienza nello sviluppo di APP su ambiente iOS e/o Android


To Make An Impact That Matters

Il network Deloitte, leader nei servizi professionali alle imprese, opera a livello globale in pi√π di 150 Paesi con oltre 460 mila persone.

In Italia, Deloitte √® presente in 24 citt√† con circa 13.400 persone che assistono i clienti offrendo servizi di Audit & Assurance, Technology & Transformantion, Strategy, Risk & Transactions Advisory e Tax & Legal.

In qualit√† di network globale ci impegniamo per affrontare le principali sfide sociali, economiche e ambientali della societ√† di oggi. WorldImpact √® il nostro programma globale che riunisce tutte le iniziative attraverso cui vogliamo avere un impatto positivo sulle persone, i clienti, l‚Äôambiente e le comunit√† in cui operiamo.

Con Impact for Italy, la declinazione italiana di WorldImpact, Deloitte ha realizzato progetti che ‚Äì in collaborazione con istituzioni, realt√† del terzo settore, universit√† e altri soggetti ‚Äì hanno lasciato un impatto concreto e una legacy per il futuro su tutto il territorio nazionale.

La ricerca rispetta il d.lgs. 198/2006, il D.lgs. 215/03 e il D.lgs. 216/03 ed √® aperta a candidat* di qualsiasi orientamento o espressione di genere, orientamento sessuale, et√†, etnia e credo religioso. Il presente annuncio √® stato ideato nel rispetto della diversity e dell‚Äôinclusivit√†.

Title: Lead Data Scientist
Description:
Lead Data Scientist / Data Science & Analytics Lead




At Koonei.com, we‚Äôre building the future of data-driven decision making for e-commerce and financial performance. As a fast-growing startup, we thrive on bold ideas, fast execution, and people who want to make an impact. We are a fast-growing company operating in the subscription sector, with high transaction volumes and advanced payment management.

We manage complex and dynamic cash flows, where monitoring and optimizing every cost item chargebacks, refunds, bank fees, operational and business costs, is essential for the sustainability and growth of the business.




We‚Äôre now looking for a Data Scientist / Data Science & Analytics Lead to join our team in Milan and take ownership of how we turn data into insight, action, and competitive advantage.




What You‚Äôll Do
Analyzing large volumes of transactional and financial data.
Developing predictive models to forecast future volumes, reduce chargebacks, and optimize refunds.
Defining and tracking critical KPIs (margins, churn, cash flow, cost per transaction, etc.).
Leading our internal development team by setting priorities and translating business needs into concrete technical requirements.
Overseeing the creation of an internal analytics CRM capable ‚Äî also with the help of AI ‚Äî of suggesting operational actions and data-driven strategies.
Translating data into clear, immediately actionable insights to support fast and focused decision-making.




What We‚Äôre Looking For
Degree in a quantitative field (Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, Engineering, or similar).
Solid experience in data science, predictive modeling, and machine learning.
Strong command of Python (pandas, scikit-learn, numpy, etc.) and SQL.
Experience with data visualization tools (e.g., Power BI, Tableau, Metabase).
Ability to manage projects and collaborate with development teams.
Strategic and results-oriented mindset, with a strong focus on costs, margins, and business performance.
Familiarity with AI-powered analytics and the ability to evaluate when and how to apply AI in business decision-making.




Nice to Have
Experience in subscription-based, fintech, or digital payments environments.
Knowledge of fraud detection systems and chargeback/refund management.
Familiarity with cloud environments (AWS, GCP, Azure).
Background in business process optimization.




Why Join Koonei
A competitive contract aligned with your experience and level of responsibility.
Direct impact on the future of a fast-growing startup.
Opportunities for professional growth and development in big data and AI applied to business.
A culture of collaboration, ownership, and innovation where your ideas matter.
On-site position in Milan, located near Piazza Gae Aulenti.




Ready to Build With Us?

If you‚Äôre excited by the idea of leading analytics in a high-impact role, we‚Äôd love to hear from you.

Title: Artificial Intelligence Researcher
Description:
Artificial Intelligence Researcher (LLM Fine-Tuning Specialist) - SOLOMEI AI




Solomei AI creates a new generation of websites, combining human creativity and advanced AI. Our platform leverages AI agents built on advanced AI technologies, enabling dynamic and effective content presentation. As we continue to grow, we're seeking talented individuals who are excited to innovate at the intersection of human creativity and artificial intelligence.




Complex Problems You‚Äôll Be Leading

Design, build, and maintain high-quality datasets specifically tailored for fine-tuning transformer-based LLMs (LLaMA, Mistral).
Develop and manage sophisticated fine-tuning pipelines (LoRA, QLoRA, PEFT), ensuring performance, scalability, and deployment efficiency.
Solve optimization challenges in fine-tuning, including parameter-efficient techniques and distillation strategies.




In This Role, You Will

Lead and implement advanced fine-tuning and distillation techniques (e.g., LoRA, QLoRA, adapter modules) on transformer architectures.
Oversee dataset quality assurance processes explicitly for transformer fine-tuning tasks.
Create rigorous evaluation frameworks to benchmark model accuracy, efficiency, and robustness post-fine-tuning.
Collaborate directly with GPU cloud providers to optimize LLM training and inference.
Collaborate with product teams, translating product goals into technical fine-tuning requirements.




You Are a Great Fit If You Have

Master or PhD or in Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, or related fields.
3+ years leading large-scale data initiatives, including pipeline architecture and quality assurance.
Proven expertise applying parameter-efficient fine-tuning techniques such as LoRA, QLoRA, PEFT, adapters, etc.
Advanced proficiency with PyTorch, Hugging Face, and cloud-based deployments.
Proven leadership and independent project management skills.

Show more

Title: Data Scientist ‚Äì Specialist in NLP e GenAI
Description:
Data Scientist ‚Äì Specialist in NLP e GenAI







Are you curious and ready to accept a new challenge in your career? Are you eager to join a dynamic company and bring innovation through your work and skills?

Prometeia offers you opportunities for growth and training in a Group with over 1000 professionals working for more than 500 clients in 20 countries around the world.

Prometeia is looking for professionals to join the team dedicated to Natural Language Processing (NLP) and the development of innovative solutions related to this technology. We are looking for candidates with advanced skills in software engineering and experience in NLP, Generative AI, Machine Learning and big data management.




ROLE AND RESPONSIBILITIES:




‚Ä¢ Development of Artificial Intelligence (AI) prototypes for real-time analysis of large amounts of data, with a focus on Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Generative AI services.

‚Ä¢ Collaboration with data engineers and researchers to implement solutions based on cutting-edge AI and NLP techniques

‚Ä¢ Designing and developing models for improving the efficiency and quality of analysed text data




EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE:




‚Ä¢ Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics or STEM disciplines

‚Ä¢ At least 3 years of experience in NLP and Machine Learning

‚Ä¢ Excellent software development skills, preferably in Python, and use of versioning systems (git)

‚Ä¢ Experience with NLP/ML tools and libraries such as scikit-learn, Spacy, HuggingFace, LangChain, LangGraph, OpenAI API

‚Ä¢ Knowledge of machine learning and NLP algorithms: classification, clustering, tokenization, parsing, embedding and chatbots (RAG and GraphRAG)

‚Ä¢ Familiarity with cloud computing platforms (preferably Microsoft Azure)

‚Ä¢ Ability to rapidly prototype solutions, critically analyse data and apply creative approaches in solving complex problems

‚Ä¢ Experience in managing NLP projects in agile contexts and with multidisciplinary teams




SOFT SKILLS

‚Ä¢ A problem-solver with a strong analytical mindset.

‚Ä¢ Exceptional communication skills and meticulous attention to detail.

‚Ä¢ A team player with excellent communication and collaboration skills.

‚Ä¢ Passionate about process innovation and driven by curiosity to understand and optimize business processes.




LOCATION:

Bologna/ Milano




WHAT WE OFFER:

COMPENSATION, WELFARE & BENEFIT

Our history, as well as the future, is based on the value of our people. The biggest investment at Prometeia is in our people, and it concerns every aspect of professional life. We call it 'Total Compensation' and is made up of Compensation - consisting of a fixed and a variable component -, an important Welfare Plan, active since 2015 ‚Äì we have been among the first to introduce it in Italy - and Benefits, which include all the initiatives undertaken for the well-being of our people.




REMOTE WORKING

Flexibility is an intrinsic value of the way we work. At Prometeia, smart working is an organizational method based on trust, which results in benefits in terms of work/life balance, impact on the environment and optimization of company results, through autonomy and empowerment of people.




PEOPLE PROGRAM

Our evaluation system is based on the full enhancement of people and their continuous dialogue as a stimulus for regular, mutual professional and personal growth. Transparent discussions between managers and team members are set up within the projects, where reciprocal and timely feedback is exchanged. The process is fully digitalized and aimed at continuously improving the development trajectory of the individual and the company.




TRAINING

Prometeia means ongoing training. We provide an average of 11 days of training per year to our people, in person and online. Particular attention is paid to younger colleagues, who are the protagonists of dedicated growth programs, and to the continuous sharing and internal transfer of know-how and skills. On-the-job training is also important, through immediate and direct confrontation with the market.




WIN/WIN POLICY

If you are one of our employees, and you recommend a person who is later recruited, you are entitled to a financial bonus! This is an important opportunity to contribute to the growth of Prometeia as a whole, by attracting acknowledged market professionals and new tech talents.




PHYGITAL MANAGEMENT

Through the dedicated app Pr(Home)teia, we have completely digitalized and integrated the management of our physical and virtual environments. Access to the office, smart working, workstations, meeting rooms, car pooling... everything is just a click away.




COMMUNITY

Our Community is extremely diverse, as are the skills of the people who are part of it and who share its values, and the individuals and organizations that are directly or indirectly involved in our activities. Clients, People of the Group, Alumni, Institutions, Academia, non-profit entities with which we actively collaborate, are stakeholders representing a great value for us, in terms of trust

and collaboration.




DIVERSITY

We promote and respect equal opportunities and consider differences as a value. Diversity & Inclusion are fundamental values: from the selection phase to everyday life, also through dedicated training moments to develop individual sensitivities and unicities.




IMPACT

We responsibly take an active role towards the environment, the territories and the communities in which we operate. Our Headquarter in Bologna has obtained the Leed Gold Certification, one of the highest awards that recognizes the performance of the building in terms of energy and water savings, reduction of CO2 emissions, improvement of the ecological quality of the interior, materials and resources used. In the Sustainability Report we report the results achieved within the 17 Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) of the 2030 Agenda that, drafted by the United Nations in 2016, we have been supporting since 2020.
