Title: Research and Development Scientist/Technician
Description:
Position: Research and Development Scientist/Technician

Our company, specialized in optical design, development of optical systems, and optical metrology, is looking for a motivated professional to join our Research and Development team to contribute to innovative projects.

Main requirements:

Bachelor‚Äôs degree or equivalent qualification, preferably in scientific or technical fields.
Strong skills in Python programming.
Good command of Microsoft Office suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint).
Good knowledge of English, both written and spoken.
Basic knowledge of physics and mathematics.
Specific knowledge in optics is a plus.

Job type:

Hybrid work mode with an office location in Italy (physical presence is not mandatory).
Full-time or part-time contract, preferably freelance (Partita IVA).
Compensation will be based on skills and experience.

We offer a dynamic and stimulating environment, with opportunities for professional growth and continuous training.

Please send your updated CV and cover letter to¬†tommaso.alterini@taoc.it.

You can also contact me on LinkedIn.

Best regards,

Tommaso Alterini

Position: Research and Development Scientist/Technician

Our company, specialized in optical design, development of optical systems, and optical metrology, is looking for a motivated professional to join our Research and Development team to contribute to innovative projects.

Main requirements:

  • Bachelor‚Äôs degree or equivalent qualification, preferably in scientific or technical fields.
  • Strong skills in Python programming.
  • Good command of Microsoft Office suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint).
  • Good knowledge of English, both written and spoken.
  • Basic knowledge of physics and mathematics.
  • Specific knowledge in optics is a plus.

Job type:

  • Hybrid work mode with an office location in Italy (physical presence is not mandatory).
  • Full-time or part-time contract, preferably freelance (Partita IVA).
  • Compensation will be based on skills and experience.

We offer a dynamic and stimulating environment, with opportunities for professional growth and continuous training.

Please send your updated CV and cover letter to tommaso.alterini@taoc.it.

You can also contact me on LinkedIn.

Best regards,

Tommaso Alterini

Title: AI Engineer
Description:
It‚Äôs time to level up!

Siamo Leviathan, una marketing company che unisce creativit√†, strategia e tecnologia per costruire soluzioni uniche e scalabili per i brand.

Crediamo nell‚ÄôAI non come moda, ma come leva concreta per semplificare processi e creare nuovi prodotti.

Per questo cerchiamo un* AI Engineer / Developer con cui dare vita a nuovi tool interni e prodotti proprietari. Partiremo insieme da prototipi rapidi (come il nostro Leviathan Estimator) per poi sviluppare piccole applicazioni headless e soluzioni integrate nei processi di marketing e business.




CHI SEI TU

Sei un* developer con passione per l‚ÄôAI e voglia di sporcarsi le mani su progetti reali.
Segui da vicino le novit√† del settore e ti entusiasma l‚Äôidea di sperimentare con modelli e API.
Ti piace costruire cose concrete: non solo slide, ma prototipi, tool e demo.
Sai bilanciare approccio tecnico e visione: capisci il ‚Äúperch√©‚Äù dietro ogni progetto.
Sei curioso, flessibile e a tuo agio in contesti dinamici e multidisciplinari.




COMPETENZE CHE CERCHIAMO

Solida base di programmazione (Python, JavaScript/TypeScript o simili).
Esperienza con API di AI (OpenAI, Anthropic, HuggingFace, ecc.).
Conoscenza di framework moderni per sviluppo web/app (es. Next.js, FastAPI, Flask, Node.js).
Abitudine a lavorare con integrazioni e servizi (es. Zapier, Make, webhooks).
Conoscenza di database (SQL o NoSQL) e di architetture serverless/cloud.




PLUS

Esperienza in ML ops, fine-tuning di modelli o vector databases (es. Pinecone, Weaviate).
Competenze in UX / UI o capacit√† di prototipare interfacce base.
Conoscenza di data engineering e pipeline di automazione.
Background in marketing tech o sviluppo di prodotti SaaS




COSA FARAI CON NOI

Svilupperai e testerai nuovi tool AI interni ed esterni (da prototipi rapidi a piccoli prodotti headless).
Trasformerai idee in MVP funzionanti pronti per essere validati su clienti e team.
Collaborerai con strategisti, designer e performance specialist per integrare l‚ÄôAI nei processi.
Documenterai e migliorerai i flussi, rendendo i prodotti scalabili e manutenibili.
Avrai voce attiva nella roadmap dei prodotti AI di Leviathan.




COSA OFFRIAMO

Opportunit√† di lavorare su progetti unici, tra creativit√† e tecnologia.
Spazio per sperimentare con API, modelli e framework all‚Äôavanguardia.
Formazione continua e accesso a tool AI premium.
Un ambiente giovane, dinamico e orientato al risultato.
Possibilit√† di lavorare ibrido (sede a Caronno Pertusella - VA).
Frutta, acqua e zero ansia da meeting üçâ




üì© Vuoi entrare in squadra?

Inviaci un progetto, repo GitHub, demo o anche solo un prototipo AI che racconti chi sei e cosa sai fare.

Title: Sviluppatore Python
HTML:
Per il potenziamento della nostra struttura, siamo alla ricerca di un Programmatore Python.


Il contratto, il livello e la retribuzione saranno definiti in fase di colloquio.


La sede di lavoro √® Milano, la modalit√† di lavoro sar√† ibrida, (2 o 3 giorni presso la sede del cliente ed il resto in smartworking).


Il candidato ideale √® in possesso di una solida esperienza di almeno 3 anni nell'utilizzo di Python per lo sviluppo di soluzioni software e analitiche, in grado di gestire l‚Äôintero ciclo di vita della realizzazione del prodotto analitico, dal prototipo alla messa in produzione


Il candidato ideale √® in possesso delle seguenti conoscenze ed esperienze:

  • conoscenza ottima del linguaggio Python; nello specifico: creazione di moduli e pacchetti, programmazione orientata agli oggetti e definizione e scrittura di test unitari;
  • conoscenza nell‚Äôutilizzo delle principali librerie Python orientate alla visualizzazione, all‚Äôaccesso, alla manipolazione e in generale all'analisi dei dati, (es: Pandas, Numpy, Scipy, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Scikit-learn, Statsmodels, SQLalchemy, Alembic);
  • conoscenza ed esperienza nell‚Äôutilizzo di database relazionali (PostgreSQL, MySQL);
  • conoscenza del sistema di visualizzazione e dashboarding PowerBI (preferito), e/o tecnologie di reportistica analoghe (Qlik, Tableau), (gradita);
  • esperienza nell'utilizzo dell'architettura Cloud AWS e principali servizi annessi, (gradita).


Completano il profilo:

  • Laurea e/o Diploma in discipline tecnico-scientifiche;
  • buona conoscenza della lingua inglese, sia scritta che parlata.


Se interessati, inviate il Vostro Curriculum Vitae aggiornato e dettagliato che dovr√† contenere autorizzazione al trattamento dei dati secondo l'articolo 13 GDPR679/16 a: paola.riccardi@atoninformatica.it .

L‚Äôazienda

beSharp, AWS Premier Partner, √® la specialista italiana del Cloud.

Il team di esperti con +140 certificazioni, si occupa della definizione della Cloud Adoption Strategy, dell‚Äôimplementazione di infrastrutture scalabili, dello sviluppo di piattaforme e applicativi Cloud Native e della realizzazione di progetti di Data Monetization attraverso tecnologie di AI e ML.

scouting e fine tuning di modelli per applicazioni specifiche.

Hai una buona base in ambito AI e di sviluppo software e sei affascinato dal mondo del cloud e dell‚Äôautomazione.

Requisiti Richiesti Per La Posizione


1-4 anni di esperienza in ruoli simili o un solido background teorico e la voglia di crescere in questo ambito.
Buona conoscenza di Python e delle principali librerie di data science (es. Pandas, scikit-learn).
Familiarit√† con i principi di Continuous Integration e Continuous Delivery.
Conoscenza delle metodologie agili e dei principi DevOps.
Buone capacit√† comunicative (italiano fluente, inglese almeno B2).


Nice To Have


Esperienza con lo sviluppo e il deploy di applicazioni cloud-native su AWS.
Conoscenza di base dei database SQL (es. PostgreSQL, MySQL) e/o NoSQL (es. MongoDB).
Conoscenza dei tool di infrastructure provisioning e infrastructure-as-code (es. Terraform, CloudFormation).

Contratto CCNL Commercio ‚Äì 14 mensilit√† tempo indeterminato
RAL con forbice 28-45k in base alla seniority
Apple MacBook Pro Portatile di ultima generazione e postazione attrezzata

Welfare 100‚Ç¨ netti/mese + bonus figli
Corsi di inglese gratuiti

Possibilit√† di sedute gratuite di psicoterapia
Certificazioni AWS pagate dall‚Äôazienda
Un‚Äôora al giorno di formazione per la tua crescita professionale
Performance e salary review


Come lavoriamo

In beSharp crediamo nello scambio di idee e nella condivisione di conoscenza a tutti i livelli.

Crediamo che condividere la quotidianit√† all‚Äôinterno di un ambiente stimolante possa fare la differenza per la crescita personale e professionale di ciascuno di noi.

Per questo, lavoriamo in presenza, ma con ampissima flessibilit√† e con possibilit√† di concordare una formula ibrida ‚Äì fino al 60% di lavoro da remoto ‚Äì in base a specifiche esigenze (chilometraggio, motivi familiari, ‚Ä¶).

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
About Us

With over 85 million global active users and 2,5 million transactions per day, Klarna is on the way to becoming the world‚Äôs favorite way to shop. To help us get there, we‚Äôre assembling an unparalleled global talent team‚Äîaccelerating individual careers, and disrupting entire industries. We‚Äôre looking for people ready to achieve the extraordinary and embrace our bold ambitions as we shape the future of payments and fintech. Will you join us?

What You'll Do

End-to-End Model Ownership: Design, develop, and ship production-grade machine learning models. You will have the autonomy to own your solutions, considering everything from memory footprint to latency.

Research and Innovation: Dive deep into statistical analysis, probability, and machine learning/deep learning models. You'll be expected to critically evaluate existing solutions and, when necessary, develop novel approaches. A foundational understanding of NLP architectures like Transformers is a plus.

Engineering: Build and maintain containerized models and develop comprehensive model monitoring solutions to track metrics like variable drift.

Streamlined Deployment: Create and manage CI/CD pipelines for our machine learning models and contribute to the design and development of APIs.

Data Expertise: Utilize your SQL proficiency to perform in-depth data analysis and feature engineering.

Requirements

Proficient Software Engineering Skills: A strong track record of designing, developing, and deploying ML models in a production environment. Experience with deploying models on Scoring Platform is highly desirable.

Expertise: High proficiency in Python.

Strong Quantitative Foundation: A deep understanding of statistical analysis, probability, and a wide range of machine learning and deep learning models.

MLOps Experience: Hands-on experience with containerization (Docker), CI/CD pipelines, and model monitoring.

API & Containers: Experience in API schema design and development and in building containerized applications (e.g., using Docker)

Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills.

Experience working with consumer or partner Fraud Detection/Credit Underwriting would be a plus.

Ideally, You Have

An academic background in Physics, ML, Data Science, Mathematics, or Biology

Prior experience as a Senior Data Scientist, ideally within a regulated environment or fintech context

Please include a CV in English.

Since 2005, Klarna has been on a mission to reimagine how consumers spend and save in their daily lives. We help people save time and money and reduce financial worry. With over 85 million global active users and 2.5 million transactions per day, our vision is a world where Klarna empowers everyone, everywhere, through seamless financial and commerce experiences‚Äîas a personalized, trusted assistant making financial empowerment effortless.

Over 575,000 global retail partners, including H&M, Saks, Sephora, Macys, IKEA, Expedia Group, and Nike have integrated Klarna's innovative technology to deliver a seamless shopping experience online and in-store.

Stiamo cercando una figura Junior da inserire nella sede di Milano, che lavorer√† in modalit√† Hybrid.

Il business si occupa di accompagnare le aziende nel percorso di trasformazione digitale, supportandole nella progettazione e implementazione di soluzioni innovative basate su tecnologie emergenti.

Your Role

La risorsa Junior sar√† inserita in un team di lavoro, affiancando colleghi senior e occupandosi di:

  • Supportare la progettazione e l‚Äôimplementazione di soluzioni digitali per clienti nazionali in ambito Financial Services;
  • Collaborare a progetti su tecnologie emergenti come cybersecurity, cloud computing, data analytics, AI/ML, blockchain, ERP (SAP, Oracle);

Winning Requirements

To Make An Impact That Matters

Il network Deloitte, leader nei servizi professionali alle imprese, opera a livello globale in pi√π di 150 Paesi con oltre 460 mila persone.

In Italia, Deloitte √® presente in 24 citt√† con circa 13.400 persone che assistono i clienti offrendo servizi di Audit & Assurance, Technology & Transformantion, Strategy, Risk & Transactions Advisory e Tax & Legal.

In qualit√† di network globale ci impegniamo per affrontare le principali sfide sociali, economiche e ambientali della societ√† di oggi. WorldImpact √® il nostro programma globale che riunisce tutte le iniziative attraverso cui vogliamo avere un impatto positivo sulle persone, i clienti, l‚Äôambiente e le comunit√† in cui operiamo.

Con Impact for Italy, la declinazione italiana di WorldImpact, Deloitte ha realizzato progetti che ‚Äì in collaborazione con istituzioni, realt√† del terzo settore, universit√† e altri soggetti ‚Äì hanno lasciato un impatto concreto e una legacy per il futuro su tutto il territorio nazionale.

La ricerca rispetta il d.lgs. 198/2006, il D.lgs. 215/03 e il D.lgs. 216/03 ed √® aperta a candidat* di qualsiasi orientamento o espressione di genere, orientamento sessuale, et√†, etnia e credo religioso. Il presente annuncio √® stato ideato nel rispetto della diversity e dell‚Äôinclusivit√†.

Title: Candidatura spontanea
Description:
Chi Siamo

BDO √® una societ√† di consulenza e servizi professionali che da oltre 50 anni affianca imprese di ogni dimensione, dalle piccole e medie aziende ai grandi gruppi internazionali, fino a investitori privati e istituzioni pubbliche. Con una forte presenza in 164 paesi e pi√π di 1.300 professionisti in Italia, la nostra azienda offre soluzioni integrate e personalizzate per ottimizzare la performance aziendale e affrontare le sfide di un mercato in continua evoluzione. Il nostro impegno √® quello di contribuire al successo delle aziende con cui collaboriamo, offrendo al paese un modello di crescita sostenibile.

Perch√© dovresti unirti a noi?

In BDO siamo quality seekers, client supporters, team believers & passion promoters: ci guidano valori forti che rendono la nostra cultura unica. Siamo sempre alla ricerca della qualit√†, ci impegniamo a supportare i nostri clienti con soluzioni innovative e durature, crediamo fermamente nel potere del team e promuoviamo la passione in ogni aspetto del nostro lavoro.

Se desideri crescere in un ambiente che promuove l'eccellenza, la qualit√† e la collaborazione, questa √® l'opportunit√† giusta per te!

Inoltre, In BDO Troverai


Opportunit√† di crescita unica: Offriamo percorsi di carriera disegnati sulle tue ambizioni, con possibilit√† di specializzarti o di crescere in ruoli manageriali.
Un ambiente inclusivo e flessibile: Siamo una realt√† che promuove un ambiente di lavoro inclusivo, che valorizza la diversit√† e garantisce un equilibrio tra vita professionale e privata.
Sostegno e sviluppo continuo: Sarai guidato da un Buddy nei tuoi primi giorni di lavoro e supportato da un People Coach che ti aiuter√† a sviluppare il tuo potenziale, offrendoti consulenze personalizzate e opportunit√† di crescita. La formazione continua √® parte integrante della nostra cultura, con corsi tecnici e valutazioni periodiche delle performance.
Iniziative per il tuo benessere: Offriamo il programma di welfare aziendale BDO FOR YOU, che include convenzioni sanitarie, supporto psicologico e nutrizionale, sconti su attivit√† e servizi, e tanto altro per il tuo benessere fisico, mentale ed economico. Nei nostri uffici troverai inoltre sempre frutta fresca, per promuovere uno stile di vita sano!


Qual √® il nostro iter di selezione solitamente?

In BDO, puntiamo sulla trasparenza: nel caso in cui il tuo profilo dovesse essere allineato a una ricerca aperta, dopo un primo contatto telefonico, seguir√† un colloquio con i nostri HRBP per approfondire.

Se questo primo step sar√† positivo, seguir√† uno o due colloqui con i Line Manager per valutare le tue competenze tecniche.

BDO is an Equal Opportunity Employer, il presente annuncio garantisce le pari opportunit√†. I candidati con l'invio del loro curriculum autorizzano BDO al trattamento dei dati ai sensi della vigente normativa.

La Societ√†, nella sua qualit√† di Titolare del trattamento, informa il candidato circa il fatto che l'inoltro della candidatura per la posizione lavorativa di cui al suindicato annuncio costituisce autorizzazione al trattamento dei propri dati personali e, per l'effetto, invita il candidato medesimo a prendere visione dell'informativa sul trattamento dei dati personali ex art. 13 del Reg. UE n. 2016/679, scaricabile al seguente link: urly.it/31468_

Title: Data Science Engineer, AI Lab
Description:
About Permira

Permira is a global investment firm that backs successful businesses with growth ambitions. Founded in 1985, the firm advises funds across two core asset classes, private equity and credit, with total committed capital of approximately ‚Ç¨80bn. The Permira private equity funds make both long-term majority (Buyout) and minority (Growth Equity) investments in four key sectors: Technology, Consumer, Healthcare, Services. The Permira credit funds support businesses with flexible financing solutions across Direct Lending, Strategic Opportunities and CLO Management. Established in 2007, the firm advises investment funds and products which have provided approximately ‚Ç¨20 billion of debt capital to over 300 businesses.

Role Overview

We are seeking an individual to join our AI Lab which sits within our Technology Value Creation Team. Our portfolio includes many of the world‚Äôs leading software and tech-enabled companies with landmark technology investments including Zendesk, Mimecast, Informatica, Squarespace, McAfee, and many more. You can learn more about our portfolio here: https://www.permira.com/portfolio

This team will be a central entity that develops and deploys machine learning capabilities across Permira, collaborating with our teams and sectors. At Permira, AI is not just another IT initiative‚Äîit‚Äôs a fundamental shift in how we work, think, and operate. We are committed to embedding AI deeply into the fabric of our products and workflows‚Äînot merely as an add-on, but as a reimaging of what our offerings can be in an AI-native world.

Our strategy focuses on identifying a few high-impact, needle-moving use cases where AI can drive measurable value. The focus of the AI Lab will be first internal use cases, to deploy AI to make better and faster investment decisions, and secondly to the portfolio, supporting Permira portfolio companies on specific AI initiatives. Our goal with the AI Lab is encourage our teams and portfolio companies to be truly AI-native and drive tangible impact with faster innovation velocity, streamlined revenue efficiency, and deliberate cost savings.

This is a hands-on role, where you will spend most of your time developing in Python together with our team of Data Scientists (DSs) and Machine Learning Engineers (MLEs). You will also be interfacing directly with subject matter experts and stakeholders, e.g. to evaluate the feasibility of potential DS use cases or to explain how your model works during a Team Review.

This role is based in Permira‚Äôs Milan office, and you will be part of a geographically distributed team (UK/US/Europe) that embraces remote and hybrid collaboration.

Key Responsibilities


(Develop & ship models) Develop and maintain ML models for a range of use cases at Permira. Ensure these models smoothly reach production and bring measurable value to our stakeholders
(Analysis) Perform efficient exploratory data analysis (EDA) and present key insights to colleagues & stakeholders
(Best practices) Adopt best practices and standards for the development of robust ML models
(MLOps) Collaborate closely with MLEs to prepare your code & model for production using our ML Platform
(Project start-up) Help evaluate the feasibility of new use cases for ML


What We‚Äôre Looking For

We are looking for a high-performing, analytically sharp, and emotionally intelligent professional who thrives at the intersection of AI, business transformation, and investment. Ideal candidates will have:


2-5 years‚Äô experience in data science and machine learning, including the development of models that successfully went to production
You are an expert in using applied ML on structured data, in particular regression and classification problems
You have basic experience with Generative AI, both large language models (LLMs) and embedding models, especially leveraging GenAI in non-chat applications
You approach complex problems in a structured way, always looking for the simplest, pragmatic solutions
You understand the technical and non-technical constraints of a business problem
You are detail-oriented but can also quickly shift priorities if required
You enjoy working collaboratively in a cross-functional & distributed team environment
You have great presentation skills and can communicate to a wide variety of audiences
You have a strong foundation in statistics
You have solid software engineering skills and love coding in Python
You know your way around a linux shell and are comfortable with Git for version control.
You know the scikit-learn API inside and out
You are comfortable in an agile Way of Working, with Scrum or similar frameworks
A strong cultural fit with Permira‚Äîteam-first, intellectually curious, low-ego, and entrepreneurial


Nice To Have


Experience with native AI suites, for example, Google Cloud (i.e. Platform Vertex AI) or Microsoft Azure
Experience with (Py)Spark to handle large datasets
Familiarity with DevOps & MLOps principles
M.Sc. or Ph.D. in Machine Learning, the natural sciences, or similar


To learn how we handle your personal data during the recruitment process, please review our Candidate Privacy Policy. This includes our Supplemental CCPA Notice of Collection where applicable.

Title: Junior ‚Äì Monitor Deloitte
Description:

Your Role

Strategic Transformation & Innovation: supporto nella definizione di strategie innovative e sostenibili di business transformation volte alla creazione di valore delle aziende clienti con l‚Äôobiettivo di ottimizzare il proprio portafoglio prodotti, adottando un approccio orientato alla differenziazione;
Customer Strategy: supporto nella definizione e realizzazione di strategie e processi di trasformazione dei modelli di marketing, customer management e pricing;
Digital Strategy: supporto nella definizione di strategie orientate alla digital transformation;
M&A Strategy: supporto nella gestione dell‚Äôintero processo di M&A, dalla definizione della strategia fino alla selezione del giusto partner passando per la conduzione di una commercial due diligence approfondita, fino alla chiusura del deal e alla relativa gestione del programma di integrazione.


Winning Requirements


Laurea Magistrale conseguita oppure a massimo 6 mesi dal suo conseguimento
Esperienza da 0 a 1 anni in societ√† di consulenza strategica
Brillante percorso accademico in ambito: Economico, Ingegneristico, Informatico, Fisico, Matematico o Statistico
Esperienza pregressa in contesti internazionali
Ottimo livello di inglese


Make An Impact That Matters

Deloitte √® un network leader nei servizi professionali alle imprese, presente in oltre 150 Paesi con 457 mila professionisti. Offriamo soluzioni innovative e sostenibili in Audit & Assurance, Consulting, Financial Advisory, Risk Advisory, Tax e Legal. Il nostro obiettivo √® supportare le aziende nello sviluppo e nell'implementazione di strategie al passo con il mercato.

In Deloitte la sostenibilit√† √® un tema centrale. Per questo, attraverso le strategie e le progettualit√† legate alle tematiche Environmental, Social e Governance (ESG), ci impegniamo a promuovere una crescita responsabile, sostenibile e inclusiva per il Pianeta, le nostre persone e la societ√†. Scopri di pi√π sulle nostre strategie di Corporate Sustainability, tra cui Well-being, la strategia volta a migliorare il benessere fisico, mentale e sociale delle nostre persone, affinch√© siano felici e piene di energia in tutti gli ambiti della loro vita e WorldClimate, la strategia globale di Deloitte per diventare un‚Äôorganizzazione Net Zero e per guidare scelte responsabili all‚Äôinterno e all‚Äôesterno dell‚Äôorganizzazione.

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Data Scientist




Are you curious and ready to accept a new challenge in your career? Are you eager to join a dynamic company and bring innovation through your work and skills?




Prometeia offers you opportunities for growth and training in a Group with over 1000 professionals working for more than 500 clients in 20 countries around the world.




RESPONSIBILITIES:




‚óè Analyze large volumes of structured and unstructured data in banking and insurance, identifying useful patterns and insights to support business processes and decisions.

‚óè Design, develop and implement advanced machine learning, data mining and statistical models to solve complex problems in finance.

‚óè Collaborate in cross-functional teams to define project requirements and propose innovative solutions.

‚óè Contribute to the development of proprietary frameworks and algorithms to improve the performance of solutions offered to our clients.

‚óè Present complex results to technical and non-technical stakeholders, making analysis results understandable.

‚óè Support customers in implementing solutions, ensuring knowledge transfer and customization.




REQUIREMENTS:




‚óè Experience in data wrangling, cleaning, exploration and feature extraction.

‚óè Excellent knowledge of Python and the most important analytical libraries.

‚óè Knowledge of statistics, Machine Learning and major clustering, classification and regression algorithms

‚óè Advanced knowledge of statistical techniques, predictive modeling with the application of Machine Learning models, and data analysis.

‚óè Ability to creatively solve complex problems and propose innovative solutions.

‚óè Ability to rapidly prototype ideas/solutions with a critical/experimental approach to data analysis.

‚óè Good communication skills and ability to translate technical results into insights for non-experts.

‚óè Aptitude for teamwork, with strong orientation toward interdisciplinary collaboration.

‚óè At least one year of working experience in applied ML projects.




EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE:

‚óè Master's degree or PhD with excellent grades in Data Science, Statistics, Physics, Mathematics, Computer Science, or related fields




NICE TO HAVE:

‚óè Experience with code versioning systems (git).

‚óè Experience in Pyspark development and working in big data platforms.

‚óè Knowledge of at least one major cloud environment (Azure, GCP, AWS).

‚óè Experience in processing and modeling with unstructured data (Text Analytics, Computer Vision)




SOFT SKILLS:

A problem-solver with a strong analytical mindset.
Exceptional communication skills and meticulous attention to detail.
A team player with excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Passionate about process innovation and driven by curiosity to understand and optimize business processes.







LOCATION:

Milan




WHAT WE OFFER:

COMPENSATION, WELFARE & BENEFIT

Our history, as well as the future, is based on the value of our people. The biggest investment at Prometeia is in our people, and it concerns every aspect of professional life. We call it 'Total Compensation' and is made up of Compensation - consisting of a fixed and a variable component -, an important Welfare Plan, active since 2015 ‚Äì we have been among the first to introduce it in Italy - and Benefits, which include all the initiatives undertaken for the well-being of our people.




REMOTE WORKING

Flexibility is an intrinsic value of the way we work. At Prometeia, smart working is an organizational method based on trust, which results in benefits in terms of work/life balance, impact on the environment and optimization of company results, through autonomy and empowerment of people.




PEOPLE PROGRAM

Our evaluation system is based on the full enhancement of people and their continuous dialogue as a stimulus for regular, mutual professional and personal growth. Transparent discussions between managers and team members are set up within the projects, where reciprocal and timely feedback is exchanged. The process is fully digitalized and aimed at continuously improving the development trajectory of the individual and the company.




TRAINING

Prometeia means ongoing training. We provide an average of 11 days of training per year to our people, in person and online. Particular attention is paid to younger colleagues, who are the protagonists of dedicated growth programs, and to the continuous sharing and internal transfer of know-how and skills. On-the-job training is also important, through immediate and direct confrontation with the market.




WIN/WIN POLICY

If you are one of our employees, and you recommend a person who is later recruited, you are entitled to a financial bonus! This is an important opportunity to contribute to the growth of Prometeia as a whole, by attracting acknowledged market professionals and new tech talents.




PHYGITAL MANAGEMENT

Through the dedicated app Pr(Home)teia, we have completely digitalized and integrated the management of our physical and virtual environments. Access to the office, smart working, workstations, meeting rooms, car pooling... everything is just a click away.




COMMUNITY

Our Community is extremely diverse, as are the skills of the people who are part of it and who share its values, and the individuals and organizations that are directly or indirectly involved in our activities. Clients, People of the Group, Alumni, Institutions, Academia, non-profit entities with which we actively collaborate, are stakeholders representing a great value for us, in terms of trust and collaboration.




DIVERSITY

We promote and respect equal opportunities and consider differences as a value. Diversity & Inclusion are fundamental values: from the selection phase to everyday life, also through dedicated training moments to develop individual sensitivities and unicities.




IMPACT

We responsibly take an active role towards the environment, the territories and the communities in which we operate. Our Headquarter in Bologna has obtained the Leed Gold Certification, one of the highest awards that recognizes the performance of the building in terms of energy and water savings, reduction of CO2 emissions, improvement of the ecological quality of the interior, materials and resources used. In the Sustainability Report we report the results achieved within the 17 Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) of the 2030 Agenda that, drafted by the United Nations in 2016, we have been supporting since 2020.

Title: Python Developer
Description:
üöÄAbout Ampcontrol

Ampcontrol is building AI-powered software for optimizing electric vehicle (EV) fleet charging.

We are a venture backed hybrid team of engineers and energy experts based in Europe, the U.S.A., Canada and South America, building the new way of EV charging. Our primary goal is to enable a simple, reliable & cost efficient transition to zero emission vehicles for fleet operators.

Our company culture includes minimal hierarchy; We make technical decisions based on consensus and aim at simplicity and clarity.

Read more about us on our website: https://ampcontrol.io/

üåé Our Mission

We're on a mission to speed up the transition of the automotive and logistic industries to electric fleets and vehicles.

We believe in a future of self-managing, reliable and affordable charging for companies, fleet operators and humans on our planet.

üíª The Role

You will be:


Building, improving and operating our Python backend, including RabbitMQ, PostgreSQL, TimescaleDB, Redis, asynchronous services and customer facing APIs with FastAPI
Collaborating with our DevOps team to improve and extend our GCP deployment
Maintaining and improving our extensive test suite, including end-to-end-, BDD-, integration- and unit tests
Learning in-depth the EV charging domain, relevant specifications, standards and integrations
Working with our data science team to build real-time optimization and AI solutions
Investigating, troubleshooting complex backend issues, make performance improvements and mitigate scalability challenges
Building, maintaining and migrating databases and accommodate time-series data
Contributing to our AI-driven development process by following established dos and don'ts
Onboard to our innovative edge server project, learning about ModBus, MQTT and secure websocket protocols


üìç Location

We're a hybrid team. You can work from Europe, the United States, Canada, or South America, with in-office options in New York, and Erlangen, Germany.

Requirements


You can apply at all levels, but you have at least 2 years of full-time work experience with a software stack similar to ours
You can elaborate on why you love Python, its ecosystem and components present in our tech stack
You are confident in your Python coding skills to produce clean, well-tested and idiomatic code and learn fast on the job when necessary
You have hands-on experience with at least one cloud computing platform
You have a good understanding of DevOps tools and methods
You can communicate in English with clarity about complex technical topics
You are motivated to work in the EV and sustainability domain
You understand the differences between types of databases and you are comfortable with at least SQL schema design, indexes and migrations
You appreciate our flat hierarchy, collaborative work environment and understand why we prioritize helping each other first


Benefits


Internationally competitive salary
Equity incentive plans
Parental leave and generous PTO
Healthcare and dental plans
Global offsites
Personal growth plan and mentoring


Please note: We're flexible in how we work together. This role can be set up as a contract position, or you can be hired through our Employer of Record (EOR) partner, or directly through our US entity, depending on your location and preference.

Title: RICERCA TECNICO DI LABORATORIO - Centro MeticaLAB
Description:
La posizione richiesta di Tecnico di Laboratorio Analisi Cliniche √® riferita al laboratorio sito in Paderno Dugnano (Milano)

La risorsa selezionata sar√† inserita all'interno del laboratorio analisi MeticaLAB e si occuper√† di eseguire le analisi garantendo l'affidabilit√† dei risultati nel rispetto dei protocolli e delle normative vigenti.

Nello specifico: preparazione, gestione ed esecuzione dei test di laboratorio sui campioni; Utilizzo e manutenzione ordinaria degli strumenti diagnostici; Registrazione, analisi e validazione dei risultati; Collaborazione con il personale sanitario per la gestione dei referti; Rispetto delle procedure di qualit√† e sicurezza del laboratorio.

Laurea triennale in Tecniche di Laboratorio Biomedico
Iscrizione all'Albo dei Tecnici Sanitari di Laboratorio Biomedico.

Esperienza pregressa in laboratorio analisi cliniche

Title: Brand Trainee Heineken
Description:
BRAND TRAINEE HEINEKEN

CHI SIAMO

Da oltre 50 anni HEINEKEN √® leader del settore birrario in Italia, con una quota di mercato del 33,3% e oltre 2.000 collaboratori su tutto il territorio nazionale. Produciamo pi√π di 6 milioni di ettolitri di birra ogni anno nei nostri quattro birrifici situati a Comun Nuovo (BG), Pollein (AO), Massafra (TA) e Assemini (CA), a cui si aggiunge il contributo fondamentale di Partesa, la nostra rete di distribuzione e servizi dedicata al canale Ho.Re.Ca.

Grazie a una solida identit√† locale e una presenza globale, HEINEKEN unisce innovazione e tradizione, producendo un impatto positivo sulle comunit√† in cui opera.

In HEINEKEN promuoviamo un ambiente di lavoro inclusivo, collaborativo e stimolante, valorizzando le persone attraverso percorsi di crescita, formazione, welfare e opportunit√† di lavoro flessibile.

Abbracciare e celebrare la diversit√† √® fondamentale per il Purpose di HEINEKEN: " Creare il piacere di stare insieme per ispirare un mondo migliore ". Riteniamo che le persone, diverse come le nostre birre, anche e non solo per genere, etnia, et√†, orientamento sessuale, credo religioso, nazionalit√†, estrazione sociale, disabilit√† e stile di pensiero, arricchiscano le nostre vite e rafforzino la nostra attivit√†. Accogliamo e prendiamo in considerazione le candidature di tutte le persone qualificate, in quanto sosteniamo una cultura di appartenenza che offre opportunit√† eque e paritarie per tutt…ô.

LA POSIZIONE E IL TEAM

HEINEKEN Italia √® alla ricerca di un/una Brand Trainee Heineken da inserire all'interno della Direzione Marketing per una esperienza formativa e di crescita, riportando al Marketing Manager.

Come Brand Trainee Heineken assicurerai il supporto al Team Heineken nella definizione ed implementazione di attivit√† di Brand Management.

SEDE DI LAVORO: Sesto San Giovanni

FUNZIONE: Marketing

Attivita‚Äô


Supporto nella definizione ed implementazione di campagne marketing
Supporto nella creazione di asset di Brand
Supporto nello sviluppo e nell‚Äôimplementazione di progetti legati al packaging
Misurazione delle performance di Brand con analisi sell-in e sell-out
Supporto nello sviluppo e nella creazione di presentazioni di Brand
Supporto nella definizione e nello sviluppo di attivit√† in collaborazione con il Trade Marketing
Supporto nella gestione del community management attraverso la creazione di dashboard specifiche
Supporto alla moderazione dei commenti nei social network di Brand
Partecipazione a sessioni di brainstorming per l‚Äôideazione di attivit√† a sostegno del Brand


Requisiti


Hai un‚Äôottima conoscenza del Pacchetto Office
Hai un‚Äôottima conoscenza della lingua inglese
Hai ottime capacit√† di gestione per obiettivi e problem solving
Hai ottime capacit√† relazionali e comunicative
Hai un‚Äôottima conoscenza del pacchetto Microsoft Office

HTML:
BRAND TRAINEE HEINEKEN

CHI SIAMO

Da oltre 50 anni HEINEKEN √® leader del settore birrario in Italia, con una quota di mercato del 33,3% e oltre 2.000 collaboratori su tutto il territorio nazionale. Produciamo pi√π di 6 milioni di ettolitri di birra ogni anno nei nostri quattro birrifici situati a Comun Nuovo (BG), Pollein (AO), Massafra (TA) e Assemini (CA), a cui si aggiunge il contributo fondamentale di Partesa, la nostra rete di distribuzione e servizi dedicata al canale Ho.Re.Ca.

Abbracciare e celebrare la diversit√† √® fondamentale per il Purpose di HEINEKEN: " Creare il piacere di stare insieme per ispirare un mondo migliore ". Riteniamo che le persone, diverse come le nostre birre, anche e non solo per genere, etnia, et√†, orientamento sessuale, credo religioso, nazionalit√†, estrazione sociale, disabilit√† e stile di pensiero, arricchiscano le nostre vite e rafforzino la nostra attivit√†. Accogliamo e prendiamo in considerazione le candidature di tutte le persone qualificate, in quanto sosteniamo una cultura di appartenenza che offre opportunit√† eque e paritarie per tutt…ô.

Title: Data Scientist
HTML:
The purpose of the Data Scientist is to :

  • support the Biocartis organisation by performing data analysis that is needed for product development (assays, instruments, manufacturing line), QC release and on-market support;
  • support assay development teams by developing decision trees that will be integrated into the assay specific software;
  • support assay development teams (internal and partner) with assay specific software development and writing;
  • support the assay development teams with respect to scientific software tools and data management.


Accountabilities

  • Develops tools and methods to facilitate analysis of the data generated during:
  • Assay Development
  • Cartridge production (including raw materials and semi-finished products)
  • Instrument production
  • Field usage
  • Develops the decision tree that will be integrated in the assay specific software;
  • Writes assay specific software for our Idylla platform (LUA scripting, xml) in support of new assay development requirements of R&D and IVD. This includes definition of methods and data treatment algorithms and documentation.
  • Performs data mining tasks, statistical analysis and assist other project team members with these tasks;
  • Works as a member of a team, is responsible for organising own time and resources in an optimal fashion. Prioritizes assigned projects and manages time accordingly. Is able to handle more than one project simultaneously;
  • Provides planning input and estimations for their work to support the assay PM (project planning), functional lead and Bio IT manager (resource planning).


Profile requirements

  • A Bachelor or a Master in Bioinformatics or other life science discipline or equivalent through experience and/or training;
  • Experience in computational biology;
  • General basic knowledge of
  • SW Development Lifecycle : planning, requirements, design, implementation, verification.
  • Basic knowledge of :
  • Scripting (LUA, Python);
  • Data analysis;
  • Mathematical programming (R);
  • Data visualisation (Spotfire is a plus);
  • Statistics;
  • Machine Learning (classification, regression, ...);
  • Deep Learning;
  • SQL query;
  • non-relational databases (Big data);
  • Molecular biology;
  • Science skills (Electronics, software, mechanics, chemistry, physics, optics, thermodynamics, fluids).
  • Basic knowledge in IBM Synergy & Change, git, Team Foundation Server (TFS), Azure Development Server (ADS)
  • Time management;
  • Problem identification;
  • Problem analysis;
  • Independency;
  • Analytical thinking;
  • Flexibility;
  • Has good technical writing skills;
  • Cross-functional working and well-developed interpersonal skills;
  • Eagerness to learn/assimilate novel concepts;
  • Strong communication skills;
  • Demonstrate good oral presentations skills;
  • Thrives in a fast-paced and changing environment;
  • Fluent in English both written and spoken, knowledge of Dutch is a plus.


Our offering

We offer you a challenging job in an exciting environment, working for top entrepreneurs in the biotech industry. You can be part of a very dynamic, young and growing team in a highly innovative environment. You will have freedom to shape your work and shape your job. Your input is highly appreciated.

Of course we offer you a fitting compensation package with various benefits which includes a Flexible Income Plan.

Our hybrid work regime offers flexibility for a better Work/Life balance.

Title: Data Scientist
HTML:
We are currently looking for a ‚ÄúData Scientist‚Äù to strengthen the Cronos Europa team.


This position requires a maximum of 5 days per month at client offices. However, teleworking must take place within 2 hours of Brussels.


Responsabilities:

  • Coordination and review of policy units‚Äô business needs;
  • Definition of solutions proposed for servicing policy units‚Äô business needs;
  • Interaction with the business analysts, customer, users, project leaders and the developers;
  • Carry out ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) tasks;
  • Creating, designing and developing data models;
  • Analyse large datasets and propose approaches for optimisation of reporting;
  • Assessment and quality control of data;
  • Preparation of statistical analysis of data for use by policy officers and other stakeholders;
  • Management and processing of data;
  • Reporting of key indicators for different policy fields on the basis of data sets available;
  • Development and maintenance of interactive dashboards in Power BI;
  • Assistance with data management aspects of IT projects developed.


Technical skills:

  • Data Analytics techniques and tools.
  • Power BI (including Power Query).
  • Experience with one or more of the following: Machine Learning and Natural Language Processing, Languages like Visual Basic, SQL, Other business intelligence tools (SAP Business Objects, QlikSense, SAS‚Ä¶), ETL processes and tools (i.e. Azure Data Factory‚Ä¶).
  • SQL tooling (NoSQL DB, MongoDB, Hadoop, SQL).
  • Architectural design and implementation of scalable modern data stores.
  • Knowledge in one of the following areas: predictive (forecasting, recommendation), prescriptive (simulation), sentiment analysis, topic detection, social media crawling and processing, trends/anomalies detection in datasets, recommendation systems.


Profile:

  • Bachelor's degree minimum
  • English fluent
  • Ability to integrate in multicultural environment, team player, discretion, integrity, problem solving.


Why Cronos Group?

We‚Äôll propose you:

  • An attractive salary package
  • A good work-life balance environment
  • The assurance of working in cutting-edge technologies in an entrepreneurial spirit.
  • The opportunity to develop your skills thanks to tailor-made training courses according to your needs
  • A good job in a friendly place

If you wish to integrate a dynamic structure on a human scale while working with the latest technologies, don't wait anymore and join Cronos!

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
TL;DR

We're building the next Netsuite/Odoo for the AI-age (an enterprise operations platform)
Founded by the team that scaled GitGuardian and talent.io
Backed by top-tier VCs (3M‚Ç¨ pre-seed)
Thrive in fast-paced AI-startup
Once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to join a tight-knit, world-class early team
Competitive salary plus equity ownership
Location: Remote (EU)




Why now?

Legacy ERPs can‚Äôt handle real-time decisions, AI-native workflows, or modern business speed.
SMEs need to move fast, but their outdated tools slow them down.
Agent frameworks are ready for real business use.




Why join us?

You'll help invent a new category of enterprise software with a small, elite team. The problems go far beyond CRUD: real-time orchestration, autonomous IA-agents, proactive interfaces. This is foundational work. Backed by ‚Ç¨3M from top-tier VCs (Daphni, Ovni, Motier ‚Ä¶) and top BA (Pennylane, Studapart..) we‚Äôre moving fast from zero to one.




What you‚Äôll build

The goal of our AI-native application is to have AI interfaces for most features

You‚Äôll take part in building:

Configuration agents to help users create their automation workflows, adapt the data model to their particular needs, enforce their processes
Data querying agents to extracts precise metrics and information
Data storage merging structured and unstructured data, to extract high level business insights.
Recommendation agents to make our software pro-active




What you bring

You should have experience in both backend web development and Machine learning, applying rigorous, data-driven research approaches to product feature building.

We want you to have the drive to build a new kind of software, less passive, more flexible; and help drive the agentic vision.

Backend expertise: Strong Python skills, databases, distributed systems, and async processing (Django/FastAPI a bonus).
Applied AI skills: Experience with the python machine learning ecosystem, NLP, agentic frameworks (we know it‚Äôs a recent field), complex RAG systems.
Ownership: You own features end to end, from design and development to deployment and user feedback. You‚Äôre comfortable talking to customers and iterating quickly.

Talent beats checklists. If you're intrigued, apply anyway.




How we work

Total ownership: End-to-end impact.
Zero bureaucracy: Small, agile team driving rapid execution.
Craft with velocity: We move fast by shipping small and never compromising on excellence.
Radical prioritization: One goal at a time, done right.
No egos: Feedback with recommendations can come from anyone, across any team.




What you get:

Competitive salary (‚Ç¨90k to ‚Ç¨120k/year) + meaningful equity.
Exceptional peers and a cutting-edge AI stack.
Ideal equipment and setup (top-tier gear, remote-friendly).
Regular company offsites (2‚Äì4 times per year) in inspiring locations.
Location: We have offices in Paris and Biarritz. You can also work fully remote, France (preferred)




Who‚Äôs building Piston?

We‚Äôre a tight-knit founding team that‚Äôs scaled from zero to growth before at talent.io and GitGuardian in the last 7 years. We've shipped product, built teams, and grown revenue from scratch. We work across product, engineering, and GTM as one unit, writing code, talking to users, and making the hard calls together. We‚Äôve lived the pain of ERP firsthand, and we‚Äôre building the product we wish we had. We bias for action, care deeply about craft, and know how to move fast without breaking trust.




Interview Process (max 2 weeks)

Intro call with Eric (CEO) ‚Äì 40 min
Technical deep dive with Eug√®ne (CTO) ‚Äì 90 min
Culture fit conversation with Florian (CRO) ‚Äì 30 min
Reference calls (2)
Paid 2-day assessment
Fast offer




This is the moment to shape what come next, not iterate on the past

Apply with a short note on why you're excited: founders@pistonhq.app

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Permanent position only




WHAT IS CREAM ALL ABOUT?

We could be a Cream Factory, a cooking blog or even a detective agency‚Ä¶but in reality, we are a consulting company in Business & Technology active in large organizations and industry leaders in Banking, Insurance, Telecom, Energy, Pharmaceutical & Transport.




CREAM‚ÄôS SPECIAL RECIPE:

1/3 of Personal development
1/3 of Collective Intelligence
1/3 of Intrapreneurship

Bonus ingredient: ‚Ä¶ Some passionate colleagues üòÄ




WHAT IS A DATA SCIENTIST AT CREAM?

As Ruben, Data Scientist, you will have a key role in the implementation of innovative data models to solve specific business issues. You will be part of a challenging and multidisciplinary team. You will discover various industries.




YOUR TASKS:

You gather business requirements to better understand your client‚Äôs needs
You dive in a large amount of data to discover is hidden
You provide data-driven recommendations to the client
Based on your client‚Äôs needs, you apply predictive analysis and machine learning
You bring out concrete and predictive models
At the end, you help the business to better optimize the use of their data
data




HOW DO WE IMAGINE OUR FUTURE CONSULTANT?

You have at least 2 years of experience in Data Science
You want to learn more about Machine Learning, Robotics Process Automation (RPA)‚Ä¶
You are used to work with one of the following technologies : MATLAB, R, SAS, Python, Java ‚Ä¶
You have good communication and synthesis skills
You are fluent in French and English; a good knowledge of Dutch is an asset




WHY SHOULD YOU TASTE CREAM/THE LIME FLAVOUR?

A broad diversity of career options: you‚Äôre not stuck in a box
You evolve in a learning environment where you can challenge your knowledge with your colleagues
You grow in a company that is at the leading edge of technology
You have the opportunity to bring new ideas to develop a thriving company
We have values we share, live with, experiment every day

We just hire great people and give them the playing field to become awesome!




"THE LITTLE THING THAT CAN MAKE THE DIFFERENCE,

CREAM IS DEVELOPING A DIVERSITY PLAN AND WOULD LIKE THAT ALL ITS MEMBERS REFLECT THE SOCIETY IN ALL ITS DIVERSITY"

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Aalst, Belgi√´

Bediende

Wij zijn momenteel op zoek naar een gedreven en dynamische Data Scientist binnen ons Data Science Team.

Heb je een sterke wetenschappelijke instelling en interesse in werken met diverse ziekenhuis datasets? Ben je een duizendpoot met veel zin voor initiatief en hecht je veel belang aan Professionalisme, Respect, Integriteit en Samenwerken? Heb je zin om in ons ziekenhuis iets kleurrijks te beleven? Dan ben jij misschien de nieuwe collega die wij zoeken voor AZORG!

Wat houdt de functie in?


Je staat in voor het opzetten van data pipelines voor het ophalen en verwerken van data en het rapporteren van de resultaten.
Je maakt gebruik van algoritmes en verschillende data modellen om waarde & informatie uit klinische, operationele en/of financi√´le data te ontsluiten. Je schrijft queries en je doet aan data cleaning, data analyse en data visualisatie.
Samen met het Data Science Team staan jullie in om de juiste data-assets, methodologie√´n en (statistische) technieken te identificeren en in te zetten om complexe zakelijke vragen te beantwoorden. Jullie conceptualiseren een data infrastructuur dat ons toelaat zinvolle, betrouwbare en toegankelijke (gezondheids-)data aan de organisatie te leveren.
Je verdiept je in de mogelijkheden van (geautomatiseerde) programmeerscripts voor geavanceerde statistische modellering, machine learning en simulatietoepassingen, dit ter ondersteuning van de noden van eindgebruikers omtrent algemene gegevensverwerkings- en gegevenstransformatietaken voor tal van klinische en wetenschappelijke projecten.
Je werkt mee aan de ontwikkeling van diverse rapportages in Qliksense voor interne en externe eindgebruikers en zorgt ervoor dat deze voldoen aan hun vereisten.
Je werkt mee aan innovaties, procesoptimalisatie en kwaliteitsopvolging en -verbetering met betrekking tot klinische en andere ziekenhuisdata.
Je werkt in nauw teamverband binnen het Data Science Team en staat in nauw contact met de beleidsinformatiecel.
Je rapporteert aan de directeur van het Departement Processen en Kwaliteit


Wie zoeken wij?


Je bent minstens in het bezit van een masterdiploma in een wiskundige, statistische of ingenieursrichting. Ervaring met klinische of ziekenhuisdata strekt tot de aanbeveling.
Dankzij je achtergrond in statistische modellen, geavanceerde analyses en/of programmeren, beschik je over de nodige data science toolset voor het analyseren en visualiseren van data. Ervaring met python (voorkeur) of R is een vereiste.
Je bent sterk met SQL voor het ontsluiten van data uit het datawarehouse (functioneel ontwerpen, structureren en organiseren van ETL-processen in een datawarehouse). Kennis van dataminingtechnieken als GLM en Elastic vormen een meerwaarde.
Interesse om je verder te verdiepen in de implementatie van innovatieve datatechnieken binnen het ziekenhuis (i.e. Machine Learning, Deep Learning en Natural Language Processing) strekt tot de aanbeveling.
Je analytische en conceptuele vaardigheden zijn goed ontwikkeld. Je bent niet bang voor complexiteit en schaal en kan functioneren bij onzekerheid.
Je bezit sterke communicatieve vaardigheden en hebt het vermogen om complexe problemen en oplossingen op een eenvoudige en effectieve manier te communiceren.
Je bent voldoende assertief met aandacht voor diplomatie en integriteit. Je bent proactief, hands-on, pragmatisch en nauwgezet. Je bent een sterke projectleider en kan effici√´nt plannen en organiseren.


Wat bieden wij jou?


Een job in een van de grootste ziekenhuizen waar oog is voor opleidingsmogelijkheden en zelfontplooiing.
Een voltijds contract van baepaalde duur in een 38-uren week (starten met 6 maand).
Je zal voornamelijk werken vanuit campus Moorselbaan.
Verloning volgens IFIC18, groeps ‚Äì en hospitalisatieverzekering, vergoeding extra prestaties en een personeelsrestaurant waar je aan voordelig tarief kan eten.
Een fijne werkomgeving waar collega‚Äôs elkaar een luisterend oor bieden
Leuke attenties en een fantastisch personeelsfeest


Hoe solliciteren?

Heb je interesse in deze vacature?


Dien jouw kandidatuur in via onze jobsite.
Voeg bij jouw sollicitatie jouw CV, motivatiebrief, een uittreksel uit mycareer, jouw diploma en een uittreksel uit het strafregister model 596-2.
Nadat we jou telefonisch hebben gecontacteerd bekijken we samen de mogelijkheden om een gesprek ter plaatse bij ons in het ziekenhuis in te plannen waar je meteen kennismaakt met de leidinggevende van de dienst.
Na het gesprek is er de mogelijkheid om een (halve) dag mee te lopen op de dienst.
Verloopt dit goed? Dan verwelkomen jou graag als collega bij ons in het ziekenhuis!


Heb je nog vragen? Neem dan contact op met Kelly De Smedt (HR Partner) 053/72 47 37 of mail naar: kelly.desmedt1@azorg.be.

Contactpersoon

Kelly De Smedt

HR Partner rekrutering

053 72 47 37

Wat houdt de functie in?

  • Je maakt gebruik van algoritmes en verschillende data modellen om waarde & informatie uit klinische, operationele en/of financi√´le data te ontsluiten. Je schrijft queries en je doet aan data cleaning, data analyse en data visualisatie.
  • Samen met het Data Science Team staan jullie in om de juiste data-assets, methodologie√´n en (statistische) technieken te identificeren en in te zetten om complexe zakelijke vragen te beantwoorden. Jullie conceptualiseren een data infrastructuur dat ons toelaat zinvolle, betrouwbare en toegankelijke (gezondheids-)data aan de organisatie te leveren.
  • Je verdiept je in de mogelijkheden van (geautomatiseerde) programmeerscripts voor geavanceerde statistische modellering, machine learning en simulatietoepassingen, dit ter ondersteuning van de noden van eindgebruikers omtrent algemene gegevensverwerkings- en gegevenstransformatietaken voor tal van klinische en wetenschappelijke projecten.
  • Je werkt mee aan de ontwikkeling van diverse rapportages in Qliksense voor interne en externe eindgebruikers en zorgt ervoor dat deze voldoen aan hun vereisten.
  • Je werkt mee aan innovaties, procesoptimalisatie en kwaliteitsopvolging en -verbetering met betrekking tot klinische en andere ziekenhuisdata.
  • Je werkt in nauw teamverband binnen het Data Science Team en staat in nauw contact met de beleidsinformatiecel.
  • Je rapporteert aan de directeur van het Departement Processen en Kwaliteit

Wie zoeken wij?

  • Je bent minstens in het bezit van een masterdiploma in een wiskundige, statistische of ingenieursrichting. Ervaring met klinische of ziekenhuisdata strekt tot de aanbeveling.
  • Dankzij je achtergrond in statistische modellen, geavanceerde analyses en/of programmeren, beschik je over de nodige data science toolset voor het analyseren en visualiseren van data. Ervaring met python (voorkeur) of R is een vereiste.
  • Je bent sterk met SQL voor het ontsluiten van data uit het datawarehouse (functioneel ontwerpen, structureren en organiseren van ETL-processen in een datawarehouse). Kennis van dataminingtechnieken als GLM en Elastic vormen een meerwaarde.
  • Interesse om je verder te verdiepen in de implementatie van innovatieve datatechnieken binnen het ziekenhuis (i.e. Machine Learning, Deep Learning en Natural Language Processing) strekt tot de aanbeveling.
  • Je analytische en conceptuele vaardigheden zijn goed ontwikkeld. Je bent niet bang voor complexiteit en schaal en kan functioneren bij onzekerheid.
  • Je bezit sterke communicatieve vaardigheden en hebt het vermogen om complexe problemen en oplossingen op een eenvoudige en effectieve manier te communiceren.
  • Je bent voldoende assertief met aandacht voor diplomatie en integriteit. Je bent proactief, hands-on, pragmatisch en nauwgezet. Je bent een sterke projectleider en kan effici√´nt plannen en organiseren.

Wat bieden wij jou?

  • Een job in een van de grootste ziekenhuizen waar oog is voor opleidingsmogelijkheden en zelfontplooiing.
  • Een voltijds contract van baepaalde duur in een 38-uren week (starten met 6 maand).
  • Je zal voornamelijk werken vanuit campus Moorselbaan.
  • Verloning volgens IFIC18, groeps ‚Äì en hospitalisatieverzekering, vergoeding extra prestaties en een personeelsrestaurant waar je aan voordelig tarief kan eten.
  • Een fijne werkomgeving waar collega‚Äôs elkaar een luisterend oor bieden
  • Leuke attenties en een fantastisch personeelsfeest

Hoe solliciteren?

Heb je interesse in deze vacature?

  • Dien jouw kandidatuur in via onze jobsite.
  • Voeg bij jouw sollicitatie jouw CV, motivatiebrief, een uittreksel uit mycareer, jouw diploma en een uittreksel uit het strafregister model 596-2.
  • Nadat we jou telefonisch hebben gecontacteerd bekijken we samen de mogelijkheden om een gesprek ter plaatse bij ons in het ziekenhuis in te plannen waar je meteen kennismaakt met de leidinggevende van de dienst.
  • Na het gesprek is er de mogelijkheid om een (halve) dag mee te lopen op de dienst.
  • Verloopt dit goed? Dan verwelkomen jou graag als collega bij ons in het ziekenhuis!

Heb je nog vragen? Neem dan contact op met Kelly De Smedt (HR Partner) 053/72 47 37 of mail naar: kelly.desmedt1@azorg.be.

Contactpersoon

 Kelly De Smedt

HR Partner rekrutering

053 72 47 37

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Data Scientist ‚Äì Grid Optimization & AI Compliance

About Remobi:

We are Remobi ‚Äì we empower businesses to scale, innovate, and achieve their goals through high-quality technical solutions delivered by high-performing, high-quality, REMOTE nearshore technology teams. Join our Remobi community to gain access to meaningful, innovative freelance projects and play a key role in shaping how companies operate!




Position Overview:

Location: Fully Remote

Role Type: Freelance/B2B/Contract

Duration: Initial 12 Months




Position Summary:

We‚Äôre hiring a Data Scientist to build and deploy reinforcement learning (RL) models that optimize real-time control of energy grid systems. This role focuses on developing scalable, responsible AI solutions that reduce emissions, support compliance, and improve operational efficiency. You‚Äôll work with cutting-edge tools like Grid2Op, L2RPN, and ICTE, integrating your work into cloud-native environments with Python and AWS.

This position suits someone passionate about sustainability, operational AI, and solving complex, real-world challenges.




Responsibilities:

Design, train, and deploy RL models to optimize real-time grid operations.
Use open-source grid simulation platforms (Grid2Op, L2RPN, ICTE) to develop and validate models.
Ensure models comply with regulatory and sustainability standards for AI systems.
Deploy and scale models using AWS services such as SageMaker, Lambda, and S3.
Collaborate with engineers, compliance teams, and energy operations specialists.
Translate technical insights into clear communications for varied stakeholders.




Qualifications:

Proven experience with Reinforcement Learning, ideally applied to physical or control systems.
Advanced Python programming and model deployment skills.
Hands-on use of tools like Grid2Op, L2RPN, ICTE, or similar simulation environments.
Experience deploying models on AWS (SageMaker, Lambda, S3).
Familiarity with smart grid technologies or energy systems is a plus.
Understanding of AI governance, sustainability metrics, or regulatory frameworks.
Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Applied Mathematics, or related technical discipline.




If you‚Äôre interested in this role or know someone who might be a great fit, feel free to apply or get in touch!

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Nexeo Belgium is looking for a Medior/Senior Data Scientist ‚Äì Generative AI to join the Artificial Intelligence Tribe of one of the top financial institutions in Belgium.




As part of the team, you will:

Design and develop AI applications (e.g., virtual assistants) to improve customer experience, empower employees, and optimize internal processes.
Apply a broad range of analytical methodologies, including Generative AI (Prompt Engineering, RAG, fine-tuning, speech-to-text, agentic applications, image generation/interpretation) and predictive AI techniques.
Leverage your expertise in Python to develop and deploy AI solutions in production using modern tools and frameworks.
Collaborate in an Agile environment with a multidisciplinary team, sharing expertise and driving innovation.
Access and analyze one of the most diverse and rich datasets in the market.
Present project outcomes directly to top management.

Your profile:

Master‚Äôs degree in a quantitative field (statistics, mathematics, engineering, or equivalent).
At least 3 years of relevant experience in Data Science and Analytics.
Strong expertise in Python, deep learning, and pre-trained models.
Experience with Generative AI frameworks (LangChain, Haystack, etc.) is a plus.
Previous experience with GenAI applications in the financial sector is an asset.
Fluent in Dutch or French, and fluent in English.
Business-oriented mindset, excellent communication skills, and ability to work in multicultural environments.
Proactive, autonomous, and able to learn quickly new techniques when needed.

Work location:

Hybrid model: 50% on-site / 50% homeworking.

We offer:

A competitive package.
The opportunity to work with cutting-edge AI technologies on impactful business cases.
A collaborative environment fostering innovation and knowledge-sharing.

Ready to shape the future of AI in the financial sector?

Apply now and join Nexeo Belgium.

Title: AI Data Scientist
Description:
Founded in 2005 in Lisbon by three visionary entrepreneurs, MoOngy quickly became a leading group in Engineering and Information Technology (IT) across Europe and North Africa. Today, with a presence in 14 countries and more than 40 subsidiary companies, MoOngy employs over 9,500 talents who share a common passion for innovation and excellence.

The International Mobility Recruitment Department is dedicated to enhancing the mobility of IT professionals throughout Europe, facilitating the placement of talents in the various markets where it operates.




Position: AI Data Scientist

üìç Location: Brussels, Belgium

üè¢ Full time; Hybrid (2-3 days/week at client office)

üìú Type of Contract: Freelance or Permanent Contract preferably

üåç Mandatory Languages: English + French or Dutch

üìå Eligibility: Candidates must possess European nationality or a valid work permit for Belgium.







Requirements

5‚Äì8 years of professional experience as a Data Scientist, preferably in a business environment.
Strong business acumen with proven ability to translate business needs into data-driven solutions.
Hands-on expertise in data wrangling, statistical analysis, predictive modeling, and machine learning.
Advanced proficiency in Python and libraries such as Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn.
Solid experience with SQL, Databricks, and Power BI.
Proven track record in AI/GenAI delivery across POCs, pilots, and industrial processes.
Deep knowledge of cloud platforms, ideally Microsoft Azure (Azure AI Services, Azure ML, Azure OpenAI, Vertex AI).
Strong expertise in LLM libraries: LangChain, LangGraph, Promptflow, Semantic Kernel, Autogen.
In-depth understanding of LLMOps lifecycle including fine-tuning, training, deployment, and monitoring.
Experience in GenAI deployment using CI/CD pipelines, GitHub workflows, and tools like Weights & Biases.
Excellent collaboration, communication, and stakeholder management skills, with the ability to keep a helicopter view on projects.




Responsibilities

Design, develop, and deploy advanced AI and GenAI models aligned with business objectives.
Lead AI/GenAI delivery processes from proof of concept to industrialization.
Act as a super user within IT AI environments, providing guidance and expertise.
Work closely with stakeholders to gather requirements and translate them into actionable data science initiatives.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate AI models into business processes.
Monitor, evaluate, and optimize deployed models to ensure accuracy, performance, and reliability.
Stay updated with the latest trends in AI, LLMOps, and cloud technologies to continuously enhance solutions.




Advantages of joining MoOngy:

üåç International Mobility: Access to a dedicated international mobility department with personalized relocation programs to facilitate your move to a new country.

üöÄ Career Development: Opportunities to work on projects with cutting-edge technologies across multiple sectors and European markets.

üìö Continuous Learning: Free ongoing training and career-oriented certifications to boost your expertise.

üí° Personal Growth: Collaborate with professionals from across Europe, exchanging ideas and best practices in IT.

üåê Global Network: Become part of a leading global tech community, with access to exciting and challenging projects in different European markets.




At MoOngy Group, we stand for equality and diversity. We create a safe and inclusive environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, gender, disability, sexual orientation, or any factor other than merit.

üëâ If you have the skills for this role, we encourage you to apply!

Title: AI Data Scientist
Description:
afarax is looking for a freelance AI Data Scientist. We need you!




The project:

Our client in the insurance sector is looking for an AI Data Scientist to join their team.




Responsibilities:

Work closely with the business and technical teams to identify high-impact use cases for Generative AI
Design, develop and implement AI driven solutions for business needs, using both internal and external data sources
Identify and communicate insights from data analysis to support decision-making and problem-solving activities
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and resolve data-related issues
Continuously monitor AI models for accuracy, and proactively identify and resolve data discrepancies and drift
Contribute to the development of a GenAI capability framework and internal best practices




Is this you?

Master‚Äôs degree in a quantitative field or a related field with a strong focus on data analysis
Good knowledge of English, French and Dutch
Data science, preferably in a business setting
Strong business acumen and the ability to understand and communicate, business needs and requirements
Proven experience with data wrangling, statistical analysis, predictive modeling, and machine learning.
Proficient in Python and commonly used libraries (Pandas, NumPy, Scikit learn, etc.).
Cloud Expertise: Strong knowledge of cloud platforms, especially Azure (Azure AI services, Azure ML, Vertex AI, Databricks, Azure OpenAI, etc.)
LLM Libraries: Deep expertise with Python libraries such as Langchain, LangGraph, Promptflow, Semantic Kernel, and Autogen.
Deep understanding of LLMs fine tuning and/or training lifecycle (LLMops).
Gen AI Deployment: Proven experience in deploying and monitoring Gen AI models using CI/CD pipelines, Weight & Biases, and GitHub workflows.
Strong knowledge of data analysis techniques and tools, such as Python, SQL, PBI, DataBricks
Ability to work independently and as part of a team
Manage multiple priorities
Meet tight deadlines
Availability for occasional travel and projects in other operating companies




How afarax supports you?

You benefit from our extensive network
You will have access to projects that fit your expertise
We help and support you throughout your project
We offer the possibility to build a valuable and lasting partnership

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
Are you a Machine Learning Engineer looking to push the boundaries of AI compute solutions?




You‚Äôll be part of a team working on cutting-edge AI models, algorithms, and performance optimization techniques for everything from small-scale edge devices to large-scale distributed and hybrid architectures.




This role sits within the AI Models group, which focuses on algorithmic and application research to drive software-hardware co-optimization and develop novel ML/Hybrid-AI methods for industries such as semiconductor processing and healthcare.




What You‚Äôll Do:




Represent and model AI/ML workloads for performance evaluation of exascale systems
Analyse AI models/workloads to create benchmarks and mini-apps for performance testing
Study performance optimization of deep learning workloads for exascale systems
Explore emerging AI/ML algorithms for custom architectures to enable SW-HW codesign
Stay up to date with the latest AI/ML research and implement state-of-the-art techniques
Contribute to high-impact international projects such as the EuroHPC DARE project, aimed at advancing Europe‚Äôs independence in high-performance computing and AI




What they Offer

The opportunity to join a world-class research environment at the forefront of AI and computing
Open, multicultural, and collaborative workplace with real opportunities to take initiative
Continuous development through in-house learning programs to grow your technical and personal skills
Competitive salary package with comprehensive benefits, pension, healthcare, and additional perks




Your skills:

PhD or Masters Degree
Strong background in parallel programming with proven skills in CUDA and Python
Experience with modern Deep Learning frameworks (PyTorch being the most important)
Familiarity with distributed training tools (Ray, Dask, PyTorch Lightning)
Knowledge of optimization techniques (quantization, pruning, distributed training)
Skilled in software performance analysis and optimization
Prior experience in AI optimization for compute architectures is a plus
Understanding of performance analysis tools and hardware optimization
Strong communication skills and a collaborative mindset
Fluent in English




If you‚Äôre excited by the idea of shaping the future of AI performance engineering and working on projects with global impact, I'd love to hear from you.

Title: AI and Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
B.E.S. (Business & Engineering Solutions) is growing and thus welcoming a new AI and Machine Learning Engineer in our Automotive team.




As an AI and Machine Learning Engineer at B.E.S., you will enjoy a collaborative environment where you will work closely with others in an organization that encourages and values collaboration, mentoring, and continuous learning.




We are selecting candidates for a project to develop an efficient, reliable, and trustworthy camera-based end-to-end driving system. You‚Äôll collaborate directly with a small but highly motivated and experienced team and build on our state-of-the-art research results.




Your Responsibilities:

Study and evaluate the latest state-of-the-art algorithms in perception, planning, and control,
Propose and implement flexible and efficient multi-task architectures,
Design and manage a robust ML-ops pipeline: data handling, model training, evaluation, reporting,
Develop proof-of-concepts to validate real-world impact and inspire adoption,
Collaborate with the team to integrate algorithms into both simulation and real-world environments.




Your Profile:




Solid background in Machine Learning and Deep Learning (designing, training, tuning, deploying neural networks)
Proficiency in Python, and ideally C++ (optional)
Experience with PyTorch or TensorFlow
Familiarity with Linux, Docker, Git
Cloud computing knowledge (e.g., AWS, Azure)
Curious, motivated, and eager to learn
Respectful, open to feedback, and collaborative
Strong problem-solving and organizational skills
Clear communicator, able to explain results effectively




What can you except as a B.E.S. consultant?




Great projects in Engineering and High Technologies through major players to develop your technical skills and hard skills,
Knowledge sharing processes though our competences centers and experts' communities to grow your multi-sectorial knowledge,
A strong development plan to improve your soft skills such as Leadership, Communication skills, Change & People management capabilities‚Ä¶
A full package made of gross salary on 13.92 months, lunch allowance, entertainment expenses, company car & fuel card, group insurances OR a VIE contract,
A friendly, lively working environment within a dynamic and motivated team !!
