Title: Young Graduate AI Traineeship
Description:
Onze klant biedt op maat gemaakte talent development programs aan net afgestudeerden (of high potentials die reeds een eerste korte werkervaring hebben opgedaan) met als doel hen extra te trainen op soft- en hard skills zodat ze professioneel sterk kunnen groeien gedurende het tweejarig traject dat voor hen wordt uitgestippeld.




Momenteel hebben ze een samenwerking met een vooruitstrevende Belgische speler. De organisatie in kwestie is op zoek naar jonge professionals die zich willen toeleggen op AI-oplossingen om effici√´ntie en duurzaamheid te verbeteren.




Job Function




Als AI Trainee krijg je de kans om jouw AI-kennis in de praktijk te brengen en deze verder te ontwikkelen in een intens en leerzaam traject. Je zult actief bijdragen aan diverse projecten die steeds AI gericht zijn.




Naast de praktische ervaring die je zal opdoen tijdens de projecten wordt er doorheen dit traineeship ook veel belang gehecht aan de ontwikkeling van jouw soft skills zodat je als persoon verder kan groeien op professioneel vlak. Daarom worden er doorheen het twee jaar durende traineeship veel extra trainingen gegeven om bijvoorbeeld jouw leadership en andere soft skills verder aan te scherpen.




Kort samengevat, professionele en ervaren coaches zullen u persoonlijk begeleiden om uw soft skills en hard skills verder te ontwikkelen om zo uw carri√®re in een stroomversnelling te brengen.




Na afloop van het traineeship kan u vast aan de slag binnen de organisatie en zal u er meteen een belangrijke rol kunnen opnemen. Dit kan als expert of als leidinggevende.




Job Requirements




U behaalde een masterdiploma;
U heeft maximum 2 jaar werkervaring;
U bent gepassioneerd door AI en kan een eerste ervaring voorleggen (studies, cursus, project, ...);
U wil graag verder groeien op professioneel en persoonlijk vlak;
U beheerst volgende drie talen: Nederlands, Frans en Engels.




Job Offer




U ontvangt een aantrekkelijk salarispakket, maar bovenal zult u grondig getraind worden en zowel op professioneel als persoonlijk vlak heel sterk groeien.
Tijdens dit intensief traineeship krijg je een mix van technische trainingen, praktische ervaring die je zal opbouwen, persoonlijke coaching en heel wat trainingen om jouw softskills verder te ontwikkelen.
Je zal in een innovatieve werkomgeving terechtkomen waarin technologie en AI de toekomst vormgeven.
Na afloop van dit traineeship krijg je een vast contract en zal je binnen de organisatie een belangrijke rol kunnen opnemen.

Show more

  • U behaalde een masterdiploma;
  • U heeft maximum 2 jaar werkervaring;
  • U bent gepassioneerd door AI en kan een eerste ervaring voorleggen (studies, cursus, project, ...);
  • U wil graag verder groeien op professioneel en persoonlijk vlak;
  • U beheerst volgende drie talen: Nederlands, Frans en Engels.


Job Offer


  • U ontvangt een aantrekkelijk salarispakket, maar bovenal zult u grondig getraind worden en zowel op professioneel als persoonlijk vlak heel sterk groeien.
  • Tijdens dit intensief traineeship krijg je een mix van technische trainingen, praktische ervaring die je zal opbouwen, persoonlijke coaching en heel wat trainingen om jouw softskills verder te ontwikkelen.
  • Je zal in een innovatieve werkomgeving terechtkomen waarin technologie en AI de toekomst vormgeven.
  • Na afloop van dit traineeship krijg je een vast contract en zal je binnen de organisatie een belangrijke rol kunnen opnemen.

Title: AI & Data Scientist Team Lead
Description:
Don‚Äôt settle for just any consulting company, choose the one that‚Äôs right for you!




We‚Äôre on the lookout for an AI/Data Scientist Team Lead to join our expanding AI & Data start-up.




As Data Wizards, we are a team of experts in AI & Data who advocate for human-centered AI development and usage. We partner with innovative companies from strategy to implementation to help them achieve their goals by unlocking the full potential of their data assets respecting cultural and ethical norms.




You're making the right choice to apply if you're eager to be part of an ambitious, high-energy team filled with curious, proactive minds who are passionate about AI and driven by integrity.

However, this isn‚Äôt the job for you if you‚Äôre looking for a routine, copy-paste kind of role. Here, every day is different, and we love people who take initiative, embrace challenges, and think outside the box. üöÄ




As an AI/Data Scientist Team Lead, your mission would include:




Technical Leadership

Leading the technical aspects of data science projects, from conception to deployment.
Designing and implementing scalable data science solutions that integrate seamlessly with existing infrastructures.
Developing and optimizing machine learning models to drive actionable insights and automation.
Collaborating with cross-functional teams, including data engineers and business stakeholders, to align technical solutions with strategic goals.
Taking ownership of projects, ensuring high-quality deliverables in an agile environment.
Engaging in proof-of-concept (PoC) projects and scaling them into production-ready solutions.
Working in cloud-based environments and following MLOps best practices.
Communicating insights and technical solutions effectively to diverse audiences.

People Leadership & Management

Managing and developing a team of data scientists, fostering both technical excellence and personal growth.
Acting as a coach and mentor: guiding team members in problem-solving, career development, and project ownership.
Leading performance reviews, setting individual objectives, and providing constructive feedback.
Supporting recruitment and onboarding of new team members, ensuring strong integration into the team culture.
Creating an inclusive, collaborative, and motivating environment where people thrive and contribute at their best.
Balancing workload allocation across projects, ensuring sustainable team capacity and delivery quality.
Serving as the main point of escalation within the data science team and ensuring alignment with business priorities.

You‚Äôre a step closer to joining our team if you bring:

Background:

Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Engineering, AI, or a related technical field.
5+ years of experience in Data Science, Machine Learning, or AI-driven projects.
Previous experience leading or mentoring a small team of data scientists (formal or informal).
Experience in diverse industries and solutions, demonstrating adaptability and problem-solving skills is considered as a plus.

Technical Skills:

Strong programming skills in Python and SQL.
Expertise in machine learning frameworks (e.g., PyTorch, TensorFlow, Scikit-learn).
Hands-on experience with big data technologies and cloud platforms (AWS preferred; Azure is a plus).
Experience deploying ML models and following MLOps best practices.
Understanding of data engineering principles to support scalable AI solutions.
Ability to design and implement proof-of-concept (PoC) projects and scale them into production.

Soft Skills:

Empowering Leader: You know how to inspire and grow a team, balancing guidance with autonomy.
Coaching Mindset: You take pride in helping others develop their skills and careers.
Organised & Decisive: You manage priorities and make informed decisions under pressure.
Inclusive & Collaborative: You build a culture where diverse perspectives are valued.
Trusted Partner: You engage confidently with stakeholders and align your team‚Äôs work with business goals.
Accountable: You ensure both project outcomes and team well-being are delivered.

Practical Info:

Languages: English and French or Dutch
Start Date: ASAP




We know that finding the right job isn‚Äôt just about the role‚Äîit‚Äôs about what‚Äôs in it for you, too. While we‚Äôre a start-up, we‚Äôre big on taking care of our people right from day one.




Here‚Äôs a sneak peek at what we offer:

üí∞ A compensation package that keeps you motivated:

Competitive salary
Mobility budget or company car with a fuel card
30 days of paid time off
A top-tier laptop & smartphone with a subscription
Representation allowances
Hospitalization & dental insurance
Meal vouchers
Opportunity to earn company stock over time

üéØ A place to be your best self, grow, and thrive:

Work with the most innovative technologies in Data & AI
Work in an agile, collaborative environment
Hybrid work model
Monthly team-building events (plus one epic annual celebration)
Tailored training programs to fuel your career growth
A cool, ergonomic office with creative meeting spaces
A Nintendo Switch for spontaneous Mario Kart battles üéÆ
A massage chair for those deep-thinking moments üßò
Fresh coffee & drinks to keep you energized ‚òï

‚ú® And most importantly, a fast-growing company where opportunities are limitless!




Our Recruitment Process:

Quick intro call with our HR team (5min)
HR Interview (30min)
Case study & Technical Interview (1h)
Final Interview (30min)




How to apply?

You can apply right here on LinkedIn




If you‚Äôre passionate about what we do but aren‚Äôt sure you meet every single requirement, don‚Äôt hesitate to apply. We value potential, mindset, and growth as much as experience. At Data Wizards, we believe diversity is our strength. We welcome candidates from all backgrounds and experiences because different viewpoints help us grow and evolve.




Let‚Äôs build the future of AI & Data, together ü§ù




Please note: As a consulting company, our recruitment process can be either project-driven or based on strong profiles we believe in. The consultancy world moves fast, and while we always aim to match great talent with the right opportunity, there might not always be an immediate fit. With your permission, we‚Äôll gladly keep your profile in mind for future missions ‚Äî and hope to collaborate with you soon on an exciting project at Data Wizards!

Title: Artificial Intelligence Engineer
Description:
Senior AI Engineer ‚Äì Python ¬∑ GCP ¬∑ LLMs/NLP




An early-stage startup is looking for a Senior AI Engineer to guide a small, cross-functional team (4) in delivering impactful solutions through fast, iterative development cycles.

The team is building a platform that leverages large language models (LLMs) to convert literature into structured knowledge, helping accelerate discovery




Key Responsibilities

Drive the technical vision and ensure consistent, high-quality delivery.
Define and evolve the architecture for data ingestion, processing, and user interface layers.
Design, develop, and deploy LLM/NLP pipelines.
Build using Python, GCP, TypeScript, and a mix of open-source and commercial LLMs (e.g., Hugging Face).
Offer hands-on support to engineers and help remove technical blockers.
Collaborate closely with domain experts to solve real-world scientific challenges.
Focus on execution and outcomes, rather than people management.




Requirements

Strong experience with Python and cloud platforms (GCP preferred).
Practical knowledge of LLMs or machine learning,
Clear communication skills and a strong sense of ownership.
Proficiency in English (spoken and written).
Plus if you have experience with Bio Tech or Drug discovery




Nice to Have

Experience with open source or freemium product development.

Title: BE-Data Scientist
Description:
Overview

Who are we?

Collaboration Betters The World ( CBTW ), is a company providing tech et business solutions to its clients, thanks to its expertise through 9 service lines.

As a Data Scientist, you will join our Data Analytics & AI service line, where we are supporting organizations every step of the way to become data-driven.

Responsibilities

What is your role?

You will be part of a journey where you will have two impacts: a client impact and an internal impact. For the internal impact, based on your skills and time, you will be joining our internal data community at CBTW, to share knowledge and best practices. For the client impact, tasks can vary depending on the client and the project, but as a Data Engineer, you will mainly:


Mining both structured and unstructured data to identify patterns and provide information through predictive models
Explore and collect data from multiple sources to apply or develop analytical ad statistical methods and machine learning models
Apply statistics and machine learning algorithms to discover patterns in datasets


Qualifications

What is your profile?

You:


Have at least a bachelor‚Äôs degree in computer science, statistics, economics or in another relevant field
Have at least 3 years of experience as a Data Scientist or in a similar role
Know technologies such as Python, Tensorflow, Pandas, Numpy SQL, Random Forest, neural networks, etc.
Speak English, Dutch and French
Will be an outstanding candidate if you share our values: Positive Thinking, Collaboration, Evolution & Commitment.


What are we offering?

Evolution:


Personal follow-up during your career at CBTW and buddy-ship program during your first 6 months
Catalogue with a wide variety of trainings for hard- and soft skills, private language classes, unlimited access to an E-learning platform (Udemy, O'reilly,‚Ä¶) and possibility to get certified every year (Azure, AWS, Prince2, etc.)


Collaboration:


On top of the data community, you can join one of the passion communities and practice your hobby or share your interests with other positive thinkers
International collaboration, possibility to work worldwide


On top of that:


Competitive salary with a flexible mobility package (variety of choice between electrical cars, electrical bikes, payment of rent/mortgage...)
You will become part of a growing team of people keen on applying the latest technologies and knowledge. You will be able to work in a dynamic, innovating environment with the proper touch of geekiness and yearning for board games.


Do you see a match? We would love to see your application coming in! üòâ

Title: Innovation Officer (H/F/X) NL
Description:
Met bijna 4.000 medewerkers en een uitgebreid onderwijsnetwerk behoort de Stad Brussel tot de grootste werkgevers van het Brussels Gewest. Vastberaden om zich op de toekomst te richten, streeft zij er niet alleen naar een slimme en duurzame stad te worden, maar ook een proactieve rol op te nemen tegenover de grote uitdagingen van onze tijd.

In dit kader speelt de Directie Strategie en Digitale Transformatie een centrale rol. Zij stuurt de uitwerking en de opvolging van de algemene strategie van de Stad, co√∂rdineert de structurele projecten en leidt de programma‚Äôs voor digitale transformatie met het oog op de opbouw van een slimme stad die steunt op datagebruik.

Om deze ambitie te versterken, heeft de Stad beslist haar Dienst Strategie uit te rusten met een innovatieteam. Gedurende de komende drie jaar zal dit team de opdracht hebben zich te richten op twee complexe, transversale en prioritaire uitdagingen voor Brussel. Het zal worden aangemoedigd om nieuwe werkmethodes en benaderingen van publieke innovatie uit te testen.

Dit initiatief beoogt een dubbele doelstelling: de levenskwaliteit van de Brusselaars concreet verbeteren √©n innovatieve praktijken, eenmaal bewezen, duurzaam te verankeren binnen de administratie, om zo haar modernisering en aanpassingsvermogen te ondersteunen.

This position is part of City of Brussels participation in the Bloomberg Philanthropies Innovation team (i-team) program. Charged with helping city officials and civic partners design and implement solutions that meet pressing local challenges, the i-team will expertly deploy data, collect insight, and collaborate across sectors‚Äîcrowding the energy and resources across City of Brussels‚Äîto develop resident-centered interventions that improve people‚Äôs lives. The i-team will receive technical assistance from regional and global specialists, and benefit from learnings from peers in city halls across the region and around the world. To date, the Bloomberg Philanthropies i-team initiative has reached over 100 cities across 16 countries and four continents‚Äîrepresenting more than 100 million residents‚Äîand inspired hundreds of other local governments to embrace innovation systems and practices.







Functie

Je leidt en stimuleert het werk van het innovatieteam rond twee stedelijke uitdagingen

:Chrono-urbanisme (10-minutenstad): concentratie van voorzieningen in multifunctionele wijkclusters en beter gebruik van bestaande infrastructuur
.Leegstaande/verlaten woningen: aanpak van obstakels rond kleine wooneenheden (eengezinswoningen, kleine appartementen, woningen boven winkels)

.Je zorgt voor strategisch en operationeel leiderschap, co√∂rdineert de samenwerking tussen diensten en partners en garandeert dat de acties tastbare resultaten opleveren voor de inwoners. Je bent ook het aanspreekpunt voor de Europese i-teams en Bloomberg Philanthropies, en draagt bij aan een cultuurverandering die innovatie structureel in de werking van de Stad verankert.

Taken

Uitdagingen aanpakken

Co√∂rdineren van de uitvoering van de projecten en afstemmen op de strategische ambities
Mobiliseren van interne en externe stakeholders
Waken over doelstellingen, budget en deadlines; superviseren van deliverables

Leiderschap & strategie

Samen met de collega van het i-team de innovatiestrategie mee bepalen
Een cultuur van experimenteren en samenwerking installeren
Structurele hefbomen identificeren om innovatie duurzaam te verankeren

Institutioneel & partnerschappen

De Stad vertegenwoordigen in het Europese i-teams-netwerk en bij Bloomberg
Strategische communicatie verzekeren met Burgemeester en topmanagement
Rapporten opstellen (Engels) en het administratieve en financi√´le beheer opvolgen

Methodologie & betrokkenheid

Ontwerpen en begeleiden van workshops, co-creatie en collectieve intelligentie
Projectlessen vertalen naar beleid, processen en tools
Studies, analyses en aanbestedingen initi√´ren of opvolgen

Profiel

Competenties

Ruime ervaring in beheer van complexe, transversale projecten, idealiter in een publieke context
Aantoonbaar leiderschap, capaciteit om multidisciplinaire teams te inspireren
Ervaring met publieke innovatie, organisatieverandering of beleidsdesign
Inzicht in stedelijke dynamieken en interesse in duurzaamheid en burgerparticipatie

Kwaliteiten

Sterk analytisch en synthetisch vermogen, resultaatgericht
Uitstekende communicatievaardigheden (NL/FR/EN)
Politiek inzicht, diplomatie en wendbaarheid in een meerpartijenomgeving
Systemische visie, creatieve en innovatieve ingesteldheid

Troeven

Grondige kennis van de Brusselse administratie
Ervaring met internationale programma‚Äôs, subsidies of innovatienetwerken
Kennis chrono-urbanisme, burgerparticipatie of stedelijke innovatie
Certificaat projectmanagement (PMP, Prince2, Agile)




Vereist diploma

Je bent houder van een Masterdiploma

Of je voldoet aan de voorwaarden voor interne mobiliteit voor een functie van niveau A of voor promotie naar een functie in de graad van bestuurssecretaris

.Indien je je diploma behaald hebt in het buitenland, is op enkele uitzonderingen na, een gelijkwaardigheidserkenning door NARIC-Vlaanderen nodig (https://www.vlaanderen.be/gelijkwaardigheidserkenning-van-een-buitenlands-diploma-of-getuigschrift-in-vlaanderen)

Aanbod




Een voltijds contract dat verbonden is aan de looptijd van de subsidies (1/11/2025 tot en met 31/10/20
27)Bruto maandelijks salaris: minimum 3.913,31 euro's (dat kan hoger zijn afhankelijk van de waardering van eerdere werkervaringen, familiale situatie en het slagen voor de taalexamens). Je kunt een schatting van jouw salaris krijgen via via onze online loonsimulator
Een tweetaligheidspremie (onder voorbehoud van het behalen van het onderzoek van Selor artikel 8 en artikel 9¬ß2)
Eindejaarspremie en vakantieg
Maaltijdcheques (8 euro‚Äôs, waarvan 6,91 euro‚Äôs ten laste van de Stad Brussel)
Geniet van 36,5 dagen betaald verlof, 4 dagen vastgesteld verlof door de Stad en 10 wettelijke feestdagen
Mogelijkheid tot een voordelige hospitalisatieverzekering en dekking van het remgeld door de Stad voor medische zorg, voor u en uw gezin in het UZ Brugmann, UMC Sint-Pieter, Institut Jules Bordet en Koningin Fabiola Kinderziekenhuis
Pensioenplan voor contractuele medewerkers ter waarde van 3% van het bruto salaris
De meeste van onze administratieve functies zijn hybride met de mogelijkheid tot telewerken na 6 maanden, gekoppeld aan een forfaitaire tussenkomst van 20 euro per maand.
De Stad Brussel voldoet aan jouw behoeften op het gebied van professionele ontwikkeling door regelmatige trainingen aan te bieden (aan te passen indien nodig).
Onze werkplekken zijn gemakkelijk bereikbaar met het openbaar vervoer en het MIVB-abonnement wordt 100% terugbetaald, er is ook een tussenkomst in de vervoerskosten (NMBS, De Lijn, TEC, fiets).




SELECTIEPROCEDURES

Stuur ons je kandidatuur uiterlijk tegen 21/09/2025 (curriculum vitae + motivatiebrief + kopie van het vereiste diploma). Onvolledige kandidaturen (zonder alle vereiste documenten) worden niet in aanmerking genomen. Een eerste selectie gebeurt op basis van het cv en de motivatiebrief. Kandidaten die overeenkomen met het profiel worden telefonisch uitgenodigd voor geautomatiseerde selectietests en voor twee selectiegesprekken. Deze zullen plaatsvinden voor een selectiecommissie en zullen betrekking hebben op motivatie, gedragscompetenties en technische competenties. Demos Helsinki (onafhankelijke denktank) zal deelnemen aan deze gesprekken. Door te solliciteren aanvaard je dat je persoonsgegevens uitsluitend en strikt in het kader van deze selectieprocedure met hun consultants worden gedeeld.

De Stad Brussel selecteert kandidaten op basis van hun competenties en maakt geen onderscheid naar leeftijd, geslacht, etnische afkomst, overtuiging, handicap of nationaliteit. We moedigen personen met een handicap aan om te solliciteren. We houden rekening met eventuele noodzakelijke aanpassingen, zowel in de selectieprocedure als bij de integratie binnen de administratie.

Show more
HTML:
Met bijna 4.000 medewerkers en een uitgebreid onderwijsnetwerk behoort de Stad Brussel tot de grootste werkgevers van het Brussels Gewest. Vastberaden om zich op de toekomst te richten, streeft zij er niet alleen naar een slimme en duurzame stad te worden, maar ook een proactieve rol op te nemen tegenover de grote uitdagingen van onze tijd.

In dit kader speelt de Directie Strategie en Digitale Transformatie een centrale rol. Zij stuurt de uitwerking en de opvolging van de algemene strategie van de Stad, co√∂rdineert de structurele projecten en leidt de programma‚Äôs voor digitale transformatie met het oog op de opbouw van een slimme stad die steunt op datagebruik.

Om deze ambitie te versterken, heeft de Stad beslist haar Dienst Strategie uit te rusten met een innovatieteam. Gedurende de komende drie jaar zal dit team de opdracht hebben zich te richten op twee complexe, transversale en prioritaire uitdagingen voor Brussel. Het zal worden aangemoedigd om nieuwe werkmethodes en benaderingen van publieke innovatie uit te testen.

Dit initiatief beoogt een dubbele doelstelling: de levenskwaliteit van de Brusselaars concreet verbeteren √©n innovatieve praktijken, eenmaal bewezen, duurzaam te verankeren binnen de administratie, om zo haar modernisering en aanpassingsvermogen te ondersteunen.

This position is part of City of Brussels participation in the Bloomberg Philanthropies Innovation team (i-team) program. Charged with helping city officials and civic partners design and implement solutions that meet pressing local challenges, the i-team will expertly deploy data, collect insight, and collaborate across sectors‚Äîcrowding the energy and resources across City of Brussels‚Äîto develop resident-centered interventions that improve people‚Äôs lives. The i-team will receive technical assistance from regional and global specialists, and benefit from learnings from peers in city halls across the region and around the world. To date, the Bloomberg Philanthropies i-team initiative has reached over 100 cities across 16 countries and four continents‚Äîrepresenting more than 100 million residents‚Äîand inspired hundreds of other local governments to embrace innovation systems and practices.



Functie

Je leidt en stimuleert het werk van het innovatieteam rond twee stedelijke uitdagingen

  1. :Chrono-urbanisme (10-minutenstad): concentratie van voorzieningen in multifunctionele wijkclusters en beter gebruik van bestaande infrastructuur
  2. .Leegstaande/verlaten woningen: aanpak van obstakels rond kleine wooneenheden (eengezinswoningen, kleine appartementen, woningen boven winkels)

.Je zorgt voor strategisch en operationeel leiderschap, co√∂rdineert de samenwerking tussen diensten en partners en garandeert dat de acties tastbare resultaten opleveren voor de inwoners. Je bent ook het aanspreekpunt voor de Europese i-teams en Bloomberg Philanthropies, en draagt bij aan een cultuurverandering die innovatie structureel in de werking van de Stad verankert.

Taken

Uitdagingen aanpakken

  • Co√∂rdineren van de uitvoering van de projecten en afstemmen op de strategische ambities
  • Mobiliseren van interne en externe stakeholders
  • Waken over doelstellingen, budget en deadlines; superviseren van deliverables

Leiderschap & strategie

  • Samen met de collega van het i-team de innovatiestrategie mee bepalen
  • Een cultuur van experimenteren en samenwerking installeren
  • Structurele hefbomen identificeren om innovatie duurzaam te verankeren

Institutioneel & partnerschappen

  • De Stad vertegenwoordigen in het Europese i-teams-netwerk en bij Bloomberg
  • Strategische communicatie verzekeren met Burgemeester en topmanagement
  • Rapporten opstellen (Engels) en het administratieve en financi√´le beheer opvolgen

Methodologie & betrokkenheid

  • Ontwerpen en begeleiden van workshops, co-creatie en collectieve intelligentie
  • Projectlessen vertalen naar beleid, processen en tools
  • Studies, analyses en aanbestedingen initi√´ren of opvolgen

Profiel

Competenties

  • Ruime ervaring in beheer van complexe, transversale projecten, idealiter in een publieke context
  • Aantoonbaar leiderschap, capaciteit om multidisciplinaire teams te inspireren
  • Ervaring met publieke innovatie, organisatieverandering of beleidsdesign
  • Inzicht in stedelijke dynamieken en interesse in duurzaamheid en burgerparticipatie

Kwaliteiten

  • Sterk analytisch en synthetisch vermogen, resultaatgericht
  • Uitstekende communicatievaardigheden (NL/FR/EN)
  • Politiek inzicht, diplomatie en wendbaarheid in een meerpartijenomgeving
  • Systemische visie, creatieve en innovatieve ingesteldheid

Troeven

  • Grondige kennis van de Brusselse administratie
  • Ervaring met internationale programma‚Äôs, subsidies of innovatienetwerken
  • Kennis chrono-urbanisme, burgerparticipatie of stedelijke innovatie
  • Certificaat projectmanagement (PMP, Prince2, Agile)


Vereist diploma

  • Je bent houder van een Masterdiploma

Of je voldoet aan de voorwaarden voor interne mobiliteit voor een functie van niveau A of voor promotie naar een functie in de graad van bestuurssecretaris

.Indien je je diploma behaald hebt in het buitenland, is op enkele uitzonderingen na, een gelijkwaardigheidserkenning door NARIC-Vlaanderen nodig (https://www.vlaanderen.be/gelijkwaardigheidserkenning-van-een-buitenlands-diploma-of-getuigschrift-in-vlaanderen)

Aanbod


  • Een voltijds contract dat verbonden is aan de looptijd van de subsidies (1/11/2025 tot en met 31/10/20
  • 27)Bruto maandelijks salaris: minimum 3.913,31 euro's (dat kan hoger zijn afhankelijk van de waardering van eerdere werkervaringen, familiale situatie en het slagen voor de taalexamens). Je kunt een schatting van jouw salaris krijgen via via onze online loonsimulator
  • Een tweetaligheidspremie (onder voorbehoud van het behalen van het onderzoek van Selor artikel 8 en artikel 9¬ß2)
  • Eindejaarspremie en vakantieg
  • Maaltijdcheques (8 euro‚Äôs, waarvan 6,91 euro‚Äôs ten laste van de Stad Brussel)
  • Geniet van 36,5 dagen betaald verlof, 4 dagen vastgesteld verlof door de Stad en 10 wettelijke feestdagen
  • Mogelijkheid tot een voordelige hospitalisatieverzekering en dekking van het remgeld door de Stad voor medische zorg, voor u en uw gezin in het UZ Brugmann, UMC Sint-Pieter, Institut Jules Bordet en Koningin Fabiola Kinderziekenhuis
  • Pensioenplan voor contractuele medewerkers ter waarde van 3% van het bruto salaris
  • De meeste van onze administratieve functies zijn hybride met de mogelijkheid tot telewerken na 6 maanden, gekoppeld aan een forfaitaire tussenkomst van 20 euro per maand.
  • De Stad Brussel voldoet aan jouw behoeften op het gebied van professionele ontwikkeling door regelmatige trainingen aan te bieden (aan te passen indien nodig).
  • Onze werkplekken zijn gemakkelijk bereikbaar met het openbaar vervoer en het MIVB-abonnement wordt 100% terugbetaald, er is ook een tussenkomst in de vervoerskosten (NMBS, De Lijn, TEC, fiets).


SELECTIEPROCEDURES

Stuur ons je kandidatuur uiterlijk tegen 21/09/2025 (curriculum vitae + motivatiebrief + kopie van het vereiste diploma). Onvolledige kandidaturen (zonder alle vereiste documenten) worden niet in aanmerking genomen. Een eerste selectie gebeurt op basis van het cv en de motivatiebrief. Kandidaten die overeenkomen met het profiel worden telefonisch uitgenodigd voor geautomatiseerde selectietests en voor twee selectiegesprekken. Deze zullen plaatsvinden voor een selectiecommissie en zullen betrekking hebben op motivatie, gedragscompetenties en technische competenties. Demos Helsinki (onafhankelijke denktank) zal deelnemen aan deze gesprekken. Door te solliciteren aanvaard je dat je persoonsgegevens uitsluitend en strikt in het kader van deze selectieprocedure met hun consultants worden gedeeld.

De Stad Brussel selecteert kandidaten op basis van hun competenties en maakt geen onderscheid naar leeftijd, geslacht, etnische afkomst, overtuiging, handicap of nationaliteit. We moedigen personen met een handicap aan om te solliciteren. We houden rekening met eventuele noodzakelijke aanpassingen, zowel in de selectieprocedure als bij de integratie binnen de administratie.

Title: Expert in AI / ML (Brussels, Belgium)
Description:
Expert in AI / ML

üìç Location: Near-site (Brussels, 1 day/week onsite, then remote within 2 hours reach)

üóì Start Date: 01/10/2025

üìÑ Contract Duration: Initial 220 days (extendable, up to 1000 days total)

üíª Equipment: Laptop provided by the European Commission

Client:

The Office for Infrastructure and Logistics (OIB), in partnership with other Commission services, delivers high-quality corporate IT solutions to support the European Commission‚Äôs Digital Transformation and EU policies.

We are now seeking an AI/NLP/ML Expert to drive the delivery and continuous improvement of corporate platforms supporting document and archive management, leveraging cutting-edge Artificial Intelligence technologies.

Key Responsibilities

As an AI & Cloud Expert, you will bridge business requirements with technical solutions to design and implement scalable, secure, and sustainable platforms.

Your main tasks will include:


üóÇ Stakeholder engagement: Conduct workshops and meetings to capture requirements.
üìä Business analysis: Translate archiving needs into robust technical specifications.
üèó Architecture design: Propose secure, scalable, and cost-effective AI & cloud architectures.
ü§ñ AI solution development: Build and deploy services using LLMs, LangChain, vector databases.
‚öôÔ∏è Prototyping: Develop Proofs of Concept and production-ready services using Python & Jupyter Notebooks.
‚òÅ Cloud integration: Leverage AWS services (S3, Lambda, SageMaker, Bedrock, API Gateway, ECS/EKS, CloudFormation/Terraform).
üìë Documentation & knowledge transfer.
üîó Integration: Ensure seamless interoperability with existing archiving systems.
üìà Monitoring & optimisation of deployed solutions.
ü§ù Collaboration: Work closely with Business, Infrastructure, and Security teams.


Education & Qualifications


5 years of higher education.


Required Knowledge & Skills

Core skills:


Strong ability to capture & structure business requirements.
Analytical and problem-solving mindset.
Excellent communication (technical & non-technical).
Experience in Agile & collaborative environments.
Autonomy and ability to manage priorities.


Technical expertise (mandatory):


‚úÖ LLMs: fine-tuning, prompting strategies, evaluation, deployment (3+ years).
‚úÖ LangChain or equivalent orchestration frameworks (2+ years).
‚úÖ Vector databases (2+ years).
‚úÖ Python & Jupyter Notebooks (2+ years).
‚úÖ AWS AI & cloud-native services (2+ years).
‚úÖ MLOps pipelines & monitoring (1+ year).
‚úÖ Data engineering & archiving best practices (1+ year).


Advantageous skills:


Docker & Kubernetes.
AI/cloud security best practices.
DevOps / IaC tools (Terraform, Ansible).
Data governance & GDPR compliance.


Certifications (Highly Valued)


AWS Certified Solutions Architect ‚Äì Professional
AWS Certified Machine Learning ‚Äì Specialty
AWS Certified DevOps Engineer ‚Äì Professional
TensorFlow Developer Certificate (or equivalent)
Certified Kubernetes Administrator (CKA)
TOGAF or equivalent enterprise architecture certification


Working Environment & Condition


Hybrid setup: 1 day per week onsite in Brussels (Tervuren 211 premises), remaining days remote (must be within 2h reach).
Interviews may be requested onsite at Belliard 28, Brussels.
Work in a multicultural, international environment, requiring:
English (C1 level), French (B1 level is a plus).
Strong team player skills.
High discretion & integrity (handling confidential data).


Why Join?

üöÄ Opportunity to work on cutting-edge AI/NLP/ML projects within the European Commission.

üåç Be part of a multicultural and international team driving digital transformation at scale.

üîí Secure and stable long-term mission (up to 1000 days).

üí° Work with the latest AI tools, LLMs, and AWS Cloud services in a high-impact domain (document & archive management).

Title: AI Architect
Description:
Company Description

Sopra Steria offers tailored, end-to-end corporate technology and software solutions to help clients make bold choices and deliver results. Successfully so! With more than 56.000 colleagues in 30 countries, we rank as Europe‚Äôs leading digital solutions provider. Some of the most successful companies in Europe rely on our technology due to our commitment to innovation, collaboration, and value in business development.

The world is how we shape it. Let‚Äôs shape it together.

Job Description

As an AI Architect, you'll delve into the core of AI, applying your skills across domains like healthcare, transportation, and chatbot development. You'll routinely work with techniques like computer vision, NLP, forecasting, optimization, and generative AI, tackling real-world scenarios without getting lost in complexity. You'll translate business challenges into AI solutions, aligning them with market needs and inspiring both employees and companies. You'll lead project teams to implement these solutions, while considering legal, ethical, and moral boundaries.

You collaborate with data scientists and AI experts to identify and pilot AI use cases, ensuring they reach production readiness. Align with business teams to convert leaders' visions into practical, feasible technical solutions. You gather input from stakeholders and develop processes and products that meet current and future needs. You define the AI architecture and choose technologies from open-source or commercial options. Select deployment models (cloud, on-premises, or hybrid) for seamless integration with existing data and analytics tools.

You improve AI tools and practices, focusing on continuous improvement. Implement feedback mechanisms to assess and recalibrate models as needed. You serve as an AI expert, generating and sharing innovative ideas and insights with colleagues and customers through training and knowledge-sharing sessions.

Qualifications

We‚Äôre seeking passionate colleagues who are eager to push the boundaries in digital transformation and technology consulting. At Sopra Steria, you‚Äôll have the opportunity to grow your skills in a constructive, collaborative team environment, working on impactful projects that drive change for our clients. If you thrive on challenge and meet (most of) the qualifications below, we look forward to your application!

You‚Äôll have knowledge and experience of the following:‚ÄØ


At least 7+ years of experience in AI and Data Science.
Multiple examples where you coordinated a team in building end-to-end AI solutions.
Experienced in developing (deep learning) models.
Experience in securely and rapidly developing, training, evaluating, debugging, and deploying AI models in both practical and theoretical scenarios.
Experience with modern computer vision tools for image classification, object detection, tracking, and segmentation.
Expertise in working with LLMs (GPT, BERT, etc.) and are familiar with NLP and LLM evaluation metrics.
Hands-on experience in the development of AI solutions in cloud environments like Microsoft AWS or azure.
You approach problem-solving with an open-minded and constructive attitude.
You have the drive to stay up to date with the fast-changing AI landscape.
You're an excellent mentor who not only designs the architecture but also ensures our consultants implement it successfully.
Conduct thorough code reviews, particularly in Python, to ensure code quality and adherence to best practices.
Guide consultants from Proof of Concept (POC) to production, leveraging your infrastructure knowledge to support deployment and optimization.
You are fluent in Dutch and English. Knowledge of French is a plus.
You are resident in Belgium and look forward to working a limited days a week at the client's or our offices.
You have experience in improving AI/ML strategies.


What We Can Offer You

As a member of one of Europe‚Äôs largest digital solutions providers, you‚Äôll benefit from extensive career development opportunities, both local and international. At the Sopra Steria Academy, you‚Äôll be part of a dynamic network of 56,000 professionals at all stages of their careers. With a wide array of offices to explore, you can find your ideal location and take the next step in your career.‚ÄØ

You‚Äôll become a part of a major Tech player in Europe recognized for its consulting, digital services, and software development. On top of that, you‚Äôll join the OptimAi Team: the partner for advanced, intelligent solutions using AI.

Additional Information

Our employees are known for making bold choices and delivering results. Work among high-level professionals at the forefront of corporate software solutions and innovation at Europe‚Äôs Leading Digital Service Provider.‚ÄØ‚ÄØ

We offer a generous employee benefits package that includes:


A company car or mobility budget.
Laptop, phone & phone subscription.
A competitive salary and indefinite contract.
Insurance coverage, meal vouchers, eco-cheques, and more.
Continuous learning opportunities through the Sopra Steria Academy to support your career development.


People are the cornerstone of our success. That‚Äôs why we aspire to be bolder together. Our goal is to build high-functioning teams and healthy team environments that inspire and help each other to deliver excellence for each of our customers.‚ÄØ‚ÄØ

Excited about this job opportunity? Ready to shape the world with us? Great! We are looking forward to your application!‚ÄØ

______

Sopra Steria is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will be considered for employment without regard to age, ancestry, nationality, color, family or medical leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, immigration status, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran or military status, race, ethnicity, religion, gender (including pregnancy), sexual orientation or any other characteristic protected by applicable local laws, regulations and ordinances. We foster a work environment that is inclusive and respectful of all differences.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer F/M/X
Description:
Who are we?

Amaris Consulting is an independent technology consulting firm providing guidance and solutions to businesses. With more than 1,000 clients across the globe, we have been rolling out solutions in major projects for over a decade ‚Äì this is made possible by an international team of 7,600 people spread across 5 continents and more than 60 countries. Our solutions focus on four different Business Lines: Information System & Digital, Telecom, Life Sciences and Engineering. We‚Äôre focused on building and nurturing a top talent community where all our team members can achieve their full potential. Amaris is your steppingstone to cross rivers of change, meet challenges and achieve all your projects with success.

At Amaris, we strive to provide our candidates with the best possible recruitment experience. We like to get to know our candidates, challenge them, and be able to give them proper feedback as quickly as possible. Here's what our recruitment process looks like:

Brief Call: Our process typically begins with a brief virtual/phone conversation to get to know you! The objective? Learn about you, understand your motivations, and make sure we have the right job for you!

Interviews (the average number of interviews is 3 - the number may vary depending on the level of seniority required for the position). During the interviews, you will meet people from our team: your line manager of course, but also other people related to your future role. We will talk in depth about you, your experience, and skills, but also about the position and what will be expected of you. Of course, you will also get to know Amaris: our culture, our roots, our teams, and your career opportunities!

Case study: Depending on the position, we may ask you to take a test. This could be a role play, a technical assessment, a problem-solving scenario, etc.

As you know, every person is different and so is every role in a company. That is why we have to adapt accordingly, and the process may differ slightly at times. However, please know that we always put ourselves in the candidate's shoes to ensure they have the best possible experience.

We look forward to meeting you!

Job Description

Are you a skilled ML Engineer ready for your next adventure? Amaris Consulting is on the lookout for a motivated individual with a strong background in machine learning to join our Data & AI Center of Excellence in Brussels. This is a great opportunity for professionals with keen analytical abilities, a strong technical sense, and excellent communication skills.

üî• Your Responsibilities:



Design, build, and train machine learning models to address complex business problems.
Fine-tune model performance through feature engineering, hyperparameter tuning, and validation techniques.
Develop pipelines to deploy machine learning models into production, ensuring reliability and scalability.
Work closely with data scientists, engineers, and business stakeholders to align model outcomes with strategic goals.
Stay up to date with emerging ML techniques and tools, contributing to continuous improvement initiatives.



üéØ Your Profile:

We are seeking a candidate with a strong background in machine learning and excellent problem-solving skills. Your attention to detail and ability to simplify complex information will set you apart. You thrive in collaborative environments but can also work independently when needed.



Master's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related field.
Proficiency in programming languages such as Python and experience with ML frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch, etc.).
Understanding of statistical methods, data processing, and model evaluation techniques.
Excellent communication skills and the ability to work in a collaborative, fast-paced environment.
Experience with cloud-based ML platforms (AWS SageMaker, Google AI Platform, Azure ML).
Proven track record in deploying machine learning models at scale.



üöÄ Advantages:



An international learning environment.
Extensive training and certifications.
A R&D laboratory where you can develop your skills on innovative projects.
The opportunity to bring new ideas to develop a thriving business.
Individual coaching and mentoring, as well as the chance to learn from experts for your professional and personal growth.
An attractive, tailor-made, and evolving career path.



üí° We are an independent company that values:



Agility: thrive in a flexible, dynamic, and stimulating environment.
International scope: enjoy daily international exchanges and numerous mobility opportunities in over 60 countries.
Intrapreneurship: engage in related topics or develop your own Business Unit.
Attentive management: with a limited number of consultants, your manager will adapt to your profile and support you throughout your professional journey.



Amaris Consulting is proud to be an equal-opportunity workplace. We are committed to promoting diversity within the workforce and creating an inclusive working environment. For this purpose, we welcome applications from all qualified candidates regardless of gender, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, beliefs, age, marital status, disability, or other characteristics.

Title: AI & Machine Learning Engineering Consultant
Description:
Are you willing to make a step in your career and deliver AI solutions from early discovery stages up to industrialized solutions as part of large transformation projects? Are you willing to re-imagine the future of the industry, and the next generation of production process or supply chain control solutions? If this is the case, this role will be of interest to you!

Team



Working across industry groups, our Data & AI team combines deep technology, business and industry expertise to design and deliver some of the largest, most challenging and highest profile technology solutions in the world.

You'll work on innovative projects with colleagues to drive collaboration from strategy through to implementation. You will be using the latest technologies, with a particular focus on AI and GenAI, with clients to help them get to the next level.

You'll learn, grow and advance in an innovative culture that thrives on shared success, diverse ways of thinking and enables boundaryless opportunities that can drive your career in new and exciting ways

If you‚Äôre looking for a challenging career working in a vibrant environment with access to training and a global network of experts, this could be the role for you. As part of our team, you'll be working with cutting-edge technologies and will have the opportunity to develop a wide range of new skills on the job.

Your background will involve contributing across projects including software engineering, technology architecture solution implementation, product selection and application strategy definition, or the introduction of technology to drive business improvement into an operational organization.

Our team has the remit to operate in multiple industries, including Financial Services, Resources, Products, Communications and Health & Public Services.



Process



How to help clients to use AI/ML technologies to solve business challenges

How to design, develop, deploy, and run high quality AI/ML solutions across a range of industries with varying business and organizational challenges

The latest technology solutions from industry and how to apply them to solve real world customer problems

Design and build use-case and platform technology solutions to solve key business challenges using reference and cutting-edge technologies and engineering patterns

Work in multi-disciplinary teams to build complex solutions working from inception through to production and operations

Contribute to the technology strategy and solution design, managing and supporting other developers

Contribute to the Accenture Data & AI community, sharing insights and experience of using emerging technologies on client deliveries and through research



Your team

The Data and AI revolution is changing everything. It‚Äôs everywhere ‚Äì transforming how we work and play. Join Accenture and help transform leading organisations and communities around the world. Accenture Data and AI Science is driving these exciting changes and bringing them to life across 40 industries in more than 120 countries. The sheer scale of our capabilities and client engagements and the way we collaborate with the ecosystem, operate and deliver value provides an unparalleled opportunity to grow and advance.

Accenture‚Äôs Data and AI practice covers the range of Data and AI skills, from Strategy, Data Science, Data Architecture, AI Engineering and Visual Insights. When combined with Accenture‚Äôs broader Strategy and Consulting practice, we are able to bring together the unique ability to drive end to end business change through the application of Data and AI.

You'll learn, grow and advance in an innovative culture that thrives on shared success, diverse ways of thinking and enables boundaryless opportunities that can drive your career in new and exciting ways.

If you‚Äôre looking for a challenging career working in a vibrant environment with access to training and a global network of experts, this could be the role for you. As part of our global team, you'll be working with cutting-edge technologies and will have the opportunity to develop a wide range of new skills on the job.

Accenture is a leading global professional services company, providing a broad range of services in strategy and consulting, interactive, technology and operations, with digital capabilities across all of these services. With our thought leadership and culture of innovation, we apply industry expertise, diverse skill sets and next-generation technology to each business challenge.

We believe in inclusion and diversity and supporting the whole person. Our core values comprise of Stewardship, Best People, Client Value Creation, One Global Network, Respect for the Individual and Integrity. Year after year, Accenture is recognized worldwide not just for business performance but for inclusion and diversity too.

‚ÄúAcross the globe, one thing is universally true of the people of Accenture: We care deeply about what we do and the impact we have with our clients and with the communities in which we work and live. It is personal to all of us.‚Äù ‚Äì Julie Sweet, Accenture CEO

Your background



AI/ML platform technologies and services such as Sagemaker/Vertex/Azure ML, OpenAI, Langchain, AutoML, OCR, STT, feature stores, vector DB, ‚Ä¶

Implementation of AI/ML architectural patterns and best practices e.g. data drift detection, experimentation tracking, RAG, deployment models

Building and using cloud-based solutions (networking, security, storage, monitoring, scaling, DR/HA, ‚Ä¶) on one or more cloud platforms

SW Engineering and DevSecOps

Fluent in English, in Dutch and/or in French



Bonus point if you‚Ä¶



Certified cloud Machine Learning.

Building PoCs to aid learning

Experience of delivering production AI/ML services for scaled end user consumption



Our offer

Accenture is an incredible place to work - and keep learning. By joining us, you‚Äôll become part of a global company with a world-class brand and reputation. Besides the work we do for our clients, we‚Äôre really proud of our vibrant, diverse workplace culture. We believe in inclusion and diversity and supporting the whole person. Our core values comprise of Stewardship, Best People, Client Value Creation, One Global Network, Respect for the Individual and Integrity. Year after year, Accenture is recognized worldwide not just for business performance but for inclusion and diversity too.

We want to get to know the real you and help you explore and grow - whatever it is you're great at. So you will always have lots of learning opportunities (formal and informal) to improve your role-specific skills and expertise.

Besides our high-profile, challenging projects and our nurturing work environment, we offer excellent employee benefits, including:



13th month + holiday allowance

20 + 12 holidays

Laptop and smartphone

Hospitalization insurance and extensive group insurance package

Bonus program

Unique training & learning opportunities beyond your role specifics

Green mobility program: e-bikes, public transport, bike 2 work allowance,‚Ä¶

Flexrewards: decide on your rewards package with our flexible benefits tool

Discount program: get discounts at your favorite (online) shops

Employee shares purchase plan

Eco-cheques

And many more!



Show more

Title: Artificial Intelligence Engineer
Description:
AI Engineer Intern ( Fully Remote)




Position: AI Engineer / Automation Developer

Location: Morocco

Employment Type: Internship




About the Role

We are looking for an experienced AI Engineer to design, develop, and deploy a suite of intelligent agents that automate recruitment and business workflows. The first project involves integrating with Bullhorn‚Äôs REST API to perform tasks such as job parsing, candidate search, shortlist creation, and personalized communications. Additional agents in our roadmap will interact with other systems (CRM, email, calendars, document processing) to streamline operations across multiple departments.




Key Responsibilities

Design and Architecture: Work with stakeholders to understand workflow requirements and translate them into agent‚Äëbased solutions. Design modular, scalable architectures for automated agents.
API Integration: Implement secure integrations with external services (e.g. Bullhorn CRM) using REST APIs and OAuth 2.0. Handle token management, session renewal, and rate limiting.
Workflow Automation: Develop agents that can parse job descriptions, build Boolean search queries, retrieve candidate data, and create job submissions or other records via API calls.
NLP & Data Extraction: Use natural language processing techniques to extract key skills, locations, and language requirements from unstructured text (job descriptions, resumes).
Email and Notification Services: Integrate with email providers or messaging APIs to send personalized communications to candidates and team members. Implement templating and personalization logic.
AI & ML Integration (future projects): Build or integrate machine‚Äëlearning models to rank candidates, recommend matches, or summarize documents as needed by other agents.
Deployment & DevOps: Package agents for deployment on cloud platforms or serverless environments. Ensure appropriate logging, monitoring, and alerting are in place.
Security & Compliance: Adhere to data privacy regulations (e.g. GDPR), secure storage of secrets (client IDs, secrets, passwords), and best practices for API usage.
Documentation & Collaboration: Produce clear documentation of APIs, workflows, and agent behavior. Collaborate with non‚Äëtechnical stakeholders to refine requirements and demonstrate prototypes.




Required Skills & Experience

Programming Expertise: Strong proficiency in Python or JavaScript/Node.js; experience with asynchronous programming and HTTP client libraries (requests, axios, etc.).
API & OAuth: Hands‚Äëon experience integrating with REST APIs that use OAuth 2.0 for authentication and authorization. Comfortable handling tokens, refresh flows, and error states.
Automation & Scripting: Proven ability to build automation scripts or bots that interact with multiple services, parse data, and perform CRUD operations via APIs.
Natural Language Processing: Familiarity with NLP techniques for keyword extraction, entity recognition, or text classification using libraries like spaCy, NLTK, or Hugging Face.
Data Parsing & Search: Experience constructing complex search queries (e.g. Boolean searches) and processing large sets of results.
Cloud & DevOps: Understanding of deployment on AWS, Azure, or GCP (Lambda, Cloud Functions, or containerized services). Experience with CI/CD pipelines and monitoring tools.
Version Control & Collaboration: Proficiency with Git and collaborative workflows (pull requests, code reviews).
Problem Solving & Communication: Strong analytical skills, ability to break down complex tasks, and communicate technical concepts to non‚Äëtechnical stakeholders.




Preferred/Bonus Skills

Prior experience with recruitment technologies (Bullhorn, ATS/CRM systems) or HR domain knowledge.
Experience with Zapier or other low‚Äëcode automation platforms and understanding when to use custom code vs. off‚Äëthe‚Äëshelf integrations.
Familiarity with front‚Äëend technologies if agent outputs are surfaced in dashboards or internal tools.

Title: Junior Digital Intelligence & Data Analyst
Description:
About Ogilvy Social.lab

Ogilvy Social.Lab (OSL) is a full-service advertising agency headquartered in Brussels‚Äô WPP Campus. As part of the international Ogilvy network, our operations span four continents with over 15 nationalities on the 130-strong team working in our offices ‚Äì our mindset is borderless.

We proudly collaborate with prominent international and regional clients, including Absolut, Mondelez, Ford, IKEA, Nestl√©, EU and Belgian institutions, fuelling their success internationally.

Entrepreneurship pulses through our veins, embodying our name with a "lab‚Äù mentality. We constantly innovate and experiment, staying in sync with the ever-evolving digital media landscape we specialize in.

ROLE

As a Digital Intelligence & Data Analyst, you‚Äôll help uncover meaningful insights from social, digital, and search data to support strategic thinking and creative development. You‚Äôll explore what people are saying, sharing, and searching online to better understand audience behaviours, identify cultural trends, and help shape recommendations for leading international brands.

This role is perfect for someone who‚Äôs naturally curious about people and culture, excited by the ever-changing digital world, and eager to grow in a collaborative, social-first agency environment.

Responsibilities


Support the analysis of social and digital data using tools like Talkwalker, Tubular, RivalIQ, Semrush, GlobalWebIndex, and proprietary OSL dashboards.
Help build clear, insightful reports that highlight audience behaviors, cultural trends, and campaign opportunities.
Work closely with strategists and planners to contribute data that informs content and communication strategies.
Assist in developing regular social listening and trend-monitoring reports.
Participate in client presentations and internal meetings to share insights in a clear and engaging way.
Collaborate with data teams across Ogilvy and WPP, as well as third-party providers.
Stay curious about the digital world; new platforms, tools, formats, and audience behaviours.


PROFILE


1‚Äì3 years of experience in digital, social, or search data analytics, insights, or related roles.
Strong interest in digital culture, social media trends, and emerging technologies.
Familiar with tools such as Talkwalker, Tubular, RivalIQ, GlobalWebIndex, Brandwatch, Meltwater, Semrush, or similar (training can be provided).
Comfortable working with both quantitative and qualitative data and turning findings into simple, useful insights.
A basic understanding of digital performance metrics (organic and paid) across key platforms.
Proficient in English. French or Dutch is a plus.
Curious, detail-oriented, and motivated to learn from more senior analysts and strategists.
Good communicator with strong reporting and visualization skills (Excel, PowerPoint, Google Slides, or data viz tools).
A team player who thrives in a collaborative, fast-moving environment.


OFFER


Full-time opportunity in an ever-growing, trendsetting advertising agency based in the greenest building in Brussels - the new WPP Campus.
Work alongside a team of diverse and people-focused individuals, on impactful projects and with an array of local, regional, and global clients.
We are committed to keeping our environmental footprint low and ensuring that our work is ethical.
We thrive on transparency - Our words and promises produce actions.
Attractive package and benefits
Strong flexibility plan
Continuous training opportunities
As an Ogilvy Social.Lab employee, you will be provided with continuous opportunities to grow through training and career conversations while doing strong work that works.

  • Assist in developing regular social listening and trend-monitoring reports.
  • Participate in client presentations and internal meetings to share insights in a clear and engaging way.
  • Collaborate with data teams across Ogilvy and WPP, as well as third-party providers.
  • Stay curious about the digital world; new platforms, tools, formats, and audience behaviours.

PROFILE

  • 1‚Äì3 years of experience in digital, social, or search data analytics, insights, or related roles.
  • Strong interest in digital culture, social media trends, and emerging technologies.
  • Familiar with tools such as Talkwalker, Tubular, RivalIQ, GlobalWebIndex, Brandwatch, Meltwater, Semrush, or similar (training can be provided).
  • Comfortable working with both quantitative and qualitative data and turning findings into simple, useful insights.
  • A basic understanding of digital performance metrics (organic and paid) across key platforms.
  • Proficient in English. French or Dutch is a plus.
  • Curious, detail-oriented, and motivated to learn from more senior analysts and strategists.
  • Good communicator with strong reporting and visualization skills (Excel, PowerPoint, Google Slides, or data viz tools).
  • A team player who thrives in a collaborative, fast-moving environment.

OFFER

  • Full-time opportunity in an ever-growing, trendsetting advertising agency based in the greenest building in Brussels - the new WPP Campus.
  • Work alongside a team of diverse and people-focused individuals, on impactful projects and with an array of local, regional, and global clients.
  • We are committed to keeping our environmental footprint low and ensuring that our work is ethical.
  • We thrive on transparency - Our words and promises produce actions.
  • Attractive package and benefits
  • Strong flexibility plan
  • Continuous training opportunities
  • As an Ogilvy Social.Lab employee, you will be provided with continuous opportunities to grow through training and career conversations while doing strong work that works.

Title: Programme Assistant (Turkey)
Description:
Location: Brussels, Belgium

Starting: 1 January 2026

Contract type: Two-year fixed-term, with possible extension

Salary: Approx. ‚Ç¨3,730 gross/month + benefits

Deadline: 30 September 2025 at midnight Brussels time

Precision, perspective, purpose.

At the European Endowment for Democracy (EED), we stand behind people working for democratic change in difficult environments ‚Äî where civic space is restricted and political pressure is high. Our support is fast, flexible, and grounded in trust.

We're now looking for a Programme Assistant to join our team working on Turkey and the broader region. This is a dynamic role where you'll support the full cycle of EED grant-making: from assessing applications to supporting grantees, write reports, and stay connected with one another. You'll track developments on the ground, liaise with local partners, and help make sure our support remains sharp and relevant.

This is an opportunity for someone detail-oriented, collaborative with great analytical and critical thinking skills ‚Äî someone who thrives in a mission-driven environment and is ready to grow.

What You'll Do

Working under as part of the Programmes Team you will report to the Turkey Programme Manager and your responsibilities will include:


Supporting the assessment of incoming applications
Assisting with follow-up communication and coaching of applicants during the review process
Assisting with monitoring the progress of ongoing initiatives, including reviewing narrative reports and gathering insights from the field
Assisting in drafting reports to donors and internal programme documentation
Supporting coordination with the Communications team and contributing to the visibility of initiatives
Assisting with the organisation of grantee exchanges, learning sessions, and community-building activities
Supporting programme-related events, both in Brussels and the region
Undertaking outreach and monitoring missions, where needed
Staying up to date with political developments and trends relevant to EED's work in Turkey and the broader region


What You Bring

You have:


A university degree in political or social sciences, international affairs, law, development, or a related field
At least one year of full-time professional experience in civil society-related projects or programmes
Full professional fluency in English
Good working knowledge of Turkish (spoken and written)


You are:


Organised, focused, and comfortable managing multiple timelines
A clear communicator who works well with partners and colleagues
Collaborative and culturally aware, with high personal and professional integrity
Motivated by purpose ‚Äî and able to connect your daily tasks to a broader mission


Bonus points for:


Experience working directly with civil society in Turkey
Knowledge of EU policies toward Turkey or the broader neighbourhood
Experience supporting media development or independent journalism
Experience with compliance, budgeting, or donor reporting tools; Experience in grant-making, project cycle management or donor reporting


Why Join Us?


Meaningful work: Help support grassroots efforts defending democracy and rights in one of the world's most challenging contexts
A smart, international and diverse team: Join colleagues who care about impact and work collaboratively across regions and disciplines
Benefits that matter: Our package includes complementary health insurance (CIGNA), meal vouchers, public transport or bike allowance, 13th month salary, holiday pay, paid leave, parental leave options, and annual training opportunities


How To Apply

Please apply online via our recruitment portal. Your application must include:


Your CV in Europass format
A one-page motivation letter
Contact details for three professional references


Interviews will take place in Brussels. A written test may be organised.

Please note: We do not accept queries by phone, email, or letter. All data is handled in accordance with EU legislation. Pre-employment screening and criminal records checks are part of the recruitment process.

Title: AI Business Analyst
Description:
At Uni Systems, we are working towards turning digital visions into reality. We are continuously growing and we are looking for a professional AI Business Analyst to join our UniQue Brussels team

What will you be bringing to the team?

Collect business requirements and analyse advanced AI solutions or identify and assess relevant existing data mining, machine learning and business intelligence solutions.
Develop detailed application mock-ups using design tools, ensuring alignment with business objectives and user needs.
Analyse large datasets to uncover actionable insights.
Ensure strict compliance with GDPR and emerging AI regulations in all stages of data processing.
Facilitate effective communication and collaboration between business stakeholders, data scientists, and IT developers.
Conduct user acceptance testing to meet business requirements.
Specification and design of presentation interfaces with optimal usability/user experience.
Produce data models according to specific problem statements.
Contribute to the design and implementation of the analytics architecture and its solution stack (including performance aspects, physical design, capacity dimensions, etc.).
Write the different documentation associated with the tasks and liaise with other project teams as necessary to address cross-project interdependencies.
Interact with data stewards and other IT stakeholders to define the data rules.
Define data controls and implement actions to ensure data quality and integrity.
Create automated anomaly detection systems and constant tracking of their performance.
Data mining using state-of-the-art methods.
Processing, cleansing, and verifying the integrity of data used for analysis.
Participate in the design of IT architecture for solutions in the NLP / ML / AI fields and coordinate its implementation considering master- and meta-data management concepts.
Analyse data architecture for consistency, completeness, accuracy and reasonableness.
Contribute to the analysis of data management vision, strategy and policy and derive the IT requirements.
Analysis and documentation of business requirements.
Business model and process analysis, including modelling.
Functional requirements and business case analysis.
Risk analysis.
Assistance in business cases, vision documents, project charters and security plans



Requirements



What do you need to succeed in this position?

Expertise in machine learning techniques and algorithms, and Large Language Models.
Experience in predictive (forecasting, recommendation), prescriptive (simulation), sentiment analysis, topic detection, social media crawling and processing, plagiarism detection, trends/anomalies detection in datasets, recommendation systems.
Knowledge of graph databases.
Application UI/UX design.
NLP systems lifecycle and agile software development methodologies.
Data analytics over big datasets, non-structured databases as well as data lakes.
Information systems and large organisation administrative business processes.
Analysis/modelling tools and techniques (use case diagram, state diagram, entity relationship model, interaction diagrams, etc.).
BPMN, UML or equivalent.
Wiki and collaborative sites.
Software development methodologies (e.g., RUP, Agile).
Data analytics techniques and tools.
Experience in machine learning and natural language processing.
Programming in R, Python, PERL.
SQL tooling (NoSQL DB, MongoDB, Hadoop, SQL).
Architectural design and implementation of scalable modern data stores.
Strong capacity in preparing and writing business analysis.
Ability to address both business and technical audiences.
High-level presentation skills.
Communication and interpersonal skills to collaborate with cross-functional teams, conduct training sessions, and promote data governance best practices.
English C1 and French +B1.

At Uni Systems, we are providing equal employment opportunities and banning any form of discrimination on grounds of gender, religion, race, color, nationality, disability, social class, political beliefs, age, marital status, sexual orientation or any other characteristics. Take a look at‚ÄØour Diversity, Equality & Inclusion Policy‚ÄØfor more information.¬†

Title: Generative AI Engineer
Description:
We are seeking a business-minded GenAI Solutions Engineer to help deliver cutting-edge AI initiatives. You will bridge technology and business, shaping real-world applications of Generative AI in a complex IT environment.




What you will do

Identify high-impact business use cases for Generative AI together with stakeholders
Design, implement, and deploy scalable AI/GenAI models on Azure and related cloud platforms
Fine-tune, monitor, and optimize LLMs throughout their lifecycle (LLMOps best practices)
Collaborate with cross-functional teams on POCs, pilots, and industrialization of AI solutions
Establish internal frameworks, standards, and tooling for GenAI adoption
Communicate insights and progress clearly to business and technical stakeholders




What you bring

Master‚Äôs degree in a quantitative or technical discipline
5‚Äì8 years professional experience in data science, AI, or advanced analytics in a business setting
Strong business acumen and ability to translate business needs into technical solutions
Solid expertise in Python (Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, etc.)
Hands-on experience with Azure AI/ML stack, Databricks, CI/CD, GitHub workflows
Deep knowledge of LLM frameworks (LangChain, Semantic Kernel, Promptflow, Autogen, etc.)
Proven track record in deploying and monitoring GenAI models in production
Fluency in English; knowledge of Dutch or French is an asset




Interested? Apply immediately!

Title: Performance Engineer / Performance Analyst
Description:
About The Eclipse Foundation

The Eclipse Foundation is a globally recognized nonprofit that supports a vibrant ecosystem of open source projects and contributors. We provide a vendor-neutral, collaborative environment for innovation across industries including cloud, edge, AI, and developer tooling. Our team is remote-first, inclusive, and passionate about open source infrastructure and quality.

Position Summary

We‚Äôre seeking a Performance Engineer / Performance Analyst to help validate the performance and reliability of the Open VSX Registry. Reporting to the Senior Manager, Site Reliability Engineer, your role focuses on stress testing, quality assurance, and performance analysis to ensure the platform can scale and operate efficiently in production environments. You‚Äôll work closely with infrastructure and SRE teams to identify bottlenecks, resource constraints, and architectural inefficiencies.

What You‚Äôll Do


Design and execute stress tests to simulate high-load scenarios on critical services used by millions of community members, including the Open VSX Registry
Develop automated test suites for performance, reliability, and regression testing
Analyse system behavior under load and identify potential bottlenecks or failure points
Collaborate with development teams and infrastructure engineers to optimise resource usage and scalability
Document test results and provide actionable recommendations for improvements
Monitor system metrics and logs to assess performance trends over time
Contribute to quality assurance processes and release readiness reviews
Support incident analysis and postmortem investigations related to performance issues


What You‚Äôll Bring


3+ years of experience in software testing, QA, or performance engineering
Familiarity with Kubernetes, containerized environments, and cloud infrastructure
Experience with load testing tools (e.g., JMeter, Locust, k6) and observability platforms
Strong scripting skills (e.g., Python, Bash) and comfort with CI/CD pipelines
Ability to interpret system metrics and logs to diagnose performance issues
Excellent communication and documentation skills
Bonus: experience testing open source registries or developer platforms


Why Join Us


Flexible hours and remote-first culture
Opportunity to shape the reliability of a key open source service
Collaborative, mission-driven team environment
Competitive compensation for part-time or contract contributors


We thank all applicants for their interest; however, only those selected for an interview will be contacted. For more information about the Eclipse Foundation, please visit our website at eclipse.org.

The Eclipse Foundation respects the dignity and independence of people with disabilities and is committed to providing accommodation and support throughout any recruitment process. If you require any special accommodation or support, please let us know when applying.

Title: Innovation Engineer
Description:
Who are we?




The innovation mission of NVISO is to leverage technology as a pivotal enabler for pioneering cyber security services that have a positive impact on our customers, brand exposure and bottom-line. The Labs team collaborates with all business units by offering an innovation framework, ambassadorship and in-house expertise to transform the best ideas into impactful outcomes. Building a well-oiled machine where people like to work & inspire all birds to become internal innovators are at the heart of our mission.


Tasks


As an Innovation Engineer in the NVISO Labs team your responsibilities will include:





Perform technical exploratory innovation activities (develop a technology prototype with the team, running a Proof-of-Concept in collaboration with our (internal) customers, etc.).


Design, write, test and document software for use in cutting-edge security products & tools developed in NVISO Labs


Collaborating with cross-functional teams to integrate new technologies and methodologies into existing systems.


Engaging in continuous learning and development to stay updated with the latest industry trends and advancements.


Providing technical mentorship and guidance to junior team members to foster a culture of innovation and technical excellence.


Participating in brainstorming sessions and innovation workshops to contribute new ideas and solutions that address current and future cybersecurity challenges.



Requirements



You are eligible for NATO Clearance.


At least 3 years of relevant work experience in software or innovation engineering.


A master's degree in computer science or a related technical field.


Experience with Python and knowledge of additional programming languages.


Understanding of fundamental software & infrastructure design principles.


Experience with integrating new technologies and methodologies into existing systems.


Strong testing, troubleshooting and debugging skills.


Basic knowledge of secure software design and security best practices.


Excellent English communications skills, both verbal and written.


Strong interpersonal communication skills (oral & written) that enable effective work in a collaborative team environment (across the entire company).



Benefits


At NVISO, we care. We are committed to offering you a highly competitive remuneration package including financial and non-financial components:





A training budget of 10.000‚Ç¨ and 10 days every 2 years;


Company car and Belgian fuel card;


Working and learning from the best people in the European cyber security industry. We have multiple SANS Instructors working at NVISO, our staff has presented at popular hacking conferences (BlackHat, BruCON, OWASP, etc.) and all of our technical staff can acquire deep technical security certifications (GSE, GXPN, GREM, GCFA, OSCP, etc.);


An entrepreneurial and agile company, where you will be stimulated and supported in driving new initiatives (either through internal innovation or by improving our service offering), without losing sight of having fun!;


Regular team-building and fun events with legendary off-site events once a year. The location of the next team building is one of the most closely guarded secrets at NVISO‚Ä¶ We can however disclose that we‚Äôve visited Lisbon, Dubai and Malta over the past few years;


Our commitment to coach, counsel, and help you grow; each employee receives a personal coach within the team, whose role is to ensure your well-being and helps you grow in your career!;


Flexible working hours, homeworking and the possibility to work from abroad;


Flexible Income Plan;


32 Paid leaves.





IF YOU‚ÄôRE INTERESTED, PLEASE SEND US YOUR APPLICATION!




WE‚ÄôRE LOOKING FORWARD TO MEETING YOU!
