Title: Data Scientist (LLM)
Description:
Who we are:

CloudWalk is a fintech company reimagining the future of financial services. We are building intelligent infrastructure powered by AI, blockchain, and thoughtful design. Our products serve millions of entrepreneurs across Brazil and the US every day, helping them grow with tools that are fast, fair, and built for how business actually works. Learn more at cloudwalk.io .

Who We‚Äôre Looking For:

We‚Äôre hiring a Data Scientist focused on Large Language Models to join our AI R&D team. You‚Äôll work on designing, training, and optimizing LLMs that power real product features and internal tools. You‚Äôll touch everything from architecture and data preparation to multi-scale training and evaluation.

This is not a prompt engineering or RAG-focused role. We‚Äôre looking for someone who gets the math, understands the models, and knows how to write code that scales.

You‚Äôll work side-by-side with engineers, MLOps, and product teams to make our LLMs smarter, faster, and more useful.

What You'll Do:


Train and fine-tune LLMs using multi-GPU and distributed setups.
Analyze model performance, debug failures, and implement improvements.
Work with curated and synthetic datasets, including classification and generation tasks.
Design experiments, track results, and iterate quickly with tools like MLflow.
Write clean, production-ready code and collaborate via GitHub.
Push boundaries: think about architecture, memory efficiency, scale, and cost.


What We‚Äôre Looking For:


LLM understanding: You know how these models work under the hood - transformer internals, tokenization, embeddings, etc.
Stats and ML fundamentals: You have a solid foundation in statistics, machine learning, and optimization.
Coding skills: You write Python well. You‚Äôve worked with PyTorch or JAX. You don‚Äôt fear Bash or git.
Training experience: You‚Äôve trained models beyond notebooks. Bonus if you‚Äôve worked with mixed precision, DeepSpeed, or multi-node training.
Systems mindset: You understand trade-offs - throughput vs memory, latency vs accuracy.
Good judgment: You know when to read a paper, when to read a stack trace, and when to rewrite the dataloader or part of the LLM architecture.


Bonus Points:


Experience with Hugging Face Transformers, Datasets, Accelerate.
Familiarity with Kubernetes, Ray, or custom training infra.
Exposure to embeddings, classification tasks, or token-level losses.
Ability to mentor or guide junior researchers or engineers.


How We Hire:


Online assessment: Online assessment: technical logic and fundamentals (Math/Calculus, Statistics, Probability, Machine Learning/Deep Learning, Code).
Technical interview: dive into theory and reasoning (no code).
Cultural interview.


If you are not willing to take an online quiz, do not apply.

Diversity and inclusion:

We believe in social inclusion, respect, and appreciation of all people. We promote a welcoming work environment, where each CloudWalker can be authentic, regardless of gender, ethnicity, race, religion, sexuality, mobility, disability, or education.

Title: Data Science Research, Search (English, Portuguese)
Description:
Please submit your resume in English - we can only consider applications submitted in this language.

Minimum qualifications:


Master's degree in Statistics, Data Science, Mathematics, Physics, Economics, Operations Research, Engineering, or a related quantitative field.
3 years of experience using analytics to solve product or business problems, coding (e.g., Python, R, SQL), querying databases or statistical analysis, or a PhD degree.
Ability to communicate in English and Portuguese fluently to support client relationship management in this region.


Preferred qualifications:


5 years of experience using analytics to solve product or business problems, coding (e.g., Python, R, SQL), querying databases or statistical analysis, or a PhD degree.
4 years of experience analyzing data and creating reports with statistical, quantitative modeling, and forecasting skills.
3 years of experience in an applied research setting.
Experience with Python, R, or other scripting languages.
Experience in survey research.
Knowledge of statistics, and proficiency in one or more statistical software packages (e.g., R, SPSS, Stata, SAS).


About the jobAt Google, data drives all of our decision-making. Quantitative Analysts work all across the organization to help shape Google's business and technical strategies by processing, analyzing and interpreting huge data sets. Using analytical excellence and statistical methods, you mine through data to identify opportunities for Google and our clients to operate more efficiently, from enhancing advertising efficacy to network infrastructure optimization to studying user behavior. As an analyst, you do more than just crunch the numbers. You work with Engineers, Product Managers, Sales Associates and Marketing teams to adjust Google's practices according to your findings. Identifying the problem is only half the job; you also figure out the solution.

Google Research addresses challenges that define the technology of today and tomorrow. From conducting fundamental research to influencing product development, our research teams have the opportunity to impact technology used by billions of people every day.

Our teams aspire to make discoveries that impact everyone, and core to our approach is sharing our research and tools to fuel progress in the field -- we publish regularly in academic journals, release projects as open source, and apply research to Google products.

Responsibilities


Collaborate with stakeholders in cross-projects and team settings to identify and clarify business or product questions to answer. Provide feedback to translate and refine business questions into tractable analysis, evaluation metrics, or mathematical models.
Use custom data infrastructure or existing data models as appropriate, using specialized knowledge. Design and evaluate models to mathematically express and solve defined problems with limited precedent.
Gather information, business goals, priorities, and organizational context around the questions to answer, as well as the existing and upcoming data infrastructure.
Own the process of gathering, extracting, and compiling data across sources via relevant tools (e.g., SQL, R, Python). Separately format, re-structure, or validate data to ensure quality, and review the dataset to ensure it is ready for analysis.



Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing our Accommodations for Applicants form .

Title: Data Scientist (Core ML & Statistics)
Description:
Who we are:

CloudWalk is a fintech company reimagining the future of financial services. We are building intelligent infrastructure powered by AI, blockchain, and thoughtful design. Our products serve millions of entrepreneurs across Brazil and the US every day, helping them grow with tools that are fast, fair, and built for how business actually works. Learn more at cloudwalk.io .

About the Role:

We‚Äôre hiring a Data Scientist with strong foundations in statistics, causal inference, and experimental design. Your work will be centered on rigorous analysis: designing robust experiments, validating assumptions, and extracting clear insights from complex data. This is not a ‚Äúdashboards and KPIs‚Äù role ‚Äî it‚Äôs about applying statistical thinking and careful modeling to answer hard questions and guide product direction.

We want someone who can think critically with data, separate signal from noise, and provide results that stand up to scrutiny.

What You'll Do:


Design, run, and analyze A/B tests and other experimental frameworks.
Apply statistical inference, hypothesis testing, and causal analysis to evaluate product changes.
Build, tune, and interpret classical ML models (regression, classification, ranking) with a focus on explainability and robustness.
Use rigorous exploratory analysis to uncover hidden patterns or validate product hypotheses.
Develop reproducible workflows for experimentation and modeling.
Collaborate with product and engineering to ensure experiments and analyses translate into well-grounded decisions.
Contribute to a culture of statistical rigor, clarity, and curiosity.


What We Value:


Deep understanding of statistics, probability, and causal inference.
Comfort moving between theory and practice: from modeling assumptions to implementation details.
Clear, precise communication of methods, assumptions, and results.
Patience to validate before scaling, and rigor in separating correlation from causation.


Bonus Points:


Experience with uplift modeling.
Experience in product analytics or growth-focused DS.
Experience working with Airflow, BigQuery, dbt, or similar data infra.
Experience in training and shipping models to production.
Familiarity with basic experimentation pitfalls (SRM, novelty effects, power issues).


How We Hire:


Online assessment: technical logic and fundamentals (Math/Calculus, Statistics, Probability, Machine Learning/Deep Learning, Code).
Technical interview: deep dive into theory and reasoning for fraud detection (no code).
Cultural interview.


If you are not willing to take an online quiz, do not apply.

Title: Data Scientist (Risk)
Description:
About CloudWalk:

We are not just another fintech unicorn. We are a pack of dreamers, makers, and tech enthusiasts building the future of payments. With millions of happy customers and a hunger for innovation, we're now expanding our neural network - literally and metaphorically.

About The Team:

The Risk Team is responsible for building the defense layer that keeps CloudWalk, its merchants, and users safe. We keep our ecosystem healthy by tracking down malicious activity and maintaining regulatory compliance while providing the best user experience. You will be part of a multidisciplinary team comprising risk analysts, data scientists, and software engineers, working collaboratively to enhance our risk management strategies.

About The Job:

As a Data Scientist on our Risk Team, your role is crucial in developing and optimizing machine learning models to detect and prevent fraud. You will be a key player in analyzing data, building predictive models, and implementing robust data-driven strategies to enhance our risk management processes.

You will bridge the gap between theoretical data science and practical, scalable solutions in the fintech sector, with a specific focus on risk assessment and mitigation. Your work will involve handling large-scale datasets, extracting meaningful insights, and developing sophisticated algorithms to protect our ecosystem.

What You'll Need to Succeed:


Fluency in Python and SQL.
Proficient in ML libraries like Scikit, PyTorch, TensorFlow, etc.
Experience with cloud-based services like the Google Cloud platform.
Solid Data Visualization skills to create charts and dashboards.
Strong analytical skills, ability to collect, organize, analyze, and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracy.
Detail-oriented with a strong research mindset.
As a member of a fully remote and distributed team, you are expected to complete tasks autonomously, being highly collaborative and self-driven. We expect you to have the curiosity of a child with the responsibility of a grown-up.
Communication skills. You should be able to communicate effectively with multiple teams.
Ability to communicate and debate in English and Portuguese.


Nice-to-have skills:


Experience with financial or payment industry.
Knowledge of distributed systems and parallel computing.
DevOps practices: Understanding DevOps practices, including continuous integration, continuous deployment, and containerization.


The Future We See:

At CloudWalk, we envision a future where AI empowers every field to reach new heights:


People teams leveraging AI to transform talent acquisition and employee development.
Marketing professionals creating data-driven, AI-powered campaign strategies.
Customer Success teams enhancing client experiences with intelligent solutions.
Risk analysts combining human expertise with AI to navigate complexities.
Designers collaborating with AI to push creative boundaries.


Join us at CloudWalk, where we‚Äôre not just engineering solutions; we‚Äôre building a smarter, AI-driven future for payments‚Äîtogether.

By applying for this position, your data will be processed as per CloudWalk's Privacy Policy that you can read here in Portuguese and here in English.

Title: Banco de Talentos (Data Scientist, Brazil - BCG X)
Description:
Who We Are

Boston Consulting Group partners with leaders in business and society to tackle their most important challenges and capture their greatest opportunities. BCG was the pioneer in business strategy when it was founded in 1963. Today, we help clients with total transformation-inspiring complex change, enabling organizations to grow, building competitive advantage, and driving bottom-line impact.

To succeed, organizations must blend digital and human capabilities. Our diverse, global teams bring deep industry and functional expertise and a range of perspectives to spark change. BCG delivers solutions through leading-edge management consulting along with technology and design, corporate and digital ventures‚Äîand business purpose. We work in a uniquely collaborative model across the firm and throughout all levels of the client organization, generating results that allow our clients to thrive.

We Are BCG X

We‚Äôre a diverse team of more than 3,000 tech experts united by a drive to make a difference. Working across industries and disciplines, we combine our experience and expertise to tackle the biggest challenges faced by society today. We go beyond what was once thought possible, creating new and innovative solutions to the world‚Äôs most complex problems. Leveraging BCG‚Äôs global network and partnerships with leading organizations, BCG X provides a stable ecosystem for talent to build game-changing businesses, products, and services from the ground up, all while growing their career. Together, we strive to create solutions that will positively impact the lives of millions.

What You'll Do

We are seeking strong candidates with advanced analytics experience to start an exciting consultant career within BCG X. We are looking for profiles with a background in any area related to predictive analytics, machine learning, optimization/operations as well as risk. BCG X offers a unique opportunity to join a vibrant team of data scientists applying the most advanced analytics techniques in a rewarding environment.

What You'll Bring

Education & Experience


Bachelor‚Äôs, Master's or Advanced degree with excellent academic achievements in a field linked to computer science, applied mathematics, statistics, machine learning, or related data centric areas
Relevant internships or post-college industry or consulting experience
Experience in core analytics methods (e.g. Machine Learning, Optimization, Deep Learning, etc.)
Fluency in at least one scripting language (e.g. Python, R)
Deep technical and data science expertise, strong passion for data science topics
Excellent analytical skills and strategic thinking, creative problem solver
Strong interpersonal credibility, reliability, and service mentality, high ethical standards
Excellent written and verbal communication skills in Portuguese and English


Technical competencies


Experience in core analytics methods (e.g. Machine Learning/Deep Learning, Optimization/Operational Research, Geoanalytics, Predictive Modeling, Autonomous Agents, Network Analysis, etc‚Ä¶)
Familiarity with a broad base of analytics tools (Data management; Analytics platforms / Programming ‚Äì e.g. Python, R ; Data Visualization, etc‚Ä¶)
Experience in applied analytics for business problem solving/experience building analytical solutions


Additional info

#BCGXjob

Boston Consulting Group is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity / expression, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected under national, provincial, or local law, where applicable, and those with criminal histories will be considered in a manner consistent with applicable state and local laws.

Title: 2025 Applied Scientist internship, Brazil
Description:
About The Internship

We're looking for an Applied Scientist intern to join our Safety and Insurance team to provide data expertise as we work to make this world a safer place to move around.

The team works closely with partners to build new product features, implement machine learning algorithms, and optimize safety policies to help reduce safety incidents and make it safer for riders, drivers, eaters, restaurants, and all people who use Uber's platform.

This team pursues some of the hardest problems in all of Uber: improving the safety of cities and people all over the world. This position focuses on algorithmic solutions to understanding and improving interpersonal safety.

We use real-time telematics and motion sensing technologies along with machine learning algorithms and user-facing mobile products in order to prevent unsafe behaviors on the Uber platform.

The team's work touches all parts of the Uber experience from dispatch to on-trip and post-trip, as well as the Uber ecosystem ranging from our rides business to other newer Uber marketplaces, and ventures.

In this role, you will get to work closely with our product and design teams to build intuitive experiences and ship efficient, reliable, crash-free code that reaches millions of users.

With #standforsafety being a company priority, our team is uniquely positioned to define what it means to be a safe ride sharing/delivery platform and in the process, making safety a key competitive advantage for our brand.

What You'll Do


Work with a mentor closely to define a business problem, scope a project, develop, and prototype the solution using data-driven approaches
Perform deep-dive analyses to discover root causes for safety issues and changes in trends
Present findings to leaders to inform decisions
Support statistical and machine learning efforts including modeling, experimentation, signal processing, time series analysis, geospatial analysis, natural language processing, and more
Pull data for analysis, build readouts for scientific experiments, opportunity sizing analyses, rule creation, review work by team members, and present results to the team.


Basic Qualifications


Education: Enrolled in a Bachelor's or Master's degree program for the full duration of the internship
Graduation : Expected graduation date between July and December 2026
Skills: SQL, Analytics, programming languages(Python and R), Excel and Statistics
English proficiency: Able to present ideas in a comprehensive, yet succinct manner
Available to start in Q4/ 2025* and work 30 hours a week for 12 months - hybrid mode (mandatory to be Monday & Wednesday @ the office in Sao Paulo city)


Preferred Qualifications


Communication : Using interpersonal skills and situational awareness to clearly deliver information to a variety of audiences
Skills: SQL; Strong data analytics; experimentation (e.g. Metric Identification, Impact Measurement, etc.); Precision and Recall
Planning and Organization : Setting up and maintaining systems to appropriately structure and keep track of tasks and projects
Problem Solving : Effectively resolving issues that involve people, things, and processes by using logic and common sense
Stakeholder Management : Taking time to build meaningful relationships; earning the trust of others within the organization through strong situational awareness and reliability
Teamwork : Demonstrates optimism, respects others, and works well in a team


Internship @ Uber

We offer a competitive monthly internship allowance, Uber credits and much more!

You have the rare chance to create a global impact - we're moving real people and assets and reinventing transportation and logistics. We offer expansive mentorship from Uber employees to guide you through your internship experience and for you to build personal connections and friendships with hardworking people who share your passion for technology
Show more

Title: Desenvolvedor Jr ML Development (P&D)
Description:
We‚Äôre looking for a professional to join our team in S√£o Paulo.

üìç Location: S√£o Paulo ‚Äì Hybrid (up to 2x per week on-site, if needed)

üíº Contract: PJ (Independent Contractor)

üí∞ Compensation: Competitive fee aligned with current market standards

If you‚Äôre interested or know someone who might be a great fit, please get in touch!




The ideal candidate will be responsible for conceptualizing and executing clear, quality code to develop the best software. You will test your code, identify errors, and iterate to ensure quality code. You will also support our customers and partners by troubleshooting any of their software issues.¬†

¬†

ML Programming & Frameworks:

Basic understanding of Python and its use in data science.

Familiarity with core ML libraries such as NumPy, Pandas, and Scikit-learn.

Basic knowledge of deep learning frameworks like TensorFlow or PyTorch.

Understanding of fundamental machine learning concepts (e.g., supervised vs. unsupervised learning, regression, classification).

Large Language Models (LLMs) & Generative AI:

Basic understanding of Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) architecture, including concepts like retrievers, vector databases, and how external knowledge is used to augment LLM prompts.

Familiarity with the basic concepts of fine-tuning LLMs for specific tasks or domains (e.g., understanding that it involves further training a pre-trained model on a smaller, specialized dataset).




Databases & Data Management:

Fundamental understanding of relational databases like PostgreSQL or MySQL for data storage.

Basic knowledge of NoSQL databases like MongoDB.

Ability to write simple database queries to extract data for ML models.

Familiarity with data manipulation and cleaning techniques.




Architecture & Infrastructure:

Basic understanding of how ML models are integrated into applications.

Awareness of basic data pipelines and model deployment concepts.

Development Tools & Processes:

Proficiency with Git for version control (cloning, committing, pushing, pulling).

Understanding of collaborative workflows (e.g., pull requests).

Basic understanding of CI/CD pipelines (e.g., GitHub Actions) for ML model deployment is a plus.

Testing & Debugging:

Basic understanding of the importance of model evaluation and testing (e.g., metrics like accuracy, precision, recall).

Ability to use debugging tools to identify and fix simple issues in ML code.




Nice to Have

DevOps & Cloud:

Curiosity about deployment processes for ML models and cloud platforms, specifically services for generative AI like AWS Bedrock, Google Vertex AI (especially its generative AI features), or Azure OpenAI Service / Azure Machine Learning Studio.

Basic understanding of Docker for containerizing ML applications.

Security Best Practices:

Awareness of data privacy and security considerations in ML.

Any personal ML projects, Kaggle participation, or contributions to open-source ML initiatives.




Required Behavioral Skills




Collaboration & Communication:

Willingness to work effectively within a team.

Ability to clearly articulate thoughts and ask questions, especially regarding data and model insights.




Problem Solving & Initiative:

Eagerness to learn and tackle new challenges in machine learning.

Proactive in seeking solutions and asking for help when needed.




Adaptability & Continuous Learning:

Strong desire to learn new ML technologies, algorithms, and research.

Openness to feedback and continuous improvement.




Language Requirements

Language: Good spoken and written English is required.

Title: AI Engineer
Description:
Our client is an innovative AI company building the future of healthcare with AI doctors and nurses, starting in Latin America. Their mission is to reinvent healthcare delivery in the region with AI-native medical solutions. This is an urgent hiring process for a high-impact role. You will have a unique opportunity to be the first AI Engineer in the San Francisco office, helping to shape both the product and the team from the ground up.

Our client is seeking an experienced AI Engineer with a strong backend focus. This is a role for a hands-on builder who can quickly translate non-technical requirements from a strong medical team into production-ready code. You will own product features end-to-end, from conception to deployment, and will have the potential to lead the AI engineering team in the SF office.

You will be responsible for:


Developing and deploying Python microservices using FastAPI
Implementing LLM orchestration with tools like LangChain or CrewAI
Building frontend prototypes using React/Tailwind or Flutter
Applying production experience with RAG, vector databases, and evaluation systems
Designing and implementing data pipeline architectures for AI applications
Working closely with the medical team to translate clinical requirements into AI solutions


Requirements

We are looking for a fast-moving, hands-on engineer who has a proven ability to ship quickly and reliably.

Must-Haves:


2-5 years of experience in AI application development with a heavy backend focus
Proven ability to ship quickly without sacrificing quality
Familiarity with top AI companies and a sense of "what great looks like."
Strong experience with Python microservices (FastAPI) and LLM orchestration (LangChain, CrewAI)
Hands-on experience with AI agents, APIs, RAG, and vector databases
Openness to working on-site in one of the listed locations: San Francisco, S√£o Paulo, or Medell√≠n


Bonus Points:


A background in Physics or Math
Experience in healthcare AI
Fluency in Spanish or Portuguese
Experience at a top AI company like OpenAI, Anthropic, or DeepMind


Benefits


Salary: $100,000-$300,000
Equity: Generous
Visa Sponsorship: Not specified


Due to the high volume of applications we anticipate, we regret that we are unable to provide individual feedback to all candidates. If you do not hear back from us within 4 weeks of your application, please assume that you have not been successful on this occasion. We genuinely appreciate your interest and wish you the best in your job search.

Commitment to Equality and Accessibility:

At MLabs, we are committed to offer equal opportunities to all candidates. We ensure no discrimination, accessible job adverts, and providing information in accessible formats. Our goal is to foster a diverse, inclusive workplace with equal opportunities for all. If you need any reasonable adjustments during any part of the hiring process or you would like to see the job-advert in an accessible format please let us know at the earliest opportunity by emailing human-resources@mlabs.city.

MLabs Ltd collects and processes the personal information you provide such as your contact details, work history, resume, and other relevant data for recruitment purposes only. This information is managed securely in accordance with MLabs Ltd's Privacy Policy and Information Security Policy, and in compliance with applicable data protection laws. Your data may be shared only with clients and trusted partners where necessary for recruitment purposes. You may request the deletion of your data or withdraw your consent at any time by contacting legal@mlabs.city.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
Company overview:

Blue Orange Digital is a boutique data & AI consultancy that delivers enterprise-grade results. We design and build modern data platforms, analytics, and ML/AI Agent solutions for mid‚Äëmarket and enterprise clients across Private Equity, Financial Services, Healthcare, and Retail.

Our teams work with technologies like Databricks, Snowflake, dbt, and the broader Microsoft ecosystem to turn messy, real-world data into trustworthy, actionable insight.

We‚Äôre a builder‚Äëled, client‚Äëfirst culture that prizes ownership, clear communication, and shipping high‚Äëimpact work.

Position overview:

Blue Orange is seeking to expand our Team of expert consultants with an experienced Machine Learning Engineer to address a set of expanding opportunities in the next several months. The ideal candidate will possess a deep passion for machine learning, AI tech and innovative data solutions with proficiency in advanced machine learning techniques, strong skills in programming languages such as Python, expertise around data analytics and feature engineering, experience working with some of the main ML and D frameworks, a proven track record of working with cloud-native solutions in at least 1 of the main clouds (AWS, GCP, Azure, or Snowflake, etc.), MLOps and LLMs, and strong proficiency in the end-to-end ML/AI cycle, from ideation to production. The candidate will play a crucial role in driving our machine-learning initiatives forward. The candidate will have excellent communication skills to collaborate with technical and non-technical stakeholders effectively.

At Blue Orange, you'll have the opportunity to work on cutting-edge projects, leveraging modern machine-learning and AI techniques to deliver tangible business outcomes and drive innovation in our data-driven solutions.

Note: Please submit your resume in English, as all application materials must be in English for review and consideration.

Responsibilities:


Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and design to productionize Gen AI solutions into practical product driven applications.
Design and implement application integrations to leverage newly build GenAI Products.
Build solutions that improve delivery speed and scalability of product pipelines.
Leverage managed and serverless cloud offerings to create performant and scalable cloud native application solutions and data pipelines.
Experiment with retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) approaches to improve the relevance and coherence of AI-generated outputs.
Work closely with GenAI engineers and researchers to integrate prompt engineering and RAG components into production systems and ensure seamless deployment.
Stay up to date with the latest advancements in prompt engineering, RAG, data science, machine learning, and AI technologies, and explore innovative approaches to enhance Gen AI capabilities.


Requirements:


Experience with NLP and LLM-based technologies and frameworks.
Proficiency in programming languages such as Python and JavaScript is preferred.
Proven track record of successful delivery of software engineering projects.
Ability to think and learn on your feet, and the ability to quickly become proficient with new technologies in a fast-paced environment.
Understanding and passion for Test Driven Design.
Familiarity with ETL concepts and best practices.
Experience with prompt engineering and RAG techniques preferred.
Excellent problem-solving skills, critical thinking abilities, and attention to detail.
Effective communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively in a team environment.
Passion for AI and a desire to contribute to the advancement of Gen AI technologies.
Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.
Self-driven and autonomous.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
Team player.
Eagerness to learn and adapt in a fast-paced environment.
5+ years of industry experience as a hands-on practitioner of software engineering and proven experience with cloud offerings.
3+ years of experience with cloud platforms such as AWS.
Experience with Docker preferred.
Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science or a related field.


Preferred qualifications:


Advanced degree in a relevant field.
Publications in relevant AI/ML communities and journals.
Experience fine-tuning OpenSource LLMs and deploying them.
MLFlow, etc., a plus.


Benefits:


Fully remote
Flexible Schedule
Unlimited Paid Time Off (PTO)
Paid parental/bereavement leave
Worldwide recognized clients to build skills for an excellent resume
Top-notch team to learn and grow with


Salary: USD $7,454 - $9,486 (monthly salary range)

Background checks may be required for certain positions/projects.

Blue Orange Digital is an equal opportunity employer.

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Position

Data Scientist

Job Responsibilities

The position is based in our HQ in Rome and part of the Global team.

The Data Scientist's mission is to empower Fendi with data-driven insights that fuel strategic decision-making, enhance customer understanding, and drive business growth. By leveraging analytical expertise and a deep understanding of the business, the Data Scientist's will identify opportunities for optimization, improve operational efficiency, and contribute to Fendi's continued success in the luxury fashion market.

As part of the LVMH Group, this role also involves collaborating and interfacing with other entities within the group, providing a broader perspective and exposure to a diverse range of business challenges and opportunities.

Main Responsibilities


Proficiency in machine learning and artificial intelligence algorithms with a strong understanding of their practical applications.
Design, develop, and deploy AI/ML models to address complex business challenges, optimize operational efficiency, and deliver actionable strategic insights.
Expertise in analyzing large, diverse datasets using advanced statistical and AI techniques to identify key trends, patterns, and correlations, transforming these insights into clear, data-driven recommendations for business stakeholders.
Proven experience working with customer and sales data, particularly within a retail/consumer environment, to drive targeted business outcomes.
Expertise in data collection, cleansing, and comprehensive analysis of large datasets from various sources, including customer, sales, and operational data repositories.
Conduct ad-hoc data analysis to address specific business inquiries and support informed decision-making processes across the organization.
Measure the impact and effectiveness of strategic initiatives and marketing campaigns using appropriate metrics and rigorous statistical methodologies.
Measure the results of initiatives and campaigns using appropriate metrics and statistical methods.
Collaborate closely with business stakeholders to understand their requirements and translate them into clear, well-defined data analysis projects.
Communicate complex findings, insights, and strategic recommendations to both technical and non-technical audiences in a clear, concise, and persuasive manner.
Actively participate in cross-functional projects, providing data-driven insights and support for key business initiatives.
Manage relationships with data vendors, ensuring service level agreements (SLAs) are met and data quality is maintained.


Profile


Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, Economics, or a related field.
3-5 years of experience in a data scientist role.
Proficiency in Python and R programming languages.
Experience with data visualization tools, mainly Power BI.
Preferably experience with Dataiku.
Strong SQL skills and experience with relational databases.
Familiarity with cloud computing platforms, preferably Google Cloud Platform (GCP).
Knowledge of statistical modelling techniques. Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
Strong communication and collaboration skills.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team and perform under pressure in a fast-paced.
Evidence of successful delivery of data driven analysis and recommendations to drive forward business performance.
Critical thinking and attention to detail, extremely organized and high attention to luxury and detail
Demonstrated interest in keeping up with emerging technologies and the data trend.
Fluency in English and Italian are a mus


Additional Information

LVMH is committed to non-discrimination and respect of each person‚Äôs singularities. We recognize and recruit all types of talent

Position

Title: Data Science
Description:
Aubay √® una societ√† leader in Europa nelle aree di consulenza direzionale e ICT, quotata sul mercato NYSE Euronext di Parigi.




La nostra proposta




Siamo alla ricerca di un* Data Science Expert che, all‚Äôinterno del nostro Centro di Competenza Big Data, sar√† un punto di riferimento tecnico e metodologico in progetti complessi in ambito Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning e Natural Language Processing.




La persona sar√† riconosciuta come referente dai colleghi per le proprie competenze specialistiche, potr√† contribuire alla formazione e all‚Äôaggiornamento del team, oltre che alla gestione e al coordinamento di attivit√† progettuali.

Progetter√† e svilupper√† algoritmi avanzati di AI, ML e NLP, con focus su modelli di AI Generativa (Transformer, LLM, suite Mistral).
Utilizzer√† tool di sviluppo (Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, ecc.) e metodologie MLOps per garantire qualit√† e versionamento del codice.
Lavorer√† in team multidisciplinari in ottica Agile/SCRUM, contribuendo a deliverable strategici e complessi.
Garantir√† il rispetto di performance, tempi e standard qualitativi di progetto.




Requisiti richiesti




Oltre 10 anni di esperienza in contesti complessi di consulenza e data science.
Solida esperienza in analisi requisiti di business e progettazione algoritmi AI/ML/NLP.
Ottima conoscenza Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch e strumenti di AI Generativa.
Conoscenza metodologie MLOps, Git e strumenti di versionamento.
Esperienza con database relazionali e non relazionali.
Capacit√† di rappresentazione dati con strumenti come Power BI.
Conoscenza tecniche di data mining e statistica.
Abitudine a lavorare in contesti Agile/SCRUM.
Familiarit√† con AI Act, GDPR e linee guida etiche per l‚ÄôAI.




Competenze gradite




Esperienza nello sviluppo e utilizzo di API e tecnologie come Apache Kafka.
Conoscenza della piattaforma Domino.
Attitudine alla divulgazione e condivisione del know-how all‚Äôinterno del team.




Modalit√† operativa




Attivit√† in modalit√† ibrida (Roma) con disponibilit√† a trasferte.




Compensation & Benefit




La proposta economica sar√† valutata in base alla seniority e alle competenze dimostrate. RAL indicativa: 50.000 ‚Äì 55.000 ‚Ç¨ + Ticket Restaurant.




Iter di selezione




Il percorso di selezione prevede:

Una fase di valutazione tecnico-progettuale con i nostri specialisti.

Aubay √® una societ√† leader in Europa nelle aree di consulenza direzionale e ICT, quotata sul mercato NYSE Euronext di Parigi.


La nostra proposta


Siamo alla ricerca di un* Data Science Expert che, all‚Äôinterno del nostro Centro di Competenza Big Data, sar√† un punto di riferimento tecnico e metodologico in progetti complessi in ambito Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning e Natural Language Processing.


La persona sar√† riconosciuta come referente dai colleghi per le proprie competenze specialistiche, potr√† contribuire alla formazione e all‚Äôaggiornamento del team, oltre che alla gestione e al coordinamento di attivit√† progettuali.


In particolare, il/la candidato/a:


  • Analizzer√† i requisiti di business traducendoli in soluzioni AI scalabili.
  • Progetter√† e svilupper√† algoritmi avanzati di AI, ML e NLP, con focus su modelli di AI Generativa (Transformer, LLM, suite Mistral).
  • Utilizzer√† tool di sviluppo (Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, ecc.) e metodologie MLOps per garantire qualit√† e versionamento del codice.
  • Lavorer√† in team multidisciplinari in ottica Agile/SCRUM, contribuendo a deliverable strategici e complessi.
  • Garantir√† il rispetto di performance, tempi e standard qualitativi di progetto.


Requisiti richiesti


  • Oltre 10 anni di esperienza in contesti complessi di consulenza e data science.
  • Solida esperienza in analisi requisiti di business e progettazione algoritmi AI/ML/NLP.
  • Ottima conoscenza Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch e strumenti di AI Generativa.
  • Conoscenza metodologie MLOps, Git e strumenti di versionamento.
  • Esperienza con database relazionali e non relazionali.
  • Capacit√† di rappresentazione dati con strumenti come Power BI.
  • Conoscenza tecniche di data mining e statistica.
  • Abitudine a lavorare in contesti Agile/SCRUM.
  • Familiarit√† con AI Act, GDPR e linee guida etiche per l‚ÄôAI.


Competenze gradite


  • Esperienza nello sviluppo e utilizzo di API e tecnologie come Apache Kafka.
  • Conoscenza della piattaforma Domino.
  • Attitudine alla divulgazione e condivisione del know-how all‚Äôinterno del team.


Modalit√† operativa


Attivit√† in modalit√† ibrida (Roma) con disponibilit√† a trasferte.


Compensation & Benefit


La proposta economica sar√† valutata in base alla seniority e alle competenze dimostrate. RAL indicativa: 50.000 ‚Äì 55.000 ‚Ç¨ + Ticket Restaurant.


Iter di selezione


Il percorso di selezione prevede:

  1. Un primo approfondimento conoscitivo/motivazionale con il referente HR.
  2. Una fase di valutazione tecnico-progettuale con i nostri specialisti.

  • Il presente annuncio √® rivolto ad entrambi i sessi, ai sensi delle leggi 903/77 e 125/91 e a persone di tutte le et√† e nazionalit√†, ai sensi dei D. Lgs 215 e 216/03.

Title: Junior ML Engineer
Description:
About Translated

Translated is a leading company in AI-enabled translation services. We are on a mission to allow everyone to understand and be understood in their own language.

By leveraging a seamless symbiosis of artificial intelligence and human creativity, we design custom localization projects that were previously unthinkable, helping more than 280,000 clients grow their businesses worldwide.

Translated has been at the forefront of innovation in the language services industry, actively coordinating several European projects such as Matecat, MMT, Meetween. Through these leading AI research initiatives, Translated has collaborated with esteemed partners like FBK, Zoom Research, and Kites. These partnerships have concentrated on advancing state-of-the-art technology, steering the industry towards more efficient and intelligent solutions for machine translation and beyond.

We are looking for a Junior ML Engineer. As a Junior ML Engineer at Translated, you will contribute to deploying state-of-the-art models in production environments, converting research breakthroughs into practical solutions that enhance and expand our AI services. If you are passionate about making AI technology accessible and impactful, this position offers you the opportunity to make a meaningful impact.

What You‚Äôll Do


Deploy advanced machine learning models to address real-world challenges, transforming Translated's research from concept to reality and developing impactful AI-driven solutions.
Implement fast and scalable Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) pipelines.
Introduce state-of-the-art techniques, tools, and architecture that improve the performance, latency, throughput, and efficiency of our model inference stack.
Monitor and maintain deployed models to ensure they consistently provide value, directly impacting the role of AI in serving individuals and businesses.
Manage project lifecycle autonomously, from planning to deployment, with guidance from senior team members.
Collaborate with a multidisciplinary team of machine learning researchers, engineers, product owners, designers and system administrators.
Participate in continuous learning opportunities to stay ahead in the fast-evolving field of AI and Machine Translation.


Requirements


Master's degree in Software Engineering, Computer Science, Machine Learning, or a related field.
Proficiency in Java and Python.
Strong foundation in data structures, algorithms, and software engineering principles.
Some hands-on experience with Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) pipelines.
Have an understanding of modern LLM architectures and an intuition for how to optimize their performance, particularly for inference.
Proactive, self-driven and enjoys solving complex problems, not just in the primary area of responsibility but across boundaries.
Ability to move quickly in an environment where things may be loosely defined with competing priorities or deadlines.
Enjoys owning problems end-to-end and is willing to acquire any necessary knowledge to complete the job.
Excellent communication and teamwork skills, with the capacity to convey technical concepts to non-expert audiences.


Preferred Qualifications


2+ years industry/equivalent experience.
Experience in serving and optimizing LLMs inference processes.


We offer: full-time contract. This position requires daily in-office presence, so we are unable to accommodate fully remote work. However, we value flexibility and offer the opportunity to work up to 48 days remotely per year, allowing for a balanced and adaptable work experience.

Headquarter

Translated is hosted at Pi Campus, a working environment immersed in nature where 5 luxury villas have been converted into functional offices to foster talent growth. Pi Campus is also a venture firm created by Translated to reinvest part of its profits into promising AI startups.

Benefits and Perks


Gym
Swimming Pool
Kickboxing
Water aerobics
Fitness
Pilates
Table Tennis and Football table
Kitchen and snacks
Bonuses and incentives for employees who quit smoking, ride a bicycle to work, or adopt a child.


Learn more about our company: https://translated.com/work-at-translated-onboarding.

Diversity Statement

At Translated, we proudly embrace and celebrate each individual's unique qualities to our team, regardless of race, sexual orientation, gender identity, or other differences. We recognize that these diverse perspectives empower us to overcome challenges, foster innovation, and drive excellence. As an inclusive and equal opportunity employer, we are committed to cultivating an environment where everyone feels welcome, valued, and supported to achieve their full potential.

Privacy Policy

HTML:
Il Gruppo EIES, composto da Energent, I&M, Enway e Skienda √® una realt√† di consulenza e di prodotto consolidata nel mercato delle soluzioni e dei servizi ICT.

Per ampliamento dell‚Äôorganico ricerchiamo la figura di un Data Scientist.

Competenze Richieste

  • Almeno 2 anni di esperienza lavorativa;
  • Buona conoscenza di Python;
  • NLP;
  • Gradita la conoscenza di Knime.

Cosa Offriamo

  • Ambiente di lavoro dinamico ed orientato alla crescita professionale;
  • Percorsi di formazione e certificazione;
  • Buoni pasto;
  • Piattaforma di e-commerce con scontistiche riservate ai dipendenti;
  • Confronto all'interno di un team strutturato e coeso;
  • Inquadramento contrattuale e retributivo commisurato alla Seniority;
  • Programma di Buddy: un collega dedicato che ti affiancher√† nel periodo iniziale per facilitare l'integrazione nel team e supportarti nell'apprendimento dei processi aziendali;
  • Welfare aziendale.

Sede di lavoro: Roma

Modalit√† di lavoro: Remoto

Chi siamo?

Il Gruppo EIES rappresenta l'alleanza strategica di quattro aziende italiane leader nel settore informatico, unite per offrire al mercato una copertura completa, integrata e sinergica.

Composto da Energent, I&M Consulting, Enway e Skienda, il Gruppo √® una realt√† che eroga consulenza, progettualit√† e servizi in ambito ICT, fornendo soluzioni ad alto valore aggiunto per i propri clienti. Con sedi a Roma, Napoli e Milano, operiamo in settori come Finance, Insurance, Telco, Energy e Pubblica Amministrazione, collaborando con aziende di primaria importanza ed i principali System Integrator.

Il gruppo √® organizzato in practices tematiche afferenti a diverse aree di competenza: Infrastrutture & Security, Application Modernization & Cloud Transformation, Data Science e Artificial Intelligence e Consulting. Inoltre, il Gruppo dispone di due Factory specializzate in Sviluppo Software e Dati che lavorano sinergicamente per progettare soluzioni innovative, affidabili e personalizzate e per la delivery di progetti chiavi in mano.

Unirsi al Gruppo EIES significa entrare a far parte di una realt√† dinamica e all'avanguardia, dove il contributo di ciascuno viene valorizzato e l'innovazione √® al centro di ci√≤ che facciamo. Se cerchi una sfida stimolante in un ambiente in continua evoluzione, il nostro gruppo √® il posto giusto per te.

Title: AI Scientist
Description:
About Translated

Translated is a leading company in AI-enabled translation services. We are on a mission to allow everyone to understand and be understood in their own language.

Our success stems from a unique blend of the world‚Äôs #1 adaptive neural machine translation technology (IDC MarketScape 2022), the largest network of vetted, native-speaking professional translators, and top-ranked AI-enabled text, audio, and video translation tools (Gartner, 2022).

By leveraging a seamless symbiosis of artificial intelligence and human creativity, we design custom localization projects that were previously unthinkable, helping more than 280,000 clients grow their businesses worldwide.

We‚Äôre looking for a passionate AI Scientist to join the Translated team in our HQ in Pi Campus, Rome. Our team is developing the next-generation Machine Translation System, with the ambitious goal of reaching the singularity that we define as the quality of the top-1% professional translator and making it available to millions of people worldwide.

What You‚Äôll Do


Product-driven research: apply the latest research to improve the quality of our Machine Translation solution and make an impact on our latest product.
Autonomously manage the full project lifecycle, from planning to deployment, providing key insights and technical directions.
Utilize an HPC cluster for scalable, multi-node training tasks to accelerate model development and quickly evaluate research ideas.
Collaborate with a multidisciplinary team of product owners, designers, developers and system administrators.
Participate in continuous learning opportunities to stay ahead in the fast-evolving field of AI and Machine Translation.


Qualifications Required


MSc in machine learning or a related field and 3+ years of industry/research experience (a PhD is considered equivalent).
Proven experience in fine-tuning Large Language Models using distributed training frameworks and libraries (e.g., DeepSpeed, FSDP, Transformers).
Proficiency in Python and experience with at least one deep learning framework (e.g., PyTorch).
Proactive, self-driven and enjoys solving complex problems, not just in the primary area of responsibility but across boundaries.
Excellent communication and teamwork skills, with the capacity to convey technical concepts to non-expert audiences.
Ability to iterate quickly and make decisions based on results and data analytics.


Additional Preferred Qualifications


Experience developing Machine Translation models is a strong plus.
Experience with modern LLM alignment techniques, such as Reinforcement Learning from Human Feedback (RLHF), DPO, and GRPO.
Experience with job scheduling and workload management systems, particularly Slurm.


Headquarter

Translated is hosted at Pi Campus, a working environment immersed in nature where 7 luxury villas have been converted into functional offices to foster talent growth. Pi Campus is also a venture firm created by Translated to reinvest part of its profits into promising AI startups.

Benefits and Perks


Gym
Swimming Pool
Kickboxing, TRX, and Pilates classes
Table Tennis and Football table
Kitchen and snacks
Bonuses and incentives for employees who quit smoking or adopt a child.


Learn more about our company: https://translated.com/work-at-translated-onboarding

Diversity statement

At Translated, we proudly embrace and celebrate each individual's unique qualities to our team, regardless of race, sexual orientation, gender identity, or any other differences. We recognize that these diverse perspectives empower us to overcome challenges, foster innovation, and drive excellence. As an inclusive and equal-opportunity employer, we are committed to cultivating an environment where everyone feels welcome, valued, and supported to achieve their full potential.

Title: Junior Consultant - Data Scientist (Intern) - Artificial Intelligence
Description:
We let the future guide us. Join our next generation

Vuoi fare un lavoro che sia davvero significativo e di impatto? In KPMG avrai l‚Äôopportunit√† di aiutare i clienti, la societ√†, le colleghe e i colleghi ad affrontare e risolvere le sfide pi√π attuali e complesse. KPMG Advisory offre servizi di consulenza alle imprese per affiancarle nella trasformazione del business model, nel miglioramento e nella digitalizzazione dei processi, nell'analisi e nella gestione dei rischi, nonch√© supporto nelle operazioni di finanza straordinaria.

Nel particolare, entrerai a far parte del Team di Lighthouse di Roma.

La Lighthouse √® il centro di eccellenza di KPMG Advisory che offre soluzioni di Data & Analytics sul mercato.

Unendoti al team, svilupperai soluzioni innovative attingendo dalle nostre competenze globali. Combinerai informatica, matematica, statistica e business per creare analisi predittive, presentandole e comunicandole con professionalit√† e competenza. Opererai in un ambiente orientato all'innovazione tecnologica, occupandoti dello sviluppo di soluzioni End to End di Intelligenza Artificiale con particolare focus sull‚Äôapplicazione di Large Language Models e Agenti AI. Abbiamo ricevuto riconoscimenti internazionali per quanto riguarda la nostra capacit√† di interpretare e analizzare i dati.

Nello specifico, all‚Äôinterno di un team strutturato, ti occuperai di:


Analizzare casi di business e tradurli in soluzioni di Intelligenza Artificiale;
Disegnare la soluzione secondo gli aspetti tecnici e tecnologici;
Progettare e implementare la soluzione con focus sulle tecniche di Intelligenza Artificiale;
Validare con gli esperti di business la soluzione implementata;
Analizzare, progettare e implementare strumenti di monitoraggio per la soluzione sviluppate;
Supportare il lancio e gestire la manutenzione delle applicazioni.


Come As You Are - Le tue competenze e caratteristiche

Questa opportunit√† √® perfetta per te se:


Possiedi una Laurea in economia, matematica, ingegneria matematica, statistica, ingegneria informatica, ingegneria gestionale o informatica;
Hai sviluppato la capacit√† di combinare competenze aziendali con competenze IT, inclusa la modellazione di base e l‚Äôesplorazione dei dati;
Conosci linguaggi di programmazione in ambito analisi dei dati, in particolare Python;
Hai delle competenze in ambito statistico e modelli di machine learning;
Hai delle conoscenze di base delle principali soluzioni di Intelligenza Artificiale;
Hai una buona padronanza della lingua inglese, preferibilmente con esperienze di studio e/o lavoro all'estero


Your Future With Us - Cosa troverai in KPMG


Un ambiente di lavoro inclusivo, equo e che rispetta, incoraggia e valorizza le diversit√†
Un contesto stimolante e dinamico che incentiva la creativit√† e il lavoro di squadra
Modalit√† di lavoro ibrida, per promuovere un sano equilibrio tra vita lavorativa e personale
Programmi di formazione e sviluppo avanzati per rimanere sempre aggiornati
Mindset internazionale e progettualit√† innovative
Iniziative incentrate sul benessere psicofisico


Together for Better ‚Äì I nostri valori e il nostro impegno

Leadership, lavoro in team, rispetto di ogni individualit√†, approfondimento continuo, trasparenza, impegno verso la comunit√†, integrit√†: questi sono i Valori di KPMG che danno vita a un ambiente aperto allo scambio di idee e di conoscenza, che permette ai nostri professionisti di esprimere tutto il loro potenziale.

Grazie all‚Äôimpegno nel favorire un ambiente di lavoro inclusivo, il nostro Network risulta conforme agli standard dei requisiti ISO 30415, sul Sistema di Gestione per la Diversit√† e l‚ÄôInclusione, e UNI PdR 125, relativa alla parit√† di genere. All‚Äôinterno del nostro Impact Plan - Our Impact Plan (kpmg.com) - trovi riassunte tutte le azioni che stiamo portando avanti su tematiche ambientali, sociali e di governance (ESG).

Unisciti a noi!

I tuoi dati saranno trattati nel pieno rispetto delle disposizioni del Regolamento (UE) n. 679/2016 (General Data Protection Regulation - "GDPR") e successive modifiche. Per ulteriori informazioni, consultare l'informativa sulla privacy di KPMG.

KPMG Advisory S.p.A. garantisce le pari opportunit√†.

We let the future guide us. Join our next generation

Do you want to pursue a profession that is truly meaningful and impactful? At KPMG, you will have the opportunity to help clients, the company and colleagues address and solve the most current and complex challenges. KPMG Advisory offers consulting services to companies to assist them in business model transformation, process improvement and digitisation, risk analysis and management, and support in extraordinary finance transactions.

Lighthouse is the KPMG Advisory centre of excellence delivering an array of data & analytics solutions.

Alongside the team, you will develop innovative solutions by drawing on our global expertise. You will combine IT, mathematics, statistics and business knowledge to create predictive analyses, which you will present and communicate in a professional and skilful manner. You will work in a technology-driven environment, focusing on the development of end-to-end Artificial Intelligence solutions, with particular emphasis on the application of Large Language Models and AI Agents. We have received international recognition for our ability to interpret and analyze data.

Specifically, within a structured team, you will deal with:


Analyzing business cases and translating them into Artificial Intelligence solutions;
Designing the solution from both technical and technological perspectives;
Designing and implementing the solution with a focus on Artificial Intelligence techniques;
Validating the implemented solution with business experts;
Analyzing, designing, and implementing monitoring tools for the developed solutions;
Supporting the launch and managing the maintenance of the applications.


Skills

Come As You Are - Your skills and characteristics

This opportunity is perfect for you if:


You hold a degree in Economics, Mathematics, Mathematical Engineering, Statistics, Computer Engineering, Management Engineering, or Computer Science;
You have developed the ability to combine business knowledge with IT skills, including basic modeling and data exploration;
You are familiar with programming languages used in data analysis, particularly Python;
You have skills in statistics and machine learning models;
You have a basic understanding of major Artificial Intelligence solutions;
You have a good command of the English language, preferably with study and/or work experience abroad.


Your Future With Us - What you‚Äôll find at KPMG


An inclusive and equitable work environment that respects, encourages and values diversity.
A challenging and dynamic environment that encourages creativity and teamwork.
Hybrid work arrangements to promote a healthy work-life balance.
Advanced training and development programmes to stay current.
International mindset and innovative projects.
Initiatives focused on mental and physical well-being.


Together for Better ‚Äì Our values and commitment

Leadership, teamwork, respect every individual, continuous learning, transparency, commitment to the community and integrity. These are the KPMG values that create an environment that encourages the sharing of ideas and knowledge, so our professionals can achieve their full potential.

As a result of our commitment to fostering an inclusive work environment, our Network complies with the standards of the ISO 30415 requirements, on the Diversity and Inclusion Management System, and UNI PdR 125, relating to gender equality. Within our Impact Plan - Our Impact Plan (kpmg.com) - you will find summarised all the actions we are taking on environmental, social and governance (ESG) issues.

Join us!

Your data will be processed in full compliance with the provisions of Regulation (EU) no. 679/2016 (General Data Protection Regulation - ‚ÄúGDPR‚Äù), as amended. For more information, please see KPMG‚Äôs privacy policy.

KPMG Advisory S.p.A. is an equal opportunity employer.

Nello specifico, all‚Äôinterno di un team strutturato, ti occuperai di:

  • Analizzare casi di business e tradurli in soluzioni di Intelligenza Artificiale;
  • Disegnare la soluzione secondo gli aspetti tecnici e tecnologici;
  • Progettare e implementare la soluzione con focus sulle tecniche di Intelligenza Artificiale;
  • Validare con gli esperti di business la soluzione implementata;
  • Analizzare, progettare e implementare strumenti di monitoraggio per la soluzione sviluppate;
  • Supportare il lancio e gestire la manutenzione delle applicazioni.

Come As You Are - Le tue competenze e caratteristiche

Questa opportunit√† √® perfetta per te se:

  • Possiedi una Laurea in economia, matematica, ingegneria matematica, statistica, ingegneria informatica, ingegneria gestionale o informatica;
  • Hai sviluppato la capacit√† di combinare competenze aziendali con competenze IT, inclusa la modellazione di base e l‚Äôesplorazione dei dati;
  • Conosci linguaggi di programmazione in ambito analisi dei dati, in particolare Python;
  • Hai delle competenze in ambito statistico e modelli di machine learning;
  • Hai delle conoscenze di base delle principali soluzioni di Intelligenza Artificiale;
  • Hai una buona padronanza della lingua inglese, preferibilmente con esperienze di studio e/o lavoro all'estero

Your Future With Us - Cosa troverai in KPMG

  • Un ambiente di lavoro inclusivo, equo e che rispetta, incoraggia e valorizza le diversit√†
  • Un contesto stimolante e dinamico che incentiva la creativit√† e il lavoro di squadra
  • Modalit√† di lavoro ibrida, per promuovere un sano equilibrio tra vita lavorativa e personale
  • Programmi di formazione e sviluppo avanzati per rimanere sempre aggiornati
  • Mindset internazionale e progettualit√† innovative
  • Iniziative incentrate sul benessere psicofisico

Together for Better ‚Äì I nostri valori e il nostro impegno

Leadership, lavoro in team, rispetto di ogni individualit√†, approfondimento continuo, trasparenza, impegno verso la comunit√†, integrit√†: questi sono i Valori di KPMG che danno vita a un ambiente aperto allo scambio di idee e di conoscenza, che permette ai nostri professionisti di esprimere tutto il loro potenziale.

Grazie all‚Äôimpegno nel favorire un ambiente di lavoro inclusivo, il nostro Network risulta conforme agli standard dei requisiti ISO 30415, sul Sistema di Gestione per la Diversit√† e l‚ÄôInclusione, e UNI PdR 125, relativa alla parit√† di genere. All‚Äôinterno del nostro Impact Plan - Our Impact Plan (kpmg.com) - trovi riassunte tutte le azioni che stiamo portando avanti su tematiche ambientali, sociali e di governance (ESG).

Unisciti a noi!

I tuoi dati saranno trattati nel pieno rispetto delle disposizioni del Regolamento (UE) n. 679/2016 (General Data Protection Regulation - "GDPR") e successive modifiche. Per ulteriori informazioni, consultare l'informativa sulla privacy di KPMG.

KPMG Advisory S.p.A. garantisce le pari opportunit√†.

We let the future guide us. Join our next generation

Do you want to pursue a profession that is truly meaningful and impactful? At KPMG, you will have the opportunity to help clients, the company and colleagues address and solve the most current and complex challenges. KPMG Advisory offers consulting services to companies to assist them in business model transformation, process improvement and digitisation, risk analysis and management, and support in extraordinary finance transactions.

Lighthouse is the KPMG Advisory centre of excellence delivering an array of data & analytics solutions.

Alongside the team, you will develop innovative solutions by drawing on our global expertise. You will combine IT, mathematics, statistics and business knowledge to create predictive analyses, which you will present and communicate in a professional and skilful manner. You will work in a technology-driven environment, focusing on the development of end-to-end Artificial Intelligence solutions, with particular emphasis on the application of Large Language Models and AI Agents. We have received international recognition for our ability to interpret and analyze data.

Specifically, within a structured team, you will deal with:

  • Analyzing business cases and translating them into Artificial Intelligence solutions;
  • Designing the solution from both technical and technological perspectives;
  • Designing and implementing the solution with a focus on Artificial Intelligence techniques;
  • Validating the implemented solution with business experts;
  • Analyzing, designing, and implementing monitoring tools for the developed solutions;
  • Supporting the launch and managing the maintenance of the applications.

Skills

 Come As You Are - Your skills and characteristics

This opportunity is perfect for you if:

  • You hold a degree in Economics, Mathematics, Mathematical Engineering, Statistics, Computer Engineering, Management Engineering, or Computer Science;
  • You have developed the ability to combine business knowledge with IT skills, including basic modeling and data exploration;
  • You are familiar with programming languages used in data analysis, particularly Python;
  • You have skills in statistics and machine learning models;
  • You have a basic understanding of major Artificial Intelligence solutions;
  • You have a good command of the English language, preferably with study and/or work experience abroad.

Your Future With Us - What you‚Äôll find at KPMG

  • An inclusive and equitable work environment that respects, encourages and values diversity.
  • A challenging and dynamic environment that encourages creativity and teamwork.
  • Hybrid work arrangements to promote a healthy work-life balance.
  • Advanced training and development programmes to stay current.
  • International mindset and innovative projects.
  • Initiatives focused on mental and physical well-being.

Together for Better ‚Äì Our values and commitment

Leadership, teamwork, respect every individual, continuous learning, transparency, commitment to the community and integrity. These are the KPMG values that create an environment that encourages the sharing of ideas and knowledge, so our professionals can achieve their full potential.

As a result of our commitment to fostering an inclusive work environment, our Network complies with the standards of the ISO 30415 requirements, on the Diversity and Inclusion Management System, and UNI PdR 125, relating to gender equality. Within our Impact Plan - Our Impact Plan (kpmg.com) - you will find summarised all the actions we are taking on environmental, social and governance (ESG) issues.

Join us!

Your data will be processed in full compliance with the provisions of Regulation (EU) no. 679/2016 (General Data Protection Regulation - ‚ÄúGDPR‚Äù), as amended. For more information, please see KPMG‚Äôs privacy policy.

KPMG Advisory S.p.A. is an equal opportunity employer.

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
MF Consultant

MF Consultant - societ√† di servizi HR alle aziende. Esperti di Head Hunting & Executive Search; Talent Acquisition Outsourching e RPO, Temporary Manager e Coaching & Mentoring, ricerca per importante azienda cliente nel settore dell' intrattenimento un Data Scientist su Roma.

Principali attivit√†:


Disegnare, progettare, implementare e documentare nuove soluzioni AI a supporto dei processi aziendali.
Contribuire allo sviluppo e all'evoluzione della Data Platform in relazione ad aspetti tecnologici, organizzativi e di processo.
Contribuire alla crescita del patrimonio dati aziendale.
Collaborare con gli altri membri del team al fine di promuovere una cultura organizzativa di gruppo improntata su principi di solidariet√†, pragmaticit√†, efficacia e affiatamento.
Manutenzione, sviluppo ed evoluzione dei modelli attualmente in produzione, assumendone la gestione completa in collaborazione con il team.
Progettazione, implementazione, industrializzazione, manutenzione e monitoraggio di pipeline di machine learning e agenti virtuali in grado di supportare la trasformazione dei processi aziendali.
Relazione diretta col cliente interno per la valutazione dei risultati e la raccolta dei requisiti evolutivi.


Requisiti:


Laurea o diploma in ambito scientifico/informatico/statistico o comprovata esperienza nell'elaborazione di dati e nell'applicazione di modelli statistici/matematici/Machine Learning.
Conoscenza approfondita di algoritmi di Machine Learning e AI (LLM, modelli ad albero, NLP, clustering, neural network, time series, etc).
Conoscenza dei meccanicismi di analisi e preprocessing dei dati e feature engineering per progetti di Machine Learning (streaming e batch).
Capacit√† di coding e debugging in Pyspark e Python e quindi conoscenza delle principali librerie e frameworks di Machine Learning, soprattutto Spark e MLib, poi MLflow, Dataframe, PyTorch, TensorFlow, Numpy, Pandas, ScikitLearn...
Competenze in modellazione dati, modellazione di esperimenti statistici e conoscenza metodi quantitativi in generale.
Esperienza comprovata nel progettare, implementare e industrializzare soluzioni AI integrate.
Capacit√† di analisi di problemi di business, dati e contesto. Capacit√† di effettuare test delle ipotesi, comparazione di modelli, interpretazione e validazione dei risultati.
Buona conoscenza della lingua inglese.


Sono considerati requisiti preferenziali:


Conoscenza Databricks
Git per il versioning del codice e rudimenti di devops
Conoscenza servizi Azure
Conoscenza Power BI
Esperienza nell'utilizzo degli LLM open


Se la descrizione delle responsabilit√† e delle competenze descritte si allineano al tuo percorso professionale e ritieni di essere interessat* all'opportunit√† candidati inviando il tuo CV alla mail marianna@mfconsultant.it.

Grazie per il tuo tempo!

CANDIDATI PER AVERE MAGGIORI INFORMAZIONI!!!

A proposito di noi!

MF Consultant √® nata nel 2015, nel tempo √® cresciuta grazie al duro lavoro di professionisti che si sono sempre distinti per ambizione e passione, uniti da un grande senso di rispetto per il valore umano delle risorse aziendali. Siamo al fianco di aziende di ogni dimensione e settore merceologico presenti su tutto il territorio nazionale offrendo la nostra professionalit√† in:


HEADHUNTING & EXECUTIVE SEARCH: Seguiamo le selezioni di Top manager, Middle manager, Key Resources, Coordinator provenienti da differenti settori e con esperienze nazionali e internazionali.
TALENT ACQUISITION OUTSOURCING & RPO: La nostra forza sta nella mappatura delle competenze e creazione di JD con intervista strutturata al management, applichiamo tecniche e strumenti personalizzati di ricerca del profilo ideale; Il nostro must √® il rispetto delle singole pari e la governance dei tempi e del budget che ci vengono affidati.
SERVIZI DI CONSULENZA HR TEMPORARY: I nostri HR Consultant aiutano l'impresa a gestire il personale in ogni ambito e processo della vita aziendale. Analizziamo tutti i processi relativi alla gestione e allo sviluppo delle risorse umane, a partire dal Recruitment, passando per l'Onboarding, per la Pianificazione e il Monitoraggio delle Performance. Siamo anche esperti di Training, Counseling, Professional & Business Coaching; Evaluation, Talent e Performance Management; Diversity & Inclusion, Internal Communication; Brand Identity e Web Reputation; Employer Branding ma anche di Offboarding
LEARNING & DEVELOPMENT: Una persona valorizzata nelle proprie capacit√† personali e professionali sar√† pi√π motivata anche nel proprio lavoro, offrendo all'intera organizzazione un valore aggiunto. La mission dei nostri corsi √® di creare team forti e coesi in cui ciascun componente sia in grado di lavorare insieme e in modo autonomo valorizzando l'Unicit√† del singolo e la sua integrazione nel gruppo. La nostra offerta formativa pu√≤ essere modulata e costruita sulle esigenze delle persone e dell'organizzazione: Formazione finanziata; Formazione manageriale e soft skill; Percorsi di professional & business coaching; Counseling aziendale e team building.


MF Consultant sostiene da sempre il talento delle persone; si impegna, pertanto, a promuovere un ambiente di lavoro inclusivo.


Il presente annuncio √® rivolto ad entrambi i sessi, ai sensi delle leggi 903/77 e 125/91, e a persone di tutte le et√† e tutte le nazionalit√†, ai sensi dei decreti legislativi 215/03 e 216/03. Saranno, inoltre, valutate positivamente candidature appartenenti alle Categorie Protette, ai sensi della legge 68/99.

Ruolo: IT/Technology

Title: DATA SCIENTIST M/F
Description:
Randstad Digital, divisione specializzata nella ricerca, selezione e formazione professionale IT & Digital di Randstad Italia, per azienda cliente finale leader mondo Energy, cerca per la sede di Roma, un:




DATA SCIENTIST F/M




Il Data Scientist o AI/ML Specialist avr√† la responsabilit√† di guidare la progettazione, lo sviluppo e la delivery di soluzioni di data analytics e intelligenza artificiale a supporto del processo decisionale dell' azienda cliente. Il ruolo sar√† coinvolto in progetti strategici sulla Data Platform e sull‚Äôecosistema Analytics, con l‚Äôobiettivo di:




Promuovere l‚Äôintroduzione e l‚Äôadozione di soluzioni basate su Generative AI (GenAI), esplorando nuovi use case e tecnologie emergenti per innovare i processi aziendali.
Sviluppare e implementare soluzioni analitiche avanzate, modelli di machine learning e sistemi di intelligenza artificiale.
Favorire la diffusione di una cultura data-driven all‚Äôinterno dell‚Äôorganizzazione.
Diffondere, in collaborazione con le strutture preposte, l‚ÄôArtificial Intelligence Literacy.
Coordinare team interfunzionali e attivit√† progettuali complesse, garantendo la governance e l‚Äôallineamento con le priorit√† strategiche.




ATTIVITA' PRINCIPALI:




Gestione dell‚Äôintero ciclo di vita dei progetti di Data & Analytics, dalla raccolta dei requisiti alla pianificazione, implementazione e monitoraggio dei risultati.
Collaborazione continua con le funzioni di business e IT per identificare le esigenze analitiche e tradurle in soluzioni concrete e scalabili.
Coordinamento di team progettuali multidisciplinari, assicurando l‚Äôallineamento con le priorit√† strategiche e la qualit√† delle delivery.
Introduzione e sperimentazione di soluzioni di Generative AI (GenAI) per l‚Äôautomazione, l‚Äôanalisi predittiva e l‚Äôottimizzazione dei processi aziendali.
Definizione e implementazione di best practice per la data governance, la qualit√† dei dati e la sicurezza delle informazioni.

Title: Data Scientist
Description:

Progettare pipeline di machine learning partendo da dati strutturati e non strutturati.
Ricercare e applicare algoritmi di deep learning e computer vision ai dati di telerilevamento.
Supportare il deployment e il monitoraggio di modelli predittivi in ambienti cloud.




Requisiti

Problem solving: affronti problemi complessi con metodo, spirito critico e attenzione ai dettagli.
Determinazione: sei ambizioso/a, proattivo/a e mantieni alti standard di qualit√†.
Spirito di squadra: collabori con trasparenza, condividi idee e sostieni i colleghi.
Competenze tecniche: esperienza in data mining, analisi e modellazione con linguaggi come Python, SQL o Java. Padronanza di framework ML (TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn, ecc.) e versionamento del codice (Git).
Formazione: laurea in Data Science, Informatica, Ingegneria o discipline affini.
Lingua: ottima conoscenza dell‚Äôinglese scritto e parlato.




Costituiscono un plus

Esperienza con dati satellitari e metodi GIS.
Conoscenza di ambienti cloud (es. GCP) e piattaforme container (Docker).
Esperienza nel monitoraggio e nella messa in produzione di modelli predittivi.
Familiarit√† con strumenti per il calcolo distribuito (Dask, Ray).




Cosa si offre

Team di talento e altamente motivati, impegnati in progetti ad alto impatto.
Opportunit√† di crescita eccezionali, con possibilit√† di guidare iniziative rilevanti.
Benefit: orari flessibili, hybrid working, supporto alla crescita professionale e retribuzione commisurata all‚Äôimpatto e al valore che porti al team.




Valorizziamo la diversit√† di background ed esperienze. Se ti appassiona questo ruolo e pensi di poter dare un contributo, ti invitiamo a candidarti anche se non soddisfi ogni singolo requisito!




L'azienda garantisce le pari opportunit√† e accoglie candidature senza distinzione di sesso, et√†, razza, religione, orientamento sessuale, disabilit√† o altre caratteristiche protette dalla legge.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
Chi siamo

EUforLEGAL Srl, √® una PMI innovativa nata per offrire soluzioni applicative, servizi e prodotti per il mercato Legaltech, un mercato in grande crescita a livello globale, per l'informatizzazione e automazione delle aree legali di grandi organizzazioni pubbliche e private e di prestigiose law firm.

Abbiamo una pluriennale esperienza d'ambito maturata presso prestigiosi clienti sui processi e tecnologie di Knowledge Management (KM) ed Enterprise Legal Management (ELM) nei sistemi informativi legali.

Le nostre applicazioni di Legal AI generano conoscenza grazie all'utilizzo di modelli di Statistical/Machine Learning, Deep Learning, con l'obiettivo di aumentare la produttivit√†, supportare le decisioni strategiche, offrire un valore aggiunto ai processi aziendali interni e semplificare le attivit√† di gestione delle pratiche legali.




Per il rafforzamento del team AI, siamo alla ricerca di un Machine learning Engineer che sia parte attiva delle iniziative legate all'intelligenza artificiale all'interno dell'azienda. La risorsa inserita supporter√† l‚Äôazienda nelle strategie di crescita attraverso l‚Äôutilizzo delle moderne tecnologie e Modelli IA per il mercato Legaltech e Regtech.




Descrizione del profilo

La risorsa selezionata deve aver maturato circa 3-4 anni di esperienza e avr√† il compito di guidare e supportare il processo di sviluppo di progetti e prodotti innovativi basati sull‚Äôutilizzo di metodologie e tecniche data-driven, knowledge intensive e intelligenza artificiale.

Avr√† la responsabilit√† di preparare e ottimizzare i data set e relativi modelli di analisi in contesti di produzione, seguendo best-practice, metodologie e strumenti di Data mining e AI/MLOps.

Lavorer√† per la realizzazione di progetti e prodotti contribuendo ad apportare valore aggiunto presso i clienti, utilizzando un approccio sistematico e metodologico per individuare e proporre soluzioni innovative, replicabili e trasferibili.




Requisiti di conoscenza, competenze ed abilit√†

Conoscenza delle metodologie di data-mining quali: KDD, CRISP-DM, CRISP-ML(Q), DAMA Bok.
